Heritance Ahungalla is the best five star hotel to rest in Sri Lanka. The beach is really a paradise and the swimming pool atÃ© is really Nice....the staff is extreamly friendly.food is always excelentes....,

We just returned from a 5 day vacation at Heritance Ahungalla. The architecture is beautiful and the building itself is of national heritage importance. We stayed in a junior suite overlooking the ocean which was extremely well appointed. The staff were friendly and attentive without exception and are led to an impressive and highly experienced management team. The hotel is due for an overhaul/refreshment in May-November and should be completely amazing when it re-opens. Be sure to visit the sea turtle sanctuary about 1km North from the Hotel. This hotel is on my 'must visit list' for our next Sri Lankan vacation.

Delicious and quite a good variety of food. Very friendly and attentive staff, very good service. And staff member Shanika was very cooperative..surely will recommend this place n come back here again..

Excellent hotel with lovely people.... staff is really friendly and helpful.... food is amazing. ... room is really nice and nicely decorated. ... Thank you so much for a excellent holiday and memorable experience. ...We will come back.....wish you a very happy new year......

I appreciate your services . happy to have like this hotel in my mother land.. beautiful rooms with all the relevant facilities...happy to enjoy my honeymoon in your hotel. .....Thank you.... We will come back again.....

Really we had a nice experience in Heritage Ahungalla. Remarkable hospitality for all locals as well as for others... the staff is very friendly and always with us for our nÃ¨eds... Wish all the best...

We checked out from a another down South Resort within few hours of checking in due to very bad experience in service. We were a party of 10 and needed 4 rooms for the night desperately. Through friend's recommendation, we called "Super Taprobane Tours Pvt Ltd" while on the move towards Ahungalle from Koggala. Super Taprobane contact person Mr.Mohideen confirmed the 4 rooms within 10 minutes of calling even though it was high season and the hotel was almost on full capacity but we were lucky enough to get the rooms as we had no place to go. Thank you Mr.Mohideen for your prompt assistance and the surprised complimentary upgrades which we received due to your assistance. Reached the hotel as scheduled within 1 hour and was greeted by Mr.Lakshita the Manager. Not only we got 4 rooms next to each other we got 1 luxury suite as well for the same price as the other 3 deluxe rooms as complimentary upgrade. It was such a treat and wonderful feeling. Just few hours back we were miserably let down by one down south resort to find this resort with super customer service. Thank you Mr.Lakshita for the personal greetings at the reception. Rooms were wonderful and spacious. The restaurant was fantastic . We had the night buffet & breakfast buffet. There are plenty to choose from and certainly a very generous buffet spread. The F&B Manager Mr.Thushara was equally attentive to our every need at the restaurant as we had 2 young children as well. A big thank you also to Mr.Perveen at the restaurant who made sure my daughter had a freshly brewed hot lemon tea with ginger & honey at stand by as she was having a sore throat. Mr.Perveen made sure another hot pot of tea was delivered to our room before bedtime and again 7.30am in the morning. Was so impressed with the care given at this hotel staff I would come again and recommend to anyone who wishes to stay in Ahungalle. Unfortunately we had to leave for Colombo the next day due to other commitments or else this would have been an ideal place to be for rest of our vacation. The beach stretch is quite vast . Even though it was high tide at the time we went for our ocean dip, it was still fantastic to be in the waters and watch the sun set. There are 2 pools which was equally good and many other facilities which we could not explore . Will come back during summer 2016 for a longer stay. Checked in 28th December. Stayed 1 night

Very good hotel with very friendly staff!!Good food And good service.The new year eve was fantastic with a huge buffet, nice entertainment and an amazing firework!! Definitly a place to stay in when visiting Ahungalla.

The view of the beach and rolling waves from our rooms was awesome and overwhelming and has left enduring positive vibes that will always remain with us. The rooms itself were amazing and very comfortable supported by a very efficient service staff. The overall ambience was mind blowing and the complete staff were friendly, helpful, extremely courteous and above all very professional. We brought in the New year with such a bang with the whole hotel dressed for the occasion. The setting was most imaginative around the pool The food was delicious and had a vast variety of dishes. This lovely hotel is the answer to a family holiday. There is so much it offers that not only children but grown ups as well will enjoy Lastly I want to thank and complement the whole staff for making our trip so memorable Thank you and looking forward to returning soon Bobby

It was perfect night every thing was.inI it's place and nice it was fabulous night for suite dance floor was so exciting the competitions was interesting particularity the queen one.the staff also were so helpful and friendly next year with family

I stayed here for 5 days.. The hotel is excellent and the staff is brilliant and friendly. The two pool was the highlight for me. I wish I could stay longer but have to go back :( .. I'm already planning to return soon!!

The rooms were very clean. The pool of the hotel was huge and was maintained very well. However, when we checked in, the staff took ages to give us a room because it was not ready at that time. Even they took another half hour to bring out luggage into the room. We came to the hotel at about 7pm, and their normal check in time is 2pm, so they had ample time to prepare the room for us. We wanted an extra bed and so told the reception at the time of check in, but they brought the extra bed at around 10 in the night. At lunch on the second day, their was a live insect in the passion fruit dessert and when we told the staff they just took it away and didn't bother to apologize. Then at check out, they manipulated us to give 5 stars and write a good review on trip advisor. No wonder it has a rating of 4.5 on trip advisor. Overall the service was poor and not to our satisfaction.

What a theme for a new Year.... It was indeed a service beyond the horizon as the Heritance Ahungalla'd wish. We came to know they have won Sri Lankan culinary art competition for 3 times in 2010,2013,2015 and we were most fortunate enough to get our pictures at the photo booth where it was mentioned " culinary Hall Fame " on 31st night the hotel was incredibly decorated to suite their theme.superb illumination added small space shuttle came through their main pool. From the space shuttle a little chef came out and delivered their massage from the future , "" we are the future of culinary art in Heritance Ahungalla and we will be the champions in 2050"... And we saw few other little chefs dresser and prepared to take chief guests to open the Gala dinner..., This is the first time in our life , saw a main course of gala dinner with so much of verities and the buffet spread was laid over 25m length on the beach front. So many different food corners with action station and they have named each station as planets. Food was delicious and varieties were found from round the world. Just behind the buffet a whole new world with robots and of course we saw our solar Galaxy . Illuminated perfectly. Salad corner and desert corner was like the milky way Galaxy. Mouthwatering deserts to place the international palate was remarkable.main restaurant was converted into a feast and we had everything we like. Now we believe why the hotel won so many awards and been culinary champs in Sri Lanka.... What a surprise to see in this small paradise , a beauty pageant with international participation made a glamour and pride to the new year . Never forget to tell the entertainment and music . They did a superb job and everybody on the dance floor even past mid night . My self and my friends had the most amazing and best stay by far in this hotel. Their services were amazing , nothing to complain. Every staff member with a smile went extra mile to help you to be comfortable. It's an incredible service with homely luxury. They made me cry the way they greet each other at the dawn of new year with so much care, love and togetherness from the staff member to management team. A big salute for you all and I have never seen such in anywhere and we wish them all the very best for many years to come. It was truly a Hollywood film that I am sure will hit box-office records. For us it was a lifetime design,an amazing robotic service and we had a perfect new year eve and a first class pampering with Heritance. We will definitely return to this magical location and will recommend all our friends a must visit in Sri Lanka....

I spent the Christmas weekend at the hotel. An absolutely beautiful property with a beautiful clean stretch of beach and the most mesmerizing sunsets! The major failure was the room. It was quite small and old and definitely wasn't maintained properly. Cleanliness of the room was not up to par for the price I paid especially during the peak holiday season. From table tops to curtains to the wash room, here was dust all over as if it was not cleaned in months. I had to clean the blow dryer with a wet tissue to get the dirt out before using it! There was also a very old TV in the room. Food was okay, not great but the staff was very friendly and very helpful. It makes your stay a worthy one against all odds. There are two great pools and a garden with a lot of trees. Well maintained and the pool staff was very friendly and helpful. I would definitely like to go back if the room quality and standards improves in the future.

We booked a hotel. We walked in to our home.. It was not service, it was pampering , where we were looked after like being at home. What ever food we thought of was there and was given a right royal treatment by a professional set of Hoteliers. .. Continue the good work...

Our stay here was fantastic! Our first time in Sri Lanka but definitely not our last time! We arrived here on Christmas Eve and therefore celebrated both Christmas and New Years here at Heritance Ahungalla.. Can hands down say that this was the best New Years celebration to date from all the arrangements made by the Heritance team, future robotic decorations, delicious vegetarian food, customer service, live music, ambience, entertainment, fireworks and set-up! Keep up the great work and a huge thank you to everyone who made both our Christmas and New Years celebrations memorable and fun! Well done and all the best! ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€

Its our first vist here and my family loved the place..onr if my friends recommend this place...... Pool, Access to the beach and the lovely staff here. .m....we will definitely be back !!thank you for everything. ........

We really enjoyed the new year eve at Heritance Ahungalla...... it was like a paradise yesterday .... the hotel staff did a great job. Fantastic service.... it is out of the world .... thank you so much for all your great works....all the best for the new year.....

The new year night Was really good - ...awesome ..lovely spread of food ...n amazing music ..simply awesome.....The entertainment n fireworks were fantastic ...The place was beautifully decorated ... Thank You for the wonderful evening. .....

The hotel has been fantastic. We have been at the hotel now for three nights and have another 2 nights but wanted to write out review now. The hotel staff have been fantastic and very helpful throughout. They set us up with a wonderful room with ocean view, helped to organise a whale watching tour and have great advice. The NYE party is wonderful and the staff have going out of their way to make it a night to remember. Great food and entertainment!

Absolutely beautiful resort. We spent New Year's Eve here and the celebration was spectacular. The staff are very attentive and go out of their way to ensure your every need is met. If you are looking for a resort with spectacular views, five star amenities and world class staff, this resort is a must.

31st night dinner at Heritence Ahungalla was enthusiastic ! The dinner and the glamorous arrangements were specially breathtaking. The staff was friendly and the hospitality provided was at the top ! The iconic theme provided with galaxy pattern and the robots were wonderful. Dinner by the beach side and the cold weather makes the food more enjoyable :D and all the classy decos marks the end of 2015 in a surprising style ! Thankyou Heritence Ahungalla and happy new year 2016 :D

Amazing evening.. Best buffet ever so much variety and very entertaining. A great resort and an excellent place to relax and enjoy! Nice beach too though nobody seems to use it. Rooms are comfortable and overall the stay was excellent.......

The two nights spent here (including new years eve), were fantastic. Delicious food, exceptional staff and an amazing view made it a perfect break! (And plenty to do in the area). Another fantastic Heritance property and will definitely be returning in the near future.

Beautiful, elegant, entertaining, magical are just a few of the words that come to mind about tonight. The variety and high quality of delicious food has been superb. The atmosphere has been second to none incorporating both a fun, entertaining and relaxing atmosphere around the hotel. The hospitality and service has been a 5 star experience. Even though the staff have been working around the clock for this event, every single one of them has a big smile on their face and are committed to making us feel special as we see out the end of 2015. I couldn't imagine being anywhere else in the world to see in the new year!

Very Well organised party . Massive buffet with mouthwatering gourmet food covering every continent . Dessert Buffett was the biggest on earth ( best ever !)Not surprising as most of the Chefs were medal winners ! The live entertainment thrilled the crowd. An international guest list danced the night away. Best way to celebrate the end of the year !!

Celebrated the New Year's Eve party at this lovely place. Great food, music and lots of fun. Amazing service from the staff made it a really special memory for the family. An enchanting evening to ring in the new year. Probably the best and most comprehensive buffet line, quality entertainment and a spectacular display of lights and sounds.

Thank you so so much for giving us a wonderful time.... Very well organized.... Staff is really nice. They have done a great kid. Hard work.... Food buffet was fantastic...., we really enjoyed the night..... Thank you once again...............

Best 31st party in the Island. Beautifully arranged, amazing ambience, I loved the theme which I thought was very unique. I wish the best of luck to you and the staff to continue this amazing experience.

We have stayed at the Heritance several times and each time it gets better and better. The food is delicious, the sunsets breathtaking and the staff are friendly and extremely helpful. Our family will continue to visit this amazing hotel every time we come to Sri Lanka!!

Excellent hotel with great food and a huge pool. Rooms were very clean. Great beach-front access. Good location and the food in the main restaurant was delicious and jade a big variety. Really enjoyed the trip.

Great place and lovely staff... Very helpful to accommodate childrens needs. And had lots of activities for kids and adults as well. The hotel had some lovely Christmas decorations for the season. It made the place look very festive. Food was great too..............

It's a beautiful place in an amazing location. Staff is extremely friendly. Gives a very good service. Room is very specious & cozy. Have an amazingly beautiful beach. Loved the stay. there's a huge range of western & local food. Food is excellent. Hotel is beautifully decorated.

We had a great experience at the Heritance Ahungalla. Staff is very friendly...they gave us a roal Service. Food is delicious.... Rooms are beautiful and clean. The view is beautiful.... Staff is very professional... Specially Praveen, Thusara, Shanika.. . We felt home away from home.... I will be back.....

Had a great time overall. Ambience is great, service is excellent and the rooms are kept quite well. Staff are very courteous and helpful. Staying here was a great experience. Would love to come back again. Two thumbs up!!!

During school holidays Heritance Ahungalla is a place where I visit for relaxation. Service what we received from the time we step in and until we leave is excellent. I look forward every year to visit this hotel again and again. Never get board or tired, when we are in this hotel.

Every year we somehow try to visit Heritance Ahungalla for the vacation to experience their excellent service. 'Never say no' is their spirit and I am sure that will make them one of the leading hotels in the region. I have experienced the outstanding service offered from Ritz Calton Hotel. My experience at Heritance Ahungalla is almost similar to Ritz Calton Hotel. Keep up the good work going. I wish them all the very best and hope to visit this hotel over and over again.

It is our home away from home. Everytime when we visit here we leave the hotel with lasting memories. At every touch point the service rendered is outstanding. It is a hotel where service culture is consistently maintained during any part of the year. We feel that every guest is treated as and individual by rendering a personalised service. Heritance family is truly a service oriented entity where memorable impressions are created assuring the guest to come back again and again. Keep up the good work going!

This place is the best down south of sri lanka. Make it a point to visit yearly. Fantastic food. Great atmosphere. Rooms super spacious and comfy. Super attentive management. The GM Mr Refhan, Mr Thushara and Mr Gamini from F&B always without fail make the stay memorable and enjoyable. Love it!

We visit Sri Lanka yearly and always make a trip here for a few days. The staff are extremely helpful and friendly.... The pool is most relaxing and the view when you first get to reception will have u lost for words. See you again next year!!

Attentive service, friendly staff and plenty of amenities. Beach is right on the doorstep, although the waves bring up all the sand. Two pools, tennis courts, a fire show - plenty to do. Buffets were well stocked. A beautiful place to stay!

We stayed at Heritance Ahungalla for two nights. The service was good, beach and pool area was very nice and clean. The 'Upper Room' food was absolutely fantastic and fresh. The only improvements would be a wider selection for the buffet and more prompt responses for housekeeping. Overall, the hotel was very nice and would visit again.

Excellent experience had for the 2nd tym. Ahungalla is providing a great foods, accommodations, energetic staff, warm welcoming, comfi rooms equipped with modern technology feels us to visit here again n again... Good job done by the whole staff. Keep it up.

A cool place for beach lovers. Good rooms and the most important part is the team member of Heritance....very agile and knows the meaning of personalised service. Food at all the restaurants and the coffee shop is an experience and the buffet dinner at Jute is awesome. I would definitely come back to Heritance Bentota Sri Lanka....it's a place with the true Sri Lankan hospitality and excellent team of staff.

Everything as great, excellent property and very helpful staff. We traveled with children and they had lot of facilities for them to play across 2 pools, sport facilities etc. The atmosphere was peaceful and relaxing

We spent our one year anniversary at Heritance Ahungalle on an impromptu night away. Upon arriving we were greeted with a welcome drink (from a selection of wood apple juice, fresh pineapple juice and cordial) and a wet face towel. We filled in some paperwork and after a bit of a wait they said that they upgraded us to the junior suite as it was our anniversary. Heritance is quite a large resort and we were shown to our room. The room was pretty good, clean and well-appointed. They had made up an ornamental thing with the towels. Cute. The bathroom was a bit disappointing to be honest - made up of smoothed concrete and dark tiles, it just didn't look that pleasant. More a design opinion I guess. Otherwise it was clean. The resort on the whole is a bit dated and can show it from time to time as the various facilities were either unused or looking a bit shoddy. Wifi was free, reliable and available everywhere. One thing I can't fault is the service which was impeccable. Nothing was too much trouble for the staff and they were very helpful and made sure we were having a good time. They had prepared a small cake for our anniversary dinner which was also a nice thought. The beach was really nice with firm and fine sand that felt like you were walking on clay. Overall a nice stay, with some refurbishment work it could be even better.

This hotel is very beautiful and it's a lovely place ... This hotel has a relaxing atmosphere... The food every item was delicious... The soups was the best out of all... The rooms are very comfortable and felt like home ... As a family we enjoyed a lot... The staff and the service is also good... The Christmas decorations are also very beautifully done and the kids event like making faluda with the chefs and was awesome... Loved it here...

We have stayed at Heritance Ahungalla several times, and find its a lovely hotel with excellent food and great, courteous, helpful and friendly staff. The kids loved swimming in the pool, table tennis, badminton and the gym. As teenagers, they spent all their time outdoors. The live music at the bar had us on our feet dancing away! The wide range of food in all the buffet meals were delicious and we were even given a tour of the kitchen which was very interesting. We have enjoyed our stay here, I would recommend it to all my friends in Melbourne :)

Very good hotel it has good food and it is clean .the stuff make their best to serve the guests as best as they can .the Spa in it is good You can take a nice relax in its huge gardens .the location of the hotel is good. In general it is a very good choice we have made

Relaxing ambiance. Very Clean, variety of food, very friendly staff. Direct on the beach. Lovely and cosy hotel . Great hospitality. Also some activities areavailable like diving, billiard... Thank you

Environment is very good and there are friendly staff. But food is not good as I expected compare to the other heritance hotels. Good place to play beach sports. This is a good place to have a family or business vacation stay.

This is one of the super gorgeous hotels I have visited in Sri Lanka... The food very very delicious and has a wide variety ... The rooms are very beautiful and has a wonderful view... Love the ambiance and the environment... The service is excellent and the staff is very good toooo......

Very nice place. Great ambience.The room is very good and service is very good. Arrival service was great.The swimming pool and the beach are the best part of it. The staff is good. The breakfast today was amaZing. Dinner on arrival was not that good

Great ambiance ,excellent staff and great architecture. Over all a superh experience. Must visit!! The room was also very airy and erll maintained. Clean beach and clean sorroundings as well. Many earing options insidr the hotel which make it difficult to leave the hotel

We walked into Heritance on a Christmas day, after a drive from Colombo. The place gets your attention, right from the main gate, the extended green and the water body which seems to extend all the way onto the horizon! The front desk and check in process is extremely courteous, a couple of notches higher than most places I have experienced in Sri Lanka. Which takes some getting to, considering Sri Lankan hotels are among the friendliest across the globe. Rooms were spacious and well maintained, we had a set of three sea facing deluxe rooms, with ample balconies to laze and watch the sea and sun. Food was good, not extraordinary, but definitely above average. Breakfasts were centerpiece, a good balance of Sri Lankan and Global cuisine. Though I did feel, there could be some more tables on the lawns. The insides, especially during this time of the year, does get a little crowded. Enough for families to do. Two pools, a sand volleyball court, two tennis courts, a badminton court, a table tennis table tucked in a corner and a large number of beach chairs for those that are horizontally inclined! There were social activities to keep the kids busy. Conveniently located enroute to a Galle, Bentota and other places of interest in the Southern province. There is little that you can do in Ahungalla itself. A couple of beach shacks a few hundred meter on either sides of the main gate takes care of times when you want to just step out for a bit. Definitely, coming back some time in not too distant a future.

This beautiful hotel is located at southern coastal area. Beach is very clean and safe. Restaurant is very clean and it's staff is very supportive and friendly. Meals are great. nice friendly staff on the help desk Very clean room and wash room is very clean. Beautiful clean swimming pools

Wow, don't hesitate to book! We had a terrible time with hotels.com who's room info is incorrect and who are so so bad a dealing with problems, avoid them at all costs. Heritance is a gem though. My first time in Asia meant the style of the place was not what I am used to, but after a day here the beauty of the place became obvious. The building and rooms, although not in pristine, are clean and nice looking. The staff are exceptionally friendly. The Sri Lankan buffet is off the scale amazing!! We ate this morning noon and night and still can't get enough! The grounds and pools are great and there's no issue with getting a sunbed as the 150 odd rooms share 2 great big pools and ample grounds. The Christmas Eve dinner they put on is magical, seriously delicious food and the grounds where you eat at night are full of white fairy light covered trees - for our honeymoon I can't imagine anywhere more romantic. Ahungalla is a small village type place with nothing to do but we just had our own personal taxi drive us to hikkaduwa market, Galle old town and back, and the whole trip cost Â£30 odd. Brave a tuk tuk and I'm sure you could do it for half that. Can't wait to see what New Year's Eve has in store, we've heard it's another fantastic night like Christmas eves feast. I can't compare this hotel as its not the same as European western style hotels, but I can tell you it's romantic, relaxing and the Sri Lankan food on offer is outstanding! And b******y hot.

We had a lovely family break over the Christmas vacation. A good hotel with friendly and helpful staff. That with the always good 'Spence hotel' food, you have an excellent experience. Spacious and comfortable rooms. Good amenities which include a large pool. Lovely beach.

For last 20 years we have been in and out of this lovely place. Their service is superb. Wonderful, friendly and caring staff who are dedicated to serve the guests at anytime of the day. A must visit hotel in Sri Lanka. ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ‘

We came here with my family... Food was excellent and service were amaizing... Hotel decoration is really nice.. All hotel decorated into Christmas season... We were really happy with nice hospitality in heritance ahungalla.. Specially mention restaurant staff... Thank y heritance make our awesome holiday...

We went to the hotel for a day stay and got to enjoy and amazing selection in the buffet. There was a wide variety of meals from different countries. The sushi and salad varieties were really great. The staff were also really helpful and always free to look into our needs.

Hotel is very well designed and run excellently.Beach was great with a beautiful view,during the day the have lots of activities for kids and adults.Food was great quality along with great service.Rooms were kept in great condition and provided great comfort

Was a lovely stay at heritance. Extremely caring and courteous staff. A special thanks to Mr Lakshita and Mr Refhan. We will be back again, thank you ! A well spent Christmas holiday for us. Food variety can be made a little more interesting in the coffee shop

The place is really nice and the service is good. staff is friendly and very attentive. Food is really good and have a good variety. It was a hotel that maintained good hospitality. The treatment did not differ from foreigner to the local.

Warm welcome on arrival at the hotel. Curtious service throughout. Mouth watering spread to suit any toung...Beautiful ocean and ocean like pool for you. What else do you want. ..home away from home. Hats off to from Rifarn. .to Tushara ..to all the staff at all levels.

Lovely property, quite sprawling.. You can wander around the gardens, the beautiful beach, groves of coconut trees or swim in their two big pools. The hotel itself is quite a lovely sight specially when u enter n see the pond flowing into the pool flowing into the sea. The rooms are nice and their 5 bars are stocked well enough with great views. The only drawback with this place is the sub par food, though their buffets are quite good they can't really run an a la carte service from a perspective id device or food quality

Spacious rooms with nice balconies and large buffet. Nice beach and a clean pool. Beautiful Christmas decorations and perfect lighting. Has lots of we'll kept courts eg- table tennis, tennis, badminton, etc.

The rooms have great views. Housekeeping needs to be improved though. Soaps and shower gels, and basic amenities should be replaced daily. Otherwise a terrific venue and get away. The beach is on the doorstep and really great.

Heritance is easily one of the most beautiful and spacious hotels in Sri Lanka. We visited with a family group of 12 people, recieved rooms together, and were shown to our rooms as soon as we arrived. The service and quality of the hotel is incredible. Stunning rooms and a lovely beach, it really lives up to it's ratings. The pool is one among many highlights, but all in all, Heritance created an experience we truly loved during our christmas holidays. Not to mention the gorgeous christmas decorations. 5/5.

Great facilities and friendly staff. Very nice pools. Plenty of extra activities such as table tennis, badminton and the gym which are enjoyable to use. I highly recommend coming here and bring your family also. Very enjoyable place to be, large, nice room.

The place is very beautiful staff are friendly and mostly helpful good cocktails nice sunset and full programme for holiday. Rooms are spacious and with a wonderful view, very good evening buffet Recommend for family vacation. Very nice decorations, too

Checked into the hotel on the Christmas Day. The hotel has a very nice feel but just don't carried away with the ambience. Our first couple of in room dining orders were very disappointing. The food was served cold ( real effort would have gone into that given the tropical climate) it had no local flavor, I mean the chili chicken was sweet. Anyways I have another couple of days to go hopefully will get some good food close by. I am not trying the hotel kitchen again.

We feel like home in the Christmas time. Enjoy the excellent service and the delicious food. Our children got fun with the magic man it's a good experience to them. Location of the hotels is very nice and the garden very beautiful and relaxing. We love this place and hope to come again.

enjoyed a lot .thank u heritance for the excellent service.enjoy the delicious meal.hope that we spend the christmas happily with herritance. we will recomend this place to our all friends... come and experience the hospitality of heritance ahungalla...

On the positive side the hotel complex delivered everything its website claimed. The location on the beach gives it an added attraction. The staff were very friendly, pleasant and efficient. Going out of their way to help guests. The dining areas, for the all inclusive guests, provided a range of cold and hot meals from a wide range of cuisines. The deserts were also extensive. The room (deluxe sea view in my case) was spacious and had all the facilities you required, including mini bar and TV. The on suite was also spacious with a walk in shower. However a couple of points down graded this review from an excellent to a very good. The interior walls of the end suite were unfinished plaster (whether by design or unfinished) and would have benefitted by a coat of paint. If the unfinished surface was meant to add to the design, it failed. In the bedroom area the brass light fittings were hung very low and did not give great illumination. Difficult to read at night. Lifting the light fittings would be a simple solution. One light fitting was so low over a desk area that it required dexterity to access the kettle or the power points. The pools at the complex were both excellent catering for both splashers and serious swimmers. I am unaware if there were any water sport facilities on the beach area as during my stay the red flags were displayed. All in all a pleasant stay which could be improved by minor changes to the room.

We had a Great time with heritance ahungalla... We came here with my family...from the arrival to till departure we got excellent service from lovely staff... Specially mention Chathuranga, ranisha, supuni from front desk. And praveen, thushara, piumi from restaurant...they are really helpful and we will defernitly come back....

Very good hotel very frendely pepople room also very good food was very tasty pool bar and pool ariea service also very good very clean beach... View from lobby amaizing..... When we arrive here we fell here like a paradise....

Thank you fir giving us an excellent Christmas...... We really enjoyed the gala dinner. We had a table by the pool side.... Staff is amazing. Specially at the reception. They are very helpful and friendly...,,

The room service was exceptional...and the whole staff was very customer friendly....we stayed in the hotel for two days and from the time we got down from the car to the time we got back on to it the service from the hotel staff was very good.

My family and i stayed at Ahungalle for a couple of days starting Christmas eve. Even though we do come here frequently this was our first stay for Christmas It was fantastic. To start with the Christmas decor was vibrant yet unique it featured robots lit up and some in bright red hues ! The entertainment was very good and the kids enjoyed the sing along Carols, the party hats and bon bons.The food was sumptuous and the buffet included everything conceivable from oysters to Christmas turkey, lamb and lobster. The staff was friendly, accommodating and the rooms were classy and comfortable. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here and firmly wowed to come back.

We came to heriyance ahunglla for lunch lunch buffert.... excellent christmas buffet with lovely dessert ...staff gve us a good and friendly service... live music at the mirror lounge ... we enjoyed a lot.

It was my first time at all-inclusive resort and I wasn't disappointed at all. Great place in great location with great, friendly and helpful staff. Place is big enough to always find something for to do or just get away from crowd: two pools, gym, library, tennis courts and snooker table. First time saw rooms serviced twice a day! I also used spa; it was bit expensive compared to other things but good quality massage. (It was grad trip so many things were organized in advance)

My very brief stay at Heritance Ahungalla was a great one. I arrived at the hotel with the intention of having Christmas lunch with my family and I must say, we were all very satisfied. We were greeted by the staff who treated us with great hospitality. Lunch was absolutely divine. My favourite was the roast pumpkin soup. A must have if you are here for the weekend. We will surely come back in the near future :)

Nice Hotel to be in a #Christmas Eve!ğŸ„ the Christmas here was so awesome the food was delicious and it was a very big buffet.... the dance and the events that happened was unbelievable like the largest cake ...it was so tasty tooo... also the hotel is very beautiful when all the lights are lit up ... loved it here....

We really enjoy the party. And I am thankful to the jm and the staff for organizing such a lovely time for us. And this is our third time . I would like to wish you all merry Christmas and will have strength to organizing such wonderful events in the future

On this facinating christmasday we are having a wonderful time at the hotel heritance. Here we were warmly welcome and gave a plesent service. Our whole family came here and they all are wondering about the events they presented for us and we are very very happy about the staff who gave us a wonderful service and as well as the nice dinner here. We hope to come back here again.

This is our favorite place.....lovely Christmas gala dinner. wehad a table on the beach. the hotel looks really nice when you see it from the beach... excellent buffet with lots of verities..... thank you for the woderful service.....

Spending an awesome night in Heritence ahungalla with family! Attractive decorations! Mouth watering foods! Lovely music! Kind staff! Worm welcome! Great night thumbs up!ğŸ‘ğŸ‘hope to come again Ok time for dance now guys try to come over here next year!

Great night and also a colorful dinner Basically perfect and the service from the coworkers are fantafaboulous .everyone if us had a good night overall its good for any family friemds or the small children Cheers and good luck with the rest of the events

Wanted to thank everyone at the hotel for the fabulous service. We have visited the hotel on several occasions and every time the service and facilities upgrade it's quality level to be the best in the trade. Special thanks to Praveen for your excellent service and not forgetting Thushara, Lalith & gamini for the hospitality. Thank you so much. The stay was worth more than the money we spent.

It is an amazing holiday. Fantastic views and located in a serene beautiful environment. All the staff are very polite friendly courteous and efficient. Variety of food items to choose from and the food is so delicious. Overall an excellent experience.

Have been visiting this hotel since it was called Triton. Excellent service, friendly staff, tasty food, clean and spacious rooms and 2 massive swimming pools. HERITANCE also has an big beach front which makes it enjoyable to all guests. Easy access from Colombo with the use of the Southern Highway.

It has been a pleasant experience staying here. The service staff were very helpful and courteous. Would come back for another stay for sure. The beach is clean and very private. Two pools with great views and very family friendly.

This hotel lived up to its reputation of excellent food, typical Sri Lankan hospitality and true comfort. There could have been a few more activities for small children, but the two pools and easy access to the beach made up for it.

It was a great experience and it was in fact a wonderful and pleasant atmosphere. Facilities, hospitality and food are superb! Above all overall cleanliness is also highly admirable. Cordial and well mannered staff is also commendable. All in all I gladly give 5 stars and a thumbs up for everything! I strongly recommend this resort to spend your valuable vacation!

We were in heritance ahungalla with our fends. . The food was superb. chef's are very helpful. even the Restaurant staff were fantastic too. incredible pools giving more eligant to the hotel. We really enjoyed. We will recommend this hotel to our frrnds.

we were at heritance on 22nd december to 24th december.. we were very happy with heritance staff... they are very very friendly... always smiling and very helpful... i should say about restaurent staff.. they very busy some times, but they were not missing any guest.. always asking what we want.. we will come very very soon to this paradise....

What a wonderful place to stay. The service was very good, the rooms were great, the view spectacular. The management went that extra mile to ensure that we had a memorable and very comfortable stay. Everything was perfect. From the exquisite a la carte private dinner on the beach; where we dined on a delicious 4 course menu, handmade chocolates and a cake specially made for our guests. To the welcome that we received and private tour of the kitchen, museum and incredible chocolate carving by the extremely talented and lovely sous chef. I highly recommend Heritance Ahunghalla. Thank you to Refhan Razeen Executive General Manager for ensuring that we had such a memorable stay. We will see you again I'm sure.

It was a pleasurable stay from the begining.. Had a Warm welcome on arrival with quick check in under nice lobby that has the view of indian ocean over the infinity pool. Fascinating christmas decorations make the feeling of season. Room is large and clean with all amenities with fabulous ocean view. Out of the door step of the room was the pool, that is covered by a large tree with branches touching the water made the feeling of dipping in a natural pool. Dinner and the breakfast was Excellent with good spread and taste. Should specifically thank the Staff, All are well trained, friendly and willing to go for a extra mile anytime..!!

We were in Heritance Ahungalla with our family... There services was fantastic. Specially in the restaurant. Good varieties of foods was very nice. We all enjoyed. two swimming pools we like too. We would like to recommend this nice hotel to our friends.

We had grate fun in our vacation. Food is fantastic and also staff is very friendly. Nice place to stay. This hotel has a wonderful beach and pool for relax rooms are clean and tide. Has private balcony.

The location is beautiful and there's also a wonderful view from our rooms which were nice and clean. There's a wide variety of food and all of it is delicious. The staff is amazing- all extremely friendly!

Stayed at this Hotel for two nights in Dec with Family and it was an amazing experience. The staff is very friendly and the food was amazing! The location was great. I was able to take good photographs of the beach and I would recommend for photography.

This has been a wonderful experience for all of us. The entire staff from top to bottom have been so helpful that it made our holiday relaxed and enjoyable. The room was very comfortable and cozy. The food was scrumptious, the service was extraordinary and given with a ready smile. Thank you Heritance Ahungalla for our fabulous holiday!

Great hotel, all facilities were excellent. They are very eco friendly and accomodating to special requests such as dietary restrictions. Staff are very kind, thoughtful, and seen genuinely passionate about their work. Definitely recommend

This hotel scores immensely on its location and environment. Being situated right in front of a beautiful southern beach of Sri Lanka we got to witness some of the most picturesque sunsets ever while also being able to quiet strolls along the beach around dawn. The two pools in the hotel are quite spacious and very clean. One pool named the "green pool" provides an excellent area for relaxing as it is shaded by a tree that grows above it. The rooms are very clean and comfortable. The housekeeping staff is also very friendly and efficient. When talking about the restaurant, the food is superb in taste and quality. Though there is a lot of room for improvement in the service in the restaurant the food pretty much compensates for that. Last but not least the staff at the front desk and guest relations were awesome. Very friendly and efficient, and quite skilled in convincing me to write this review and give 5stars.

Perhaps the best hotel stay I've ever experienced - ALL of the staff were extremely warm, friendly and service oriented to the point that we were perhaps too well taken care of! They vastly surpassed any expectations I had, to the detriment of all hotels I shall stay at again. We ate at each of the outlets the hotel has to offer, from the 24 hour dining option to the fine dining restaurant, and the food quality was phenomenal at all of them. I would strongly recommend their Sri Lankan dishes, as the hotel has been directly responsible for my newfound appreciation of their cuisine. Egg hoppers and curry for breakfast. Not my usual fare, but truly fantastic. I stayed in a suite overlooking their landscaped areas, one of their two large pools and the ocean. Marvellous. Very well appointed, with sun-loungers and a dining table on the balcony, so you can read, have a nap or a snack / meal in seclusion and peace. Dining on the beach was great, and although on one night there was a slight tropical shower, the staff made sure we could still enjoy the experience. Super troopers. The spa was also excellent, and although the jacuzzi is not warmed, it was perfect after a while in the sauna. We took daily treatments, and the therapists were very good. The easiest way to get there is to walk along the grass past the buffet restaurant parallel to the shore. The beach is directly in front of the hotel, and perhaps the best part was that it was not crowded. Perfect to unwind, which was our objective on this trip, and was definitely achieved in no small part to the staff of this wonderful property. Thank you all. P.S. There are some squirrels that hang out in the trees by the pool. Get some pineapple from the barman, and they will come to eat out your hand!

We picked this hotel to go for a family vacation during the December season and stayed for 2 nights. I had been to this hotel a couple of times before and the one thing I will say that has remained consistent over the years is the food. The food was superb with a huge selection and the Sri Lankan food especially was out of this world. Apart from the food, it's worthy to mention the great service given by the staff. We reached the hotel a bit early, but 3 out of our 4 rooms were given to us 1 hour before the check-in time. Being the peak season, this definitely came as a pleasant surprise. Chathuranga the manager was especially helpful to us with a few requests as we were traveling with a 1 year old baby and nothing we asked for ever seemed to be too much. The 2 pools are situated in an ideal manner, with one out in the sun and the other under a low hanging tree with a lot of shade. We loved the pool with the shade as we could keep the baby in there for a long period. The beach near the hotel is private and lovely. Will definitely visit this hotel again.

We had a lovely stay at Heritance Ahungalla! Lovely architecture by Geoffrey Bawa. Loved the ambience. Thank you for the great hospitality. The staff is extremely warm and helpful. Loved the food but can do better in terms of flavor and variety.

The view is stunning. Staff are very well trained and helpful. Loads of activities. The pool is really amazing.Great a4chitecture.thank you for the great hospitality. Overall a great experience...â˜ºâ˜ºâ˜º..................

We had a super stay at this hotel. The place provides an environment for relaxation with no worries. The staff was so friendly & willing. They go above and beyond to ensure their guests are happy and everything is done with a smile! The food was great and overall service was excellent. We highly recommend this hotel!!

Service and food is pretty good, location is right next to a nice stretch of beach, good for a nice family breakaway . Rooms are well kept and spacious ... Two pools .. When planning please select the right season so that you can enjoy the beach ...........

This hotel has great facilities like the pool and the beach. The room's view are perfect and they all look at the pool. The staff's member give good service and hospitality..........we will definitly come to this lovely hotel again for its wonderful experience ......

Beautiful view of the sea. Great service. I would recommend a family vacation here as there are plenty of things to do and of course the beach and the sea is amazing. Food is also extremely good and very delicious. Anyone who stays here would enjoy their stay.

It was a really nice experience staying over at heritance Ahungalla.We were warmly welcomed by the staff and the variety of cuisine at heritance is simply superb, I personally enjoyed the food. Overall it was an eventfull and enjoyable stay at Heritance

We had an amazing time. Staff provided great service and the food was superb. The room was good and the atmosphere was friendly. The infinity pool provided excellent views and the gym was well equipped.Highly recommend this hotel. ğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜Š

Unmatched service where every employee owns the customer experience. The ambience, resort and food was outstanding. Their award winning chefs demonstrated why creativity in Sri Lankan cuisine knows no bounds. Their care for my grandchild included impromptu baby sitting and entertainment. I leave with amazing memories and Will be back again

Good hotel to enjoy good food. Friendly and obliging staff.we had a great time here.Great beach. I would have preferred it if goons were not allowed to encroach the hotel premises. We enjoyed the Christmas Carols and the staff were very good in singing ğŸ¶

Enjoyable holiday. Had a very good time and will certainly come again. Very pleasant and friendly staff. Good food and overall excellent service by very caring staff. Nice pool and nice beach. Enjoyed the staff christmas carols very much.

Being one of the flagship hotels of the aitkenspence organisation, this hotel meets the standards that one would come to expect from a hotel of such stature. Though under staffed in some aspects of service, the staff are quite humble and friendly. The rooms and over all architecture of the hotel displays the class. The food speaks for itself, the hotel boasting the best variety I have come across so far. While there is room for improvement, the hotel has a very bright future and i wish the staff and administration all the very best.

What a beautiful hotel surrounded by the pristine beach! The view from our room was breathtaking and a joy to wake up to ğŸ˜Š.. The staff here is very friendly and eager to make our stay a memorable one. The food was good and the choice of activities to engage in was wonderful! Will be back ğŸ˜Š

Love the service and food ğŸ˜Š. Great atmosphere to relax and unwind in. A good array of activities to indulge in as well.The beach is beautiful and pristine and offers the perfect view to wake up to. Will definitely be back for more of this wonderful stay ğŸ‘

Friendly staff. Superb pool. Easy access to the beach. Need to improve on the lunch buffet. Decent rooms. Overall my family enjoyed the stay. Would recommend to anyone who wants to take their family out for a holiday. Tip - try to get a room which is closer to the elevator or the steps. ğŸ˜œ

We were visiting family in sri lanka and were looking for a nice beach destination in December and were very happy that we found the Heritance Ahungalla. Very friendly staff that went above and beyond to keep us happy. We were traveling with a 15 month old baby and the staff made a fresh meal every time with and also sent food to our room a couple of times as the baby fell a sleep during dinner. Very clean and family friendly beach. Rooms and bathrooms were well kept and clean. Will definitely revisit. Thank you to everyone at Heritance that made our stay extra special.

Comfortable hotel with amazingly helpful and caring staff. The hotel dishes out the best food we've had this season and the choices are endless. Recommended for a romantic peaceful time, with beach time and good food!

Excellent food. Calm environment and friendly service. Wonderful place to spend some quality time with loved ones. Relaxing surrounding.... We enjoyed our stay here a lot..................food is very tasty and has a large variety....

Excellent staff made the stay extra comfortable. Top quality service good rooms and Fantastic food too! Will recommend anyone to visit the hotel. Fabulous beach stretch too. Had a lot of fun on the trip.

great!!5 stars and two thumbs up!!!!!!! Food is good. service is good. Rooms need to improve. It should be more bright.Pool is clean. Staff is very friendly, kind and very helpful. The life guards are also very skillful. Thank you Heritance Ahungalla for an amazing experience of the sea, sand ajd the food.

We, 3 families came to spend the school vacation, a weekend stay (with commercial credit card promotion). This is our third visit since its a best place to visit for quality and standards. Its a real experience in the pool and the restaurant, great choices. Good staff, service, overall very good satisfaction. We wish to visit again by Jan 9th and 10th and seek a better deal.

We had our staff trip here. Kind and friendly staff. During our stay we experience kind hospitality from most of the staff, be it reception, Restaurant(The best I must mention) pool staff and the security.The good thing about this hotel I noticed was the prompt service. It was a pleasure meeting Mr. Thushara Gnanarathnam(A senior staff member),who was apparently a reality TV star in Sri Lanka not so long ago, and his kind hospitality. - Family friendly, specially if you are travelling with kids. - Two swimming pools and a Jacuzzi close to one pool.

Heritance! Beautiful property! Loved the hospitality! Very clean and well maintained! Very good and big rooms Well marnered staff! Im looking forward to have an other trip again! Thank you! Keep it up guys!

Heritance hotel it was a wonderful experiance staying with you beautiful property great hospitality and good service .we had an amazing family holiday .just add more indian food to your menu food was good .the best thing was the beach just adjacent to the property .thanks again

Best experience ever. Good pool and good food. Absolutely loved this place. Customer service was excellent and provided lots of extras to make our stay comfortable We had the chance to play pool and stayed in a room with good views of the ocean.

It was great weekend in down south with cloudy beach, culinary foods with great atmosphere. Most elegant place was the beach and great scenario for relaxing .. Entire crew is doing great work with smily treatment and recommend place to visit.

Great hotel. We enjoyed every minute of our stay. Staff was very polite and all out to assist. Pool was great for kids/family. watching sunset by the pool was magnificiant. Buffet had a great spread. I would definetely stay again.

This hotel blew me away. It's service astounded me and beauty compelled me. Its right in front for the beach for the best views and a stunning pool in front with clear blue waters. The food Is fresh and delicious with even better service. Everybody Is nice and respective and the hotel rooms are the perfect balance between practicality and style.

Wide variety of different foods that taste great. Very good room service. Perfect location right near the beach and a fantastic pools. It has been designed by an very famous architecture. Offers free WiFi, complementary bottled water and fruits when upon arrival in rooms. Good dialog TV service offering plenty of channels.

We really enjoyed the stay in the hotel with excellent service and great food. We had a great time in the pool with the kids after enjoying the welcome woodapple drink. Great hospitality and excellent friendly service. I think we have chosen the right hotel and we recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to enjoy a great atmosphere with the family.

This is the consecutive second year that I have chosen to go on my annual family trip to Heritance Ahungalla. A fantastic hotel, fantastic food, good quality rooms and facilities topped with great staff service makes it one of the greatest hotels in southern sri lanka. Very highly recommended to anyone.

The hertitance hotel is which hotel i have seen beautiful hotel in srilanka it is situated in nice place in ahungalla it give us very good service to us rooms also good we enjoyed very much food also very tasty we enjoyed swimming pool also their service is superb their have a nice sea view finaly i wish good luck to this hotel

Dear sir and madam,this hotel is very beautiful and environment is very good.so....your foods are very testy,starffs are very kindly and active. hotel background is good. Hotels rooms are very clear.your have special ice cream.. I like it. Your hotel enterance waterfall is very creative.so...best of luck!

Nice beach side view hotel and also itz has large play area and also it has a large size pool side. It has good refreshments. It's has a good architecture design. The environment of the hotel is very atmosphere. Most of the peoples are come for the hotel because of their good command services. Most of the foreigners are came for the hotel because this hotel is vary famous in the Sri Lanka. They have a larger hotel range in the Sri lanaka. Kandalama heritanace is very famous because of the climate around the hotel, this is a five star hotel in the Sri Lanka, the service of the hotel is very best and also the employees of the hotel is very kind and the innocent. The see foods are very testy and also the desert also very good.

A very good hotel with a great staff. Also having a good service and lovely food. Rooms are also in very good condition and also having a good view of the Sea. They are having a great pool and the entrance of the hotel gives good view of the Sea. Sea view is also very good and can enjoy a lot. Hotel has various games and it gives a lot fun for us and makes the day happier. So I would like to recommend the hotel for any one who likes to enjoy a lot.

One of the best experience i had out of all the hotels i have visited.... the rooms are quite big and the view is so great.... the food is so delicious and has a very large variety and the people are very kind attentive and very helpful..... the servicr is superb i would say... overall a good hotel will come back again

Good food , ambience is superb , friendly staff , rooms excellent , I have visitors many hotels on the southern coastal belt but heritance ahungalla is by far the most exquisite hotel I have visited I have visited this hotel previously but I do note that is has upgraded itself immensely from the pools to their restaurant now has homely and modern touch to its scenic setting in the southern coastal belt I truly enjoyed my stay and would definitely stop by when I have the time

Srilanka is beautiful country ,clean and people r very simple .I had a wonderful experience with heritance ahungala .very good staff good food ,very calm place .ocean view is lovely ,loved swimming in the pool, incredibl pool .I recommend to style at heritance abungLA October

hesitance is a great chill out ,good beach, the staff are great jg customer service you were great, but the food was some of the best we've had in any hotel 5*. good pools and the beach and surf are great. only thing is the beach guys who hang around the beach entrance ... a bit of a pain but are harmless. we should be back next year also don't forget your mozzy spray

It was a fantastic holiday.service is exellent.food is on a higher level Room was nice.... finally i would like to say the staff is very friendly and helpful ...... definitly we will visit this hotel again........

This is my all time favorite hotel in Sri Lanka.Room service, restaurant service, environment staff hospitality,I would say it's excellent. special thanks goes out to Thushara Gnaratne and Praveen Fernando.

This is one of the best places that we enjoyed in our leisure journeys. We do travel alot local and overseas. we could add more stars to this five given. Service and the staff is much nicer and very friendly. We definitely will come here and we heard our parents had the honeymoon here at triton. Muthu and nethu.

This one of my favourite hotel. I've been visiting here since a long time ago and the service and their expertise have been excellent over the years. Customer satisfaction has been upto proper 5-star standards. Honestly one of a kind type of hotel. Had a great time. Hope to come back over and over again. Special thanks go to Mr. Thushara Gnanarathne and Mr. Praveen Fernando.

Excellent service and fantastic experience at Heritance. Food accomadation anf hospitality is exceptional. Ive been coming here from my childhood. Favourite hotel in the down south. Special thanks out to Thushara Gnanaratne and Praveen Fernando.

This is one of the most amazing hotel to visit...I've been coming to this hotel from small days and Whenever you enter these premises you feel so relaxed and the staff of the hotel is really humble and loyal to each and everyone.. You don't feel like leaving this place once you come here! The food it's amazing.. There's a variety of food and desert you can select and the rooms are so nice and perfect! We hope to return soon!

The service presented by the very friendly staff,was indeed wonderful. however I would have preferred if the evening tea was served to us, along with a snack. There are several activities. One cannot get bored at Heritance

It's always great to come to this hotel! I love how we can see the beach with the pool as we enter the hotel, it's so refreshing! And the rooms are excellent! It's so relaxing to see the ocean from the balcony! And also the food is very good! I specially enjoyed the dessert. There is a good variety to it too! The staff is very nice and welcoming and also very helpful! The service is excellent!We've been coming here for a really long time and you can never get enough of this place! Really enjoyed my stay here

It's a terrific place for a family vacation. Service is excellent . The staff is extremely friendly and helpful in every possible way. The ambiance and the atmosphere of this unique hotel makes you feel so calm and relaxing. They take extra special care to provide you the most amazing experience during every meal that you cannot help but fill your stomach to the fullest. This is yet another wonder by one of the worlds most renounced architects Mr. Geoffrey Bawa that one has to visit and stay and enjoy .

We feel at home every time we step in to this lovely hotel. Breathtaking architecture blends with human touch of professional staff makes everything beautiful. Sumptuous international and local cuisines are up to the world class and the warmth of staff makes you feel so good. Lovely place

It was a wonderful stay. However we would have preferred to have more varieties for the buffets. The main courses mostly consisted of rice. Other activities should be available at least till 8 in the night, including outdoor activities.

This wasn't my first time to heritance ahungalla but every time I come here I experience the same thing. An excellent service. From their food to accommodations to their staff. They ensure that we have a very good time when we come here and also makes sure that we are satisfied and content when we leave.

Have been to the hotel regularly over the last ten years, now it's almost like coming home. The senior staff recognise us and always make us feel welcome. Especially good for families, two great pools and right next to the sea as well as great buffet for adults and kids. I believe the hotel is being refurbished shortly (in 2016) which will make it even better. Would recommend this as a relaxed and homely resort by the beach.

Excellent greeting. Good well come drinks Rooms are good, nice staff , nice place with a fabulous beach, very big swimming pool, it is a very nice family hotel.Pool is child friendly. Location is excellent. Good entertaintment in the evening.

I'm going to try summarize this paradise in as little words as possible. Amazing place, good food, beautiful beach and amazing staff! The place is amazing! This place is worth a thousand words! It's a fun relaxing place to visit!! Worth it!!

Good food, service excellent, friendly staff. They always smilling.. specially main restaurent service was excellent.. we are really satisfied with food with the big spread.. defernitly we will choose this place for our next holidays and all the best for 2016

We came with our family..It was really nice hotel.we had two nights their..delisious foods with excellant service we had..The beach has a nice view and it make us mind calm in every morning..Specialy have to say the staff is verry fraindly :) and also I should mention restaurant staff they always friendly. . We will come soon. ..

Beautiful venue. Very nice staff especially the restaurant crew. Unique pool. Friday night cultural show was amazing. Beautiful sandy beach. Approximately two hours from Colombo. Worth the visit. Although we experienced two power cuts it didn't affect us as we were out on the beach most of the time. Rooms are reasonably good but I'm not sure it's 5 star quality as they say.

Had a great time staying for one night with my family. The location is great, right on the beach side with beautiful views. We got deluxe and premium rooms, there was not much difference between the two types. The pool was amazing! Had two to choose from and the residence pool which had beautiful trees surrounding and above it. I have not been in a pool like this before. The Cultural show on Friday night was also very entertaining and made the stay better. Would not recommend if you want access to power constantly as we experienced short power cuts in the rooms. But it was not an issue for us as we spent most of the time outside.

Rooms - Room was big but not ocean facing. Food- vegetarian options very disappointing. Location - Long walk Beach- amazing and beautiful Ambiance - very nice Staff - friendly Thank you.......,,,......

This is a lovely place with two large swimming pools and a beautiful view of the beach. The staff were very pleasant and the variety of food available was great. Reasonable size rooms (triple) and great facilities to enjoy with the family. Overall, a great place to spend the night with the family.

The pools were amazing and the beach is beautiful. The food is luxury. The rooms are nice but needs improvement. ....but the staff service was good and I liked all the acyivities available..... Thank Youâ˜ºâ˜ºâ˜ºâ˜ºâ˜º

We arrived at Heritance hotel with 3 young children. Had a great time in the beach and experianced the most beautiful sunset. The pool was a welcome joy and very kid friendly. Dinner breakfast and lunch was excellent. there was loads of choice food cooked to perfection and lots of yummy desserts. Staff was very friendly and never over bearing. had a great time and was really sorry to leave after just one night. Kids loved the place and did a lot of exploring. Overall a very happy and a memmorable experiance. Loved it.

This amazing property gifted us a wonderful holiday experience during our stay at the hotel. Continuing with the rich tradition of offering best cuisine, the meals were outstanding with the right blend of Western, Eastern & Local. Rooms were clean, neat and cozy which offered us a unique feeling of luxurious beach resort. The staff was always by our side and took good care of us. Nothing to complain. Cheers.

As soon as you walk into this resort you feel so relaxed with the view of the pool and beach. Then when the lovely staff greet you and their service being exceptional, you really feel like a VIP! Great place with excellent service and would recommend to anyone who would like to relax and have a holiday. The pool and beach are stunning too.

The hotel is totally awesome with a great ambience and courteous staff members! The room is also good. The pool bar has an amazing feel to it. All in all a great experience. THANK YOU FOR THE WODERFUL SERVICE.....

Hospitality is awesome...regards goes to Shanika, Mr Refhan,kk and chef Dimuthu .... Food is superb... Staff and the service is out of world. We really enjoyed the candle light dinner. It is unforgettable... Thank you for the wonderful service...,,

Good & plesent customer service..... nice pool & beach...room is good but if there are more space will be much good... room service is excellent and fast service.....we will come back again with our families.

We have being frequent visitors at this hotel and have stayed pretty much in every room in every floor. All deluxe rooms are fitted for the comfort of the guests. A wonderful service offered by every single employee of the hotel from the moment you step into the hotel. Not to mention the view, the pool and the amazing buffet they provide. No matter the amount of guests they always manage to provide a buffet that caters to all. If you need a time out of colombo this is the hotel to stay. We always choose Heritance Ahungalla. Be ready to be dazzled by the great service. Thank you for being amazing from the moment we checked in.

It's an amazing place I recommend to everyone, a family, a couple, group of friends,...etc to have a great time. A very beautiful hotel that's built in an eye catching way every corner. The food is also really good and the staff is friendly. Have been here about 10 times and will never get sick of it. Also, has many photographic opportunities and sites. Can't think of any negatives honestly. Enjoy xx

This is our first visit to this amazing beach resort.... perfect location.. pools were nice. Gym is excellent. Even in the hot sun you can enjoy at the green pool and we really enjoyed at outhe side jacuzzi. ..food is great and staff is friendly...

Our check-in was very slow and not what was wanted after a long day of travelling â€“ Iâ€™m sure this will all be remedied once renovations are completed. The two pools were very clean and delightful to swim in. We had the all-inclusive package and couldnâ€™t fault the food, drinks or service. The food really was amazing â€“ different dishes featured at all buffets and as we stayed six nights can honestly state the variety was excellent. Our week at the Heritance was a lovely way to finish our very busy and action filled holiday. Iâ€™m sure once those renovations are completed the Heritance will be even more enjoyable. Coming from Australia I probably will not return to Sri Lanka but certainly appreciated everything we saw and did.
