We came here for a one night. But now we are thinking to extent our stay at this lovely resort....Best hotel in down south in Sri lanka... Food,staff and the service is really good.... Evening music is really nice.... Thank you for everything.......

Had a gr8 stay....staff and the service z really appreciated...Gud plc to visit...a v good plc for family and frenz...even da food z awesome in here...nd ts halal too....hoping to cum bk soon for another stay...a plc recommended for all....

Great place to visit. Nice for family and friends.............Staff and the service is really friendly and good. Food is amazing.....thank you for a wonderful holiday.....we will recommend to our friends.....we will come back.......

We had a great time! the staff were all very friendly and were very cooperative. me and my colleagues were treated well and the service was very efficient. best place to relax and at the same time have a good time. we all had a memorable experience here and are looking forward to our next visit.

The place is nice and the worker at the hotel as well as the local people are really kind and enjoy service. There is a few options of trios around the hotel But It always takes a while To move from one place To Another given the level of infrastructure In the country.

We had our wedding at Heritance Ahungalla in May this year, and it was an experience that our friends and family have not stopped raving about! Our stay at the hotel was amazing, the staff were exceptional in their service and the location is breathtaking. The day of our wedding there was a monsoon storm that destroyed our marquee as we were having an outdoor wedding on the beach, which almost didn't happen. The staff, especially KK, helped pull this together before we ever knew what had happened and made this one of the best days of our lives. I can not rave enough about this hotel. We had family and friends stay here from all over Australia and all around the world who have been left with the best of memories . Well done Heritance Ahungalla, we can't wait to visit you again!

The food, the services and the attitude of the staff was truly amazing! The staff was so polite and friendly and capable. The ability to be able to handle huge groups is an added advantage. I can definitely recommend Heritance Ahungalla to anyone......

The architecture of this hotel is very beautifully done that special credit goes to Goeffry Bawa .... the environment is sooo beautiful very calm and a very cool atmosphere .... the rooms are fantastic the food is even more fantasticc and the staff and the service is excellent

This is absolutely not a 5 star resort - not by international or Sri Lankan standards. Everything from the small room to the aged gym and very basic amenities was a disappointment. The food is admittedly excellent but the restaurant staff have absolutely no sense of how to host more than 100 people. On the whole, the staff are friendly but typically clueless. Basic hotel processes such as charging drinks to a room or booking a spa appointment have proved very trying. Their cashier desk is simply a joke - patrons have to go to a little room in the back of reception to make small payments, as if they are in some bizarre 1950s public administration building. The overall impression is in fact an insult to guests who are paying a significant premium for their stay.

This is a very very beautiful hotel the atmosphere and the environment is sooo beautiful.... And most of all the beach its so fantastic.... And soooo clean.. The rooms are very clean and my room had a great view and a private balcony.....the staff andvthe service is excellent tooo. Food is awesome.... We eill come back definitly ... Best ever

Stayed at the hotel for four days when we came down to sri Lanka for our graduation trip in December. Great staff, food and service. The rooms were good. Great atmosphere, very peaceful. I hope to visit again in the future........

Amazing resort with a nice sandy beach, great view, and an awesome pool. Nice friendly and helpful staff. Would recommend it for very large groups - we were a few hundred of us, and the resort managed us very well - both operationally and in terms of food and activities.

Fantastic service and food. We were a group of 400 visitors who did graduation trip in Sri Lanka. Definitely a great choice because we had every thing that we need in this famous resort, from great food to great alcohol and awesome facilities!

It's a nice place to live. there's very beautiful view in the hotel especially for the sunset. we came here for graduation trip and really enjoy the stay. The employees here are very nice and helpful. The small welcome ceremony is quite unique and full of local elements.

from the time we walked in heritance ahungalle blew our minds away. from the staff and their beautiful smiles to the tasteful fusion cuisine. our days spent by the pool overlooking thr beach was pure bliss.. hands down i could safely say that this experience was one to remember in sri lanka. great hospitality by heritance :)

The hotel stay was just simply amazing. Hands down it was my best hotel stay in Sri Lanka. The staff was just so helpful. Even at like 3oclock in the morning they were on point! The food made me travel back in time simply amazing. All in all I could just say I loved every minute of it.

Wonderful service and staff. The food was amazing! Will definitely visit again :). Was here on a business trip for a short while and received great hospitality from the staff. Will definitely recommended. The hotel is right on the beach...

Arrived late following delayed flight and driver getting lost so we weren't in the best of moods. Felt we could have been offered some food instead of relying on the mini bar but I suppose we could have asked for it. Shown to a room which had a view of a tree right outside so changed that to a much better one overlooking the pool with a sea view. Much better but why are the bathrooms left with bare plaster? Don't get that one. The good times then began because Heritance is a wonderful hotel with excellent staff in a glorious position on a beautiful beach. Felt like Robinson Crusoe whenever I walked on it with waving palms behind me and my feet in the warm Indian Ocean. Only problem are the beach kawkers who don't take no for an answer and pester you to death. The big pool is awesome and the pool attendants outstanding at providing towels and mattresses very quickly. Food is a bit hit and miss. Breakfast is really good if you go in early; not so good if you go in late and food has not been re- refreshed. The evening buffet was exceptional on barbecue night but a little bland on other nights although there was always something to attract you. Desserts are very good as are the soups. Tried the a la carte restaurant once and the lobster was really good but took an eternity to come -odd with only two of us in there but great value for money. The hotel is made for relaxing and the staff go out of their way to help guests to enjoy their stay. We only had four days and we were really sorry to leave. When the sun is out and you're on your sunbed by the pool overlooking the beach, it just doesn't get any better! Will come again for a longer stay.

Very friendly staff, good and fast service. I see friendly people all around. Nice view of pool and sea. Food is okay. Room is okay, but not ver impressed. The hotel has gym facility and table tennis.

Staff is good and friendly... Service is great.... The access to beach is easy.... I think the room is a bit old but it is still fine.... From airport to hotel is Abit far, about 2 hours but it is probably one of the nearest hotel resorts that is of such quality....

As a family we enjoyed this hotel so so much..... My kids enjoyed the pool so much.. the rooms havre a very beautiful view... With lot of fascilities...the food is very delicious and has a variety of food tooo.... Will come bsck again...

We have stayed in this hotel for 4 days with a large group of students, and literally everybody loved the experience. The hotel went the extra mile and organised all kind of activities for us, such as beach sports, night activities and even a night rave. Also all the other guests that were not part of our group loved the hotel a lot, as the staff was so attentive to organise special activities for them as well. The food was delicious, the pool fantastic, the beach is of the nicest we have seen in Sri Lanka and the view on the east allowed for beautiful sunsets from all rooms. Thanks for these great four days!

We visited the hotel for 3 nights as part of our Honeymoon tour of Sri Lanka. The lobby with view through to the pool is amazing! Great to see when you arrive! The rooms are clean and well maintained and housekeeping kept them spotless throughout our stay. The variety in the buffet restaurant was good and we always had lots and lots to eat! The staff are amazing! Friendly, helpful, always doing everything they can to make sure you have everything you need or want. We would definitely stay here again if we were ever to return to the area.

The food is good delicious has a lot of variety.....the laocation is quite good with an awesome environment....and the area is clean......the rooms are good neat and tidy and spacious........ The staff and service is also good ..... We will visit this place again if we come

Nice view and good bed and rooms. The view and the landscape of this hotel is extraordinarily beautiful. ... the rooms has a great view overlooking the sea.... the people and the staff is really good and helpful and friendly.... the service is also good.... the food is fine i need more taste to be super happy.....definitely will come to visit this hotel again

Really amazing place to visit and be.. superb hospitality.. extremely good service.. and brilliant food.. Nice pool and super scenery.. easy access to the beach.. extremely satisfied with the visit.. #Ranisha thank you very much for everything (Y)

We enjoyed our stay at Ahungalla Heritance with family. The food was great, the staff friendly and all amenities excellent. The beach was beautiful, not crowded at all when we went which made it even more enjoyable. A kids pool (or more shallow areas in existing pools) would be ideal. However, this didn't have a real impact on our holiday.

Excellent hotel in ahungalla area. Rooums are good & clean with better space. All rooms balconies in sea side. Visibility is good. Food are better. Hotel have spaciou two swimming pool. Memorable experience with heritance ahungalla.......

Herince ahungalla is beautiful hotel in ahungalla area. Very good & pleasing staff as well. Room are good & clean with beautiful seanories...... Foods also good. Hotel have two swimming pool. Hotel is memorable trip to us.

Would recommend to anyone who wants a luxurious holiday along the coast of Sri Lanka. Everytime I visit Sri Lanka I make it a point to stay at heritance ahungalla. Fantastic food, fantastic service, fantastic hotel.

Great foods with high standard hospitality. Very friendly staff with quality service. Beautiful atmosphere with nice views. Excellent location to spend the holiday with family and friends. had a good business meeting best place for conferences too...

Service is very good. All workers friendly... Every one tuch with customers. Facility very good. Mailes is very good and range have guest like.. Thank you very much for grade support to last two day and wish u all the very best...

Great stay and enjoyed the hospitality Good staff with a higher hospitality. Cleanliness and space of trooms great. Food is excellent and would advice anyone who is willing to visit sri lanka to visit this hotel without any hesitation

Hats off to the staff and food. Meals (Eastern and Western) were presented and prepared to perfection. Scrumptious dishes! Each and every staff member met served us wholeheartedly, were courteous , helpful and approachable. Interior and exteriors were always tidy and clean. My stay was memorable and will be treasured. Heritance is indeed a home a way from home for a western resident like me. would be a those looking for a classic Sri Lankan

very friendly, flexible, helpful staff , rooms are neat n clean , nice location n view calm n quite , nice architecturel hotel ( jefry bawa ) there r 2 swimming pools view with the sea , mouth watering foods , so many varieties of food

Beautiful location with a massive picturesque pool and ocean front, delicious food with a variety of Lankan dishes, and amazing service with a smile on everyones face! The place to be for a great holiday!

Heritance Ahungalla is a wonderful hotel with spacious and clean rooms/baths. Stayed at a room overlooking sea. Balcony is ideal for an evening tea. Buffet spread is huge and mouthwatering. You get all kinds of dishes you could ever expect from a Sri Lankan hotel. It has two large pools. Very friendly staff and their service is excellent.

Two night full board stay. having an awesome time. location is fantastic, beautiful setting great pool and beach. What really captivates us the friendliness of the staff. As we arrived we are greeted very warmly and were checked in very promptly. short while later we realised there was a small problem with the door lock of our room. The staff promptly attended to it. The meal spread had a wide variety and the dining room staff have been exceptionally helpful (we were holidaying with two kids) - smiles all the way. We have stayed at many hotels in Sri Lanka (we are locals) and this is by far the best experience we have had. the friendliness factor is unparalleled in our experience.

Thank you very much for a great trip. Everything perfect. Service impeccable. One of the best hotels i have stayed at. Amazing food, excellent flavors and cuisine. Very relaxing ! Service is some of the best I have ever experienced in my life.

We had our family trip to Heritance Ahungalla ,it is awesome place to spend holiday.we really enjoyed ,specially kids were enjoyed a lot. food was excellent and grate hospitality from hotel staff . It was pleasure to inform that The Heritance Ahungalla is best place to spend holiday .

Overall was a good experience. Stayed for two nights. Dinner was really good the second night. Unfortunately the beach was not clean. It's a public beach but the staff should probably make an effort to keep the surrounding area clean. Service was excellent except for the slightly annoying habit a few members of the staff had, of forcing guests to review the hotel on trip advisor and give a 5 star rating.

We were warmly welcomed by hotel staff and arrange the check-in smoothly. The buffet was mouth watering and the spread was suitable for both vegetarians and non vegetarians. Nothing to complain about service from the time of booking till we check out. Staff was attending to details to make our stay a pleasant experience. Residents pool was a chill out place for all of us. The sea was in the vicinity and was clean and calm. I would recommend this hotel who is looking for good food and excellent service.

Lovely hotel that overlooks the beautiful Indian Ocean. Excellent location and ambience (the xmas deco is up and it is very cheery). Hotel provides free wifi too, enabling to connect w friends and family.

In this hotel as you entered you feel very relaxed.... most of all it is very eye appealing.... and the staff is very helpful and explainsbthe hotel very clearly and provides all tge information... and when we went fir lunch the food was delicious and the. Service is. Excellent...... lovely hotel overall and must to visit place....

We stayed at Heritance Ahungalle with family and had the most awesome experience.The hotel was sooo beautiful ,managed very well ,excellent hospitality and services and food out of this world.We are already making plans to return again.

One of the best product of Geoffrey Bawa _ we stayed one night in your lovely place. Food was excellent and staff is always ready for hospitality. Chathuranga,supuni,lakshitha from front desk..chef thilakarathne and praveen, thushara, madhu,muru, from fnb..nihal from house keeping gave their fullest service. Hotel was decorated in Christmas attire. Will come to heritance ahungalla again.

We visited heritance ahungalla with my family they have nice service.. Specially in the restaurant ... All the staff are nice and smiley... Even the food was fantastic... They have two big pools.. One of the famous architect Jeffery bawa done a fantastic job.. I will recommend this place to my friends.....

Every thing Good Very Good Services , specially in the restaurant. Even the food was fantastic. They have nice two swimming pools. One of the famous architecture called Gefry Bawa done a great job. We would like to recommend this nice hotel to our friends.

We enjoyed our stay a lot. The service was Good and the Service Personal was very friendly. Very quiet place, so u have to drive for some sightseeing or watersports. Animation in Hotel is good also in the evening some music. Only had breakfast, but was tasty and various.

Nice hotel. Very calm and quite place. Hospitality is very good. Can enjoy alot. Rooms are very comfortable. Will hope to come again.. ...the pools are very big and clean.... the staff is very friendly ....Thank you....

it'a a nice welcome & good assistance !!! # feel room arrangments are good !!! ....the christmas drcirations are very well done ...very attractive....the staff is also good....the pools are very big and clean.... we are truly enjoying and relaxing this day out at this hotek....

I would say that this is one of the fantastic resorts that I have been to as you enter the beach overlooking is very relaxing and eye appealing.... The rooms are very spacious and had a lovely view... The food is fabulous..... The staff is very friendly and attentive ... The service is also good ....must to visit hotel.....

The staff maintained a positive attitude and ensured we felt welcome during our stay. Everyone was well groomed and treated us with respect. Piumi (HR Executive) and Chathuranga (FO Executive) is to be commended. They had a gift for hospitality and showed great respect for all customers. Thank you for a wonderful and memorable experience. Sanjeewa & Nadeesha

We chose Heritance Ahungalla as our wedding destination and have not been disappointed. Having looked at other hotel packages we felt the Heritance offered the best wedding services and surroundings for us as a couple and to accommodate the rest of our wedding party as we were a total of 18. We were greeted on arrival and upgraded on check in to a suite which was a nice first surprise. That evening we met with Shanika our wedding co-ordinator who assured us all was in hand and made final arrangements for flower styles, timings and general order of the day. Nothing was to much to ask and we felt totally confident that our day would go to plan. We had chosen to have a morning ceremony and unfortunately the rain was in full force at 10 am when we were due to start but we were assured they would wait until the rain stopped so we could have the beach ceremony we wanted. Within the hour the rain stopped and the ceremony started. We had traditional dancers and drummers to walk us through the hotel grounds to our decorated arch area on the beach. The ceremony was beautiful and concluded with cocktails and sparkling wine on the beach while we had photographs taken. We had a relaxed afternoon enjoying the glorious weather and were again upgraded to the top suite in the hotel which is just amazing!! In the evening we had arranged to have a table on the beach for our wedding party to enjoy a 5 course meal including perfectly cooked lobster! the table was surrounded by lanterns and really was the perfect setting and the service was impeccable. We followed our meal with a firework display which was the perfect ending to our day. We really cannot fault the hotel and the staff they have all been amazing throughout, they have done anything and everything they can to accommodate us and give us the perfect relaxed wedding we desired. Shanika who co-ordinated the wedding and Ranisha the trainee were both amazing and we are so pleased we chose the Heritance as our wedding destination.

A really beautiful hotel with a good staff and a good service , the golden Sandy beach and the pool is also nice good to spend our Time leisurely and happily also the food is really a maizing and fresh i suppose this is one of the best hotel IN Srilanka.

very nice place to stay,awsummm plce,food was als superb, and there was a lot of good tasty food... room wz superb... and the view facing the beach was breath taking...there is also a very pleasent staff and most of a ll friendly and couteous.... and definitly we will visit again with our family

Myself and boyfriend stayed here for a friends wedding. Having just travelled from a 5 star hotel from Malaysia we had the same expectation regarding the service from the hotel. The positive- the hotel rooms and views were fantastic, the swimming pools were so inviting and were visibly cleaned everyday. The hotel wasn't too busy so it there was space around the pool area and the food was good. The room cleaner always left us petals in the room which was a nice touch. The negative - even though we would be more than willing to give a tip after exceptional service it felt like a tip was expected for doing the basic job. For example when we first arrived we were ushered to the lobby and our bags were taken off us. A few minutes later we were showed to our room by one of the reception staff, as we all got into the room, she simply wouldn't go, she was there for a least 2/3 minutes and was very obvious she was waiting for a tip.1) we had no physical money on us at that time 2) she should have never assumed we would give her a tip for doing her basic job ( bad customer service) it just felt really uncomfortable. Our bags then arrived 5 minutes later to our room brought by 2 bell boy whom also waited for a tip- but my boyfriend kindly but forcefully ushered them out of the room. Great first impressions of the staff. Before we arrived we thought we could eat in the local area and booked b+b. We were advised on our arrival to avoid restaurants as we could get very sick eating at local restaurants. We then enquired at the reception to upgrade to all inclusive package and we would pay the extra supplement, my goodness that was a struggle. The person that could do this wasn't in that evening but we could see the reception staff writing notes of our conversation. We then came the following day to talk to the reception staff and they had no idea what we were talking about even though we gave them our room number and told them someone wrote this down - so we had to speak to them again upgrading. Finally we told we had to speak to someone else later that day and again repeat the conversation. The hotel scenery is great but they should protect their customers from locals calling out and trying to sell scarves , excursions and produce. You could be on a sun bed and you hear ' hello hello'. Going to the beach just in front of the hotel is the worst because it's a public beach. I actually was chased down by a local trying to sell something to me. It's sad you have to be rude for them to get the message that you're not interested in a overpriced excursion. The beach area in front of the hotel should be private as I felt so unsafe. Finally if you prefer drinks from behind the bar at the hotel expect a 15 minute wait time. There could be 5 people behind the bar a few customers in front of the bar but the wait time will still be 15 minutes on average The Heritance Ahungalla management should realise great customer service is key to the hotel market. Not only smiling staff member ( which they were) but those that go the extra mile. Whether it was one person from reception contacting us after the upgrade conversation and not us trying to speak to a relevant staff member eveytime we walked pass reception.

Hotel ambiance itself was very relaxing. The check in process was taking bit of a time, but that was not much of a problem as we had time to lool around the property. I would say that the staff were not too open to help. They mostly replied with a negative sense. The buffet spread was amazing. They have a separate vegetarian corner that is easy to figure out. Nothing to be blamed of the taste.It was amazing. The main pool is a bit too opened to the lobby. The second pool is lovely. The highlight is the warm water jacuzzi that is there near the pool. The rooms were too clustered and badly need refurbishment. In one of the rooms we had the lock was broken. The water pressure in the shower was too much. Lastly I would say that the guests must have their freedom to review the hotel after their stay. I feel it is very wrong to force a review. May be they can suggest to leave a review on tripadvisor, but it is not required for the staff to download it on the guest's phone and wait till the review is posted. If this happens please get a moment off and tell them you will go back and post a review.

It was pleasure to visit such an awesome place. Must visit place if u have a chance. Great food and facilities to enjoy. Rooms have a nice view of the pool and sea. Service of the staff is excellent..............

Can't say enough of this hotel and its staff. Refhan and his team runs this place so well we want to keep coming back. Great food, timely service, friendly staff, and nice amenities. Thanks Heritance! Keep up the fantastic service. We will come back in no time. This is no longer a well kept secret! Surani

This is a wonderful hotel the rooms have a lot of facilities and has an excellent view.... The food is very delicious and quality is great ..There was enough variety of food to make my family of 4 satisfy their individual taste buds..The staff is friendly and courteous... And the no words to express their excellent service ... Within couple of months I will come back to this hotel again.....

We had a wonderful time, kids loved the pool and the beach area. ......The Herritance Ahungalla had a great collection of salads and food was amazing. Highly recommended for a family stay ! ....,,,,,, thank you.........................

had two good days of pure joy. Friendly staff, Good food and a comfy bed. What else do you need in a hotel ;) â™¡ Recommended for travellers who want a peaceful and calm trip to relax at the beach and enjoy the sun. :)

This is one of a kind unique hotel and best of all the hotels ...the rooms are very good we got a big room facing the pool and the sea....the food is excellent and has a lot of variety... the gym is well equiped and loved it here....will come back gain...

Heritance ahungalle having more tasty foods.. best hospitality... more friendly staff.. love to be in here again and again..l one of the best hotel.... .......we will come back again............. we recomond this as a best hotel with the best hospitality..

I'm from Kandy. We (myself and my wife) went to Kandalama in dabulla and had a great time So we wanted to take our parents as well. It's pointless of going to the same place (Kandalama) twice therefore we decided to go to ahungama heritance since it's all from the same family. There's about 220km from kandy (up and down both about 450-500Km) it was along trip. by the time we got to the hotel it was 5.00pm on 05/12/2015. We told the reception we have 2 bookings, one double room and one triple room. The welcoming lady was a fat girl and she was very rude to us she did not support at all even when filling the forms during the check in. and she took us to our rooms Double room (215)was ok but the triple room was very small (216) and fully packed most of all there were only 2 beds, so when i inquire about the 3rd bed from that girl we said " Ah.... ok i will send a folding bed for you" As if like we are servants/slaves. I told her politely. I request for a triple room and I have already done the payment by visiting to your headoffice at aitken spence colombo. Her reply was "all our rooms are this size there is nothing we can do" I said if you put another folding bed here, there is no space even to walk in this room. Her reply was "Sorry" she said it in a way either you take the room or go home, and she went away saying she will send someone with the folding bed. My mother said "don't be mad putha we all came here to enjoy not to fight the other room(215) seems to be a bit large so we shifted to the next room. Then again I thought I already paid for a triple room and I don't get the service I wanted. If the hotel has only double rooms, they should have told me when booking. they never told me that. I got mad. I called the reception and requested to connect with the manager. Unfortunately manager was not there and an executive officer was available named "Chathuranga" I told him about my situation. I have child about 10 months old. Myself mywife my child and my mother all are staying at this room, and the room is too small. he quietly listened to my situation and he asked me 5 mins and call back. then he called me and say "sir we have a large room vacant you can shift to that room" I was delighted we all went there to enjoy not to suffer and stay in a room like in a prison cell. Then again I called to chathuranga and appologised him for getting mad and raising my voice what he told me shocking. he told me "sir it's better you told me now rather than checking out, if so we couldn't have done anything for you.

Nice atmosphere, friendly welcome at the entrance, friendly staff,lovely decorated room, food was superb..service is excellent..Honeymoon offer is value for money..Heritance Ahungalla is an ideal place for honeymooners...

visited heritance ahungalla with my family.. this is my second visit to this lovely hotel.. i specialy like to mention thushara, gamini and praveen.. they have arranged nice baby meals to my kids... im shure my next holiday also will be a heritance ahungalla. i have visited many hotel in aitken group, this is the best hotel ever...

I visited this property for a destination family wedding and while the rooms, all beach facing and the property was great with the really nice swimming pools, the service levels expected for this category of hotel was severely lacking. We were 3 of us staying in a suite and we were categorically declined to be given another cinamon gel soap (they only give one for your entire stay) and we had to fight for extra drinking water, considering there was an extra person in the room. We had a housekeeping guy who was downright rude and hellbent on proving us wrong. Apart from this even refusal for giving us food from the buffet since we were late or allowing us to sit in the restaurant and eat. The point is that the staff blindly followed rules and did not care about customer service at all. Not once have they gone out of their way to help us feel comfortable.

A friend and I stayed at this property for 4 days. It was absolutely wonderful, from the property and its location, to the rooms, facilities and the beach. The staff were amazing, went out of their way on every front from the house keeping staff, to the waiters, front desk, restaurant managers and the GM of the hotel, who is always available to meet all guests on the property. Their service was 5 star and definitely the best hotel in Sri Lanka by a mile. Highly recommend to those looking to celebrate an occasion, travel as a family, couples or group of friends.

Hotel heritance had a very good welcome to hnb staff. We all enjoyed their hospitality to a greater extent. Staff gave a good customer service. Tasty foods for both local and foreigners. Wish u continue standards.

The rooms are really nice and have all the amenities. The buffet spread is very big with a lot of variety for both locals n foreigners. The pool is lovely and The staff are very friendly. Hope to come back soon

Thank you so much for the kindness of hotel staff and great hospitality. And we would be wish to visit you on a day where not 'houseful'. to feel more relax and to enjoy the hotel specially the Architecture. Thank you so much... :) :) :)

Me and my wife checked in during a very busy time period but the service extended amidst all the rush, I would say is remarkable, special the service extended by Thushara (restaurant and bar manager) and his team, also Daynanda the sous chef. And whole staff was so dedicated...! Thank you Heritance Ahungalla for making our stay extra special...!

This hotel is very nice.i like this place because there is a fantastic beach....the food is very tasty and has a lot of variety......the pools are very big and good....the rooms are also fabulous with nice view and many fascilities.....the staff is good and the service is excellent.....

Nice location friendly customer services delicious food with big variety.... nice weekend with lovely service... best service providers at restaurant... staff very helpful and attentive... fantastic holiday we really enjoyed.. definitely we will come back....

food is excellent... service is awesome... we had a lovely time here.. staff very helpful and smilling... we stayed one night in heritance.. lovely location.. there is two big pools we enjoyed very much.... we would like to reccomend this hotel for our other friends and family members... we will come again to this lovely property........

It's fine and wonderful hotel in srilanka. I think this is a great place to come. Nice rooms and very tasty food in this hotel. I wish to come again soon. So very nice place to have a wedding also. I wish all the best for the hotel.

We like Heritance ahungalla very much. Yesterday they arranged a kids club with the magic show that was really nice and we enjoed a lot.....A foods are very good. we enjoyed in swimming pool too. :-) thank you heritance ahungalla.

We appreciate the hospitality the two animators were really good A special bunch of thanks to Ranisha The rooms and the service is excellent and will come back to this hotel again ......wonderful hotel overall. ........

We r at Heritance since 4th night on our annual branch trip of Kaduwela.. The hospitality of d staff..room service is at high levels n d food is wth a big spread t meet our requirements. .. Enjoyed d stay here...

I came here with my HNB group.. we had a memorable weekend at herirance.. service in every outlet is amazing... we stayed there two nights... staff always smilling.. my hudbend's friend praveen from restaurant really good gentleman.. also thushara from restaurant really good... all other staff also very friendly.. we will return soon...

The most enjoyable stay I ever had the staff is very friendly and courteous the room is good facilities are very good the food is very good mostly myself and husband enjoyed the hospitality as we have traveled alot here as well as overseas and o could rate this place as one of the best hotels I have ever been

The hotel surrounded from attractive environment with the nice sceneries of the blue ocean. We felt delighted from the dedicated customer service, received from the reception,restaurant & room service. Meals were excellent. We recommend this place to have a relaxing & memorable stay. Thank you

few things that i really liked about the hotel. 1. Spacious library to have a good read in a comfortable and silent setting 2. Beautiful and a wide angle view of the sea from the room 3. Friendly staff 4. A fruit basket delivered to the room 5. Speedy wi-fi

Great place. Good service. Excellent customer service. Shanika and supuni very helpful girls. Also Anushka and chef Roshan very helpful in making guests comfortable with the restaurant service and food respectively. Awesome experience of stating at heritance ahungula.

Amazing stay at heritance family with great hospitality.thanku for all great staff..nihal from house keeping ....kk from fnb did an amazing job. Sea bathe..pool games were excellent. Food was great ...... And services excellent...had good ... 2dayyys with ...5starrr hotel..... Experience............... And nice environment arround da beach side..... We had a great event with out side and indoor lots of event hvng thrr........... .... ...

We were here with my HNB group friends.. We had a great time with heritance staff.. Specially in restaurant staff, they are always attend to the all tables and asking what we want.. We are really satisfied with heritance staff.. Our next year trip also to the heritance...

Perfect place enjoy your vacation in heritance ahungalla srilanka. We had lot fun and enjoyed every bit of trip. Poolside bar and restaurant was awesome.staff was excellent. Hope to see visit soon. Trip adviser also was super. Thank to boss for planning the trip.

Heritance Ahungalla is the place to stay for a good holiday. The staff are really down to earth they take care of guest well. Food at the restaurant is excellent. the beauty of this place is the best beach and the view is awesome.

Awesome hotel. Will be back for sure. One of the most exotic resorts I have seen. Highly recommended and this one of the best of all the hotels The pool side bar, the restaurants, the tennis courts ... The best part is the view from the room. Good job guys !

Amazing place, service was very good, lovely staff and friendly as well! Couple or singles u will find what u r wishing for! Easy access to the sightseeing locations... Fresh food, clean rooms and the pool is just perfect! Paradise on Earth, Sri Lanka

It has been a beautiful stay. We were greeted by the reception staff who were very welcoming. We arrived at 8 am and they were very understanding that we had a long flight and ride from the airport and offered us an early checkin upon arrival. We were greeters by fresh cold towels and fresh juice. The room was nice as well. The shower is very nice and hot water is always available. The room service is quick and laundry can be done within a short period of time compared to other places. The beach is amazing and very relaxing. The hotel is relatively close to Galle as well. The staff were always very friendly. We had a trip to Kandy on one of the days and the hotel arranged a to go breakfast for us that was ready for us at 5 am. They also provide wake up calls. I would suggest to get a room with a sea view to benefit the most. The hotel can help you to arrange everything as well. The shampoo and shower gel provided by the hotel had a very nice smell as well. There are two pools amazingly located within the property. We loved that we swam under the rain as well. The beach is very clean and had an amazing view. We had an amazing time especially with the traditional night in the hotel where we saw the traditional show and dance. You won't regret visiting and I would love to visit again. It is a romantic place but also very suitable for families and friends. You can find international food in the restaurant as well. At night the view of the fishermen boats in the distance was so beautiful as well. It is a beautiful safe hotel with amazing staff who will not hesitate to assist the guest. Thank you for the lovely stay.

The hotel is very nice and calm . They have a great service and friendly stuff. Recommended for travellers who want a peaceful and calm trip to relax at the beach and enjoy the beautiful nature of Srilanka.

fantasti experience. ..we realy enjoyed. ..very friendy...staff...helpfull too...calm and cool environment. ..higly professional...front office staff..with good knowledge. .in customer relationships. .. .

I enjoyed my stay at Heritance Ahungalla. Eco friendly environment, Food, Swimming pool and specially the staff top to bottom were always with a smile and very helpful, Excellent. I love to visit this hotel again and again

Had a lovely time with heritance staff... staff always smiling and helpfull... specialy mention buffet restaurant staff, there very helpful... there is two beautiful pools... the hotel located in a very beautiful location... we would like to recommend this lovely place...

Food is awesome, fresh and great selection for every palette. Quick work out at the fully equipped gym and a long dip in one of the two big pools is a great way of relaxing. The rooms are big and well equipped with good view of the pool. Friendly and attentive staff.

we came here for honeymoon and we were enjoyed with lovely service and food... room was really good and two big pools.. staff very friendly... we are very satisfied here.. we will recommend this place and will return soon...

Heritance Ahungalle is a lovely place to get away for a weekend. They have two large pools that are fabulous. The buffet spread is excellent and Chef Dimuth does his magic by putting a local twist on western classics. Today he had made braised pork with a spicy and sweet tamarind sauce that was to die for. The rooms are spacious, clean and very comfortable.

Just visited the hotel and found the hotel itself to be very clean and well presented. Gayathri one of the management trainees is amazing she is so welcoming and friendly, really gave the hotel that extra something special. Definitely worth a stay.

My first impression as I drove into the driveway and into reception was quite good....then downhill.I picked the hotel as it was ranked a 5 star property,but by European I would give it a low 3.....I was in a luxury room...half the lights did not work,a damp smell lingered despite spraying,the room was old dated the shower over spilled and the water was not warm....I have to say the worst room I have slept in.The public areas and dinning room pool area also very dated.I was informed the hotel was closing in May 2016 for a full re fit....avoid until then....The staff need service training ...I found them lacking direction ....overall totally disappointed.

I came to this hotel for business purpose but enjoyed the fantastic beach and the relaxing environment here ...the buffet here is awesome lot of sea food dishes and the food here is very tasty and its spicy but not too much ...will come back to stay the night

This is one of the best hotels I have visited in Sri Lanka. The environment is very enchanting as well as the supporting staff with mouth watering dishes in the restaurants. So I strongly recommend to chick out it if your planning to travel southern part of Sri Lanka.

Very helpful staff and friendly, accommodation the best one on Sri Lanka. International and local food, everything LUXURY !! In all inclusive are lot of coctails, snacks and fresh coconuth. Swimingpool is clean and water is warm. All of staff speak very good english. Perfekt location on beach. Very quiet place.

We checked into the beautiful down south hotel ,one of the great product of geoffrey bawa in a evening.the hotel is decorated with christmas attire and reddish.the journey is for my husbands's birthday and we had lovely stay. the stay was organized by small piumi and she helped me lot for making us comfortable.gayathri did a pleasant smile.kk ,praveen and shyamalee took good care at restuarant. Green pool and jacuzzi were a nice experience.food is delicious and location is excellent. So many thanks to chathuranga malli and lakshitha who helped us out to do the reservation at colombo office and giving us a nice room. Finally thank you wonderful staff and all piumi's friends.we will come again^-^ Nadi n sanji

We came here with my friends and we were enjoyed lot with heritance service.... staff always smilling and frirndly... nice location with lovely view... really nice place to relax.. when you are here, you feel everything with you... food was excellent... lovely service... we will come soon to this property...

It was a very enjoyful time period for our family. No words to say about food because its very quality and pure. Room facilities are very high. Thank you for everything. This hotel has a very good environment i meant about sea side, pools, rooms, ect. It has a very fast staff .

One of the best hotels we have visited and this is the 4th time we visited.Friendly staff,care for the customer makes excellent service.very cleanly environment and superb variety of foods.specially the staff is maintaining a great customer relationship.

This is my first visit to the Heritance and it has been an enjoyable and relaxing experience. The rooms are very comfortable and quiet, and unlike some Sri Lankan hotels there are no barking dogs! The food is excellent and the staff are very friendly and helpful.

This is a five star hotel and they maintain their standards very well.....very relaxing hotel....The food is of very high standards ....and it's tasty....... The rooms are very comfortable and the gym is very good ...This hotel has a lot of facilities to enjoy. .....and we will definitely come back to this hotel again.....

Fantastic service. .....grateful to all staff this hotel is very beautiful landscape and very kindful staff we wish all the best for all staff...the rooms are of 5 star standards and I considered luxury .....food is delicious...but loved this hotel because of its special staff .........

heritance ahungalla is one of the great place for family outing ......wonderful experience in this hotel it has everything gym and the spa....lits of games for kids.....the fios is marvelous and lot of variety rooms are comfortable and homely....had a great time in this hotel with wonderful stafff

The staff was very friendly and helpful in every way.The beach was amazing.We had a wonderful time.Also the food was delicious.Being vegetarians we had a very good variety which we never get in other hotels.

Heritance ahungalla was one of the best hotels we visited. The food was delicious and had lot of varieties. the rooms are very comfortable and homely. The staff was friendly. The place is also amazing with a awesome beach and a swimming pool.

Rooms are spacious n homely. Food lot of varieties even for us vegetarians. Beach is close by. Pool n Jacuzzi right in front of the room. Friendly staff always at our service.Wonderful experience@ heritance ahungalle. Keep it up aitken spence.

After touring Sri Lanka for ten days we just wanted to relax and our stay at the Heritance Ahungalla certainly did that for us. The staff, from reception to restaurant to room to staff to pool staff all were excellent, always with a smiile on their face and always eager to help, well done to you all. Had a smashing room (341) with great views over the grounds to the beach and beyond, just watching the sun go to sleep was brillant.

My husband and I visited this hotel as our second destination on our honeymoon and we loved every bit of it ! Friendly staff, always with a smile. Great food and facilities like the spa, gym and two swimming pools. The view is just magnificent!

Beautiful hotel with a big territory and very nice beach (especially view from the swimming pool to the ocean). Good rooms with the views to the ocean and very positive atmosphere :) Rooms are cleaning every day, all personal are polite and smiling :) We recommend it!

Heritance is nice hottel in this area.i think most important think is there have nice beach in front of the hotel.and staff is very friendly......and very kindly.im so happy in this two days........ ............. ..........--ğŸ¤—ğŸ¤—.i have free time we are come back.

We had lovely time with heritance ahungalla staff.. they are really friendly and my kids Didn't want to leave... Speacialy at the restaurant and reception....they are very helpful.. beach is really nice and we enjoyed a lot..

Excellent hotel for a family holiday. .. We really enjoyed with our kids...food was amazing. .. Two swimming pools are awesome. ...We enjoyed in the jacuzzi ... staff were helpful and friendly.. .. Thank you for the wonderful hospitality. ...

Large rooms with free wifi, TV. Two large pools and many facilities like kids clue....food is really nice. Clean and beautiful beach... We will recommend to anyone..thank you for the wonderful service...

awosome hotel that i ever loving of wormth welcome, customer friendly treatments. Heritance ahungalla provides taste foods by protecting their natural taste. we sure you should enjoy the unmatched service from hotel ahungalla in your lifespan

Good experience at your place & we enjoyed its greatly. Food & atmosphere are very delicious & it a so very environmental friendly. Also foods are consist with large range. It's a very good thing. And also your service is very grateful. Thank you very much for your service....

Without a doubt Heritance Ahungalla deserves its reputation as a 5 star considering the quality of service, accommodation and food. The staff including thier executive manage Refan truly does make it feel like that traditions are indeed alive according to their motto. They were very friendly and courteous.Thank you and hope to visit them again soon

We came here with my family we were really happy with lovely service and food.. Specially chef.thilakarathne, Praveen and thusahara. Sunday buffet is here really big... We will back to this hotel for over night.. Also I will recommend. This place to my other friends As well...

had the best weekend after a long time. great staff and freindly atmosphere. love e night club.it was epic.have lots of stuff to do and the rooms built to the latest standards the washroom was my favorite

It was our third visit to this beautiful hotel that feels like home! With a friendly staff From the reception to the room service it alwsys feels like staying one more day! With deliecious food sweet and spicey! And some quality service of Mr: Thushara, Praveen, Madhu.Etc: At the restaurent! It Always Feels Like "HOME"

As i know heritance service always excellent.. We always prefer this hotel.. Lovely food and lovely service.. This lovely hotel architected by world famous mr.jeffery bawa.. Really nice view from the lobby we will defernitly come back to this hotel.....

We came here with my family we enjoyed very much with marvellous service here... If I have Holliday, we always prefer this hotel.. Now here like a second home... Specially we are really happy with restaurant service.. We will back very soon...,,

Awsome hospitality by staff . Verity of foods. Superb view... lovely staff... we were here with my family and we were very enjoyed with lovely service here.. room was nice. Always staff smilling... we will defernitly come soon...

Throughly enjoying our stay at Heritance Ahungalla. From the time we stepped in they have shown us the true Srilankan hospitality. Concerned about each and every guest, especially kids. Keep up the excellent service & loved the kottu we had for dinner. It's a must try. Best in SL.

I have always inclined to Aitken Spence hotels, But my stay at Heritance Ahungalla was exceptional. From the very word go they made sure that our stay was special at every integration point. I liked the "comcern" the staff showed for our satisfaction and how they went out of their way to make every experience special. I would rate their service 5 star and would highly recommend Heritance Ahungalla. Tharaka De silva

One if my friends called me and told me that they are spending one night at a beautiful hotel that if i would like to join them...The environment is very comfortable in this hotel ... Rooms are quite good and as u entered to the room it felt very homely specially with the facilities tooo and had a beautiful view.... The food is brilliant because i tasted most of the food and had it had unique taste and attractive garnish... The staff was very friendly and felt really comfortable to talk .. The service is also superb... We will visit this hotel again

The hotel is really nice with the view , and staff there always smiling very friendly,,,,, I especially like the dessert In the restaurant, and thank you for the good service of Praveen... But I don't like the equipment in my bathroom old and not unfriendly to ladies especially the shower ...

Really satisfied with the facilities provided Staff is very friendly always speak with customers and inquiries their needs Food also really fine and very tasty. Pool facilities gym facility and everything very fine I would suggest everyone to be here at least for a one time

I'm working at commercial bank thier annual trip was held here and out of all the hotels that were chosen for the annual trip they considered this hotel the best... The service is really good and i enjoyed that alot the staff is friendly.... The staff is attentive and very good in their job... The rooms and the food is up to my satisfaction..... I will drfinitly come back to this hotel again..

We reived a very warm welcome and the staff at reception desk were very helpful and ensured all our requirements were met and ensured a pleasant stay. Good verity of food options and spacious rooms Would recommend for anyone looking for a romantic get away with scrumptious food.

I got to know about this hotel from one of my friends who choose this as their honeymoon destination..... So I thought to spend one night in this hotel ...I came to this hotel on a rainy day but on that day also it was goregeous and beautiful..... The room was great and the fascilities was also great like the bath tub ....after having meals I thought I would come to this hotel with my family and that I will choose this as my honeymoon destination.......

This is our first time been in Heritance Ahungalla. Comparing to any other hotels customer handling and services are really good. Workers are very friendly and helpful which makes us feel comfortable thought out our stay at Heritance ahungalla!

We were invited for a wedding we decided to to stay that night & go the next day. the wedding was organised very well, wedding party was very happy that they decided to have it in Sri Lanka at Heritance. We had a enjoyable time, food was delicious and so much verity Staff was friendly and helpful.

Was a very pleasant stay. The staff was very friendly and polite. Had a great time. Large spacious property. The pool time was enjoyable. Great buffet spread. Had been for a friends wedding which was beautifully and tastefully arranged by the hotel. Highly recommend.

I've been to 42 countries and stood over 25 main Hotel brands. Heritance Tranquility, Privacy, Leisure and Service is untouchable. The location and Staff took me out of this world for a moment. A hotel a Location all of you must visit and Stay...... Thank you Heritance....

Nice hostel. View is amazing. Friendly staff and we had a warm well come. Pool is clean and we enjoyed a lot. Rooms are comfortable and clean.there are some entertainments. Traditional dancing y quite amazing. One of the best hostel in Sri Lanka. We hope to come back again and I would like to wish everyone who work there. Good luck guys.

Received very well when arrived. really good room service. The room was brilliantly set up. The food was well prepared. The waitress and waitrons are well trained. The food offerings was superb. Thank you very much. I definitely visit again.

I checked in to the hotel tonight and the first thing we noticed was how friendly, warm, caring and welcoming the staff were. Greeting us with big smiles and fresh juices. As I wasn't feeling well the staff prepared a room for us exceeding our expectations! Everything we served from the buffet was prepared well and I can't wait to try out their breakfast. I don't want this stay to end! Will definitely visit again soon!

We had previously stayed at this resort in 2011 and naturally, happy with the service the first time, we came back. I am glad to say that the service has not only simply stayed the same but improved. The service staff are friendly and very hospitable and are always willing to help. But I thought that the buffet service was fantastic and there was a variety of foods guaranteed to satisfy all tastes and preferences. The rooms were beautiful and had a desirable Earthy quality which perfectly matched the traditional service and atmosphere exuded by the hotel. Very relaxing. Overall a wonderful place that I would highly recommend for all looking for a comfortable and pleasing stay in Sri Lanka. Certainly looking forward to returning here and experiencing the Heritance Ahungalla magic again!!! Neil Jayasuriya And Family

We came here for my friend son's wedding. The hotel is excellent. Service marvelous... Food was excellent... And is very enjoyable stay.. Will recommend to for all for nice beach Holliday... Room was nice but it need more lights... Thanks to heritance....

Environment is very attractive.Staffs are very good.Interesting place.Love to be here. Wanted to come again. Nice place Good area to pass the time Good food Nice serving We would like to recommend indian people to come and spend here I am happy to come here

The hotel marvellous, staff is courteous and pollute and service is excellent... only suggestion is that there should be one flood light in the room.. All else is as expected by the guests. Will return to this hotel whenever we are in Sri Lanka...

Friendly staff. I want to plan for a event for my wife's b'day. They did a nice arrangement on the bed and get few gifts for her. Nice place to get away with busy life. Easy to access, one hour from colombo.

Ranisha is very beautifull and pleasent and very hospitable.... the food is good there is variety ...........I love the hotel...the art the ambience the decoration...just about everything hope to come here some day god willing and god bless tc

I stayed at heritance for my first time. I was very happy with their services and the standard that they maintaining at the hotel. Specially front office reception staffs are very helpfull not forgot to smile. I would recommend this place without any hesitation for my friends and others...

We are very happy with the hospitality of this resort It is on the beachfront with a lovely ambiance The hotel staff is very helpful and gracious We would surely like to come here again We were a big group and the guest relations arranged a room for us to get together and play games without disturbing the other guests at the hotel Most helpful and gracious

I enjoyed staying here.Beautiful place splendid service good food and beautiful atmosphere.Will always miss this place and will surely like to visit again. Staff excellent and efficient hospitable and kind.......... ...............

I am on a holiday to the beautiful country SriLanka. My tour covers major 4 towns of this country . 1) Kandy 2) Nuwara Eliya 3) Ahungalla 4) Colombo . I had chosen all 4/5 star properties for my leisure cum pleasure tour . The best of all these is Heritance Ahungalla. V were welcomed by very courteous staff with welcome drink & refreshment towels . The check inn procedure was completed in just few minutes . We were guided to our room with very well mannered , polite, courteous & well dressed personnel. She explained us all the features of our room & the facilities available of the whole property . Our room was very well made up upto the 5 star standards. The food is also very good especially for we vegetarians with lots of choices . I would like a mention of all the very polite & disciplined staff. I would definitely recommend this hotel to all those who visit SL. It's a property with heritage with all modern facilities

Excellent hotel and had a very comfortable stay because the staff is very welcoming and very warm to each other and rooms are comfortable and nice and the food is good we enjoyed the dinner and the breakfast and had variety of vegetarian food..... And the the hotel has unique beauty and will come again definitly

Everything is good in this hotel the view is good mainly the rooms location is also the service is good the food is good and the staff is very good helpful and doing their job very well.. The atmosphere and environment is awesome and we are lucky to be in this hotel we will always remember it for ever...

This is a very very unique hotel from all the hotels that I visited a in Sri Lanka th erooms are gorgeous and the food is very very delicious and has variety of choice ...The beach is very clean...... The pools are also very big and awesome ....We will definitely visit this hotel again....

We enjoyed our stay here. The service is very nice and food wise we had a limited choice because we a re vegetarians and the place is very nice ....the environment is very nice and the staff is very polite and we definitely we will come back to this hotel again

This is a beautiful very very gorgeous hotel.... The staff is very very good excellent service...... Nice rooms and room service and the food is very delicious the reception is also good and we enjoyed our time at the appolo bar we played housy over there.. The view is also good we enjoyed the sun set...

Lovely service with superb hospitality. We came here with our Japanese group and we had a great service. Excellent food. Specially mention gamini, praveen and thushara, they are look after my group. We will come back to here with more groups.. I would like to recommend this place...

My friend and I spent 3 days at this resort room and pools are beautiful Wonderful 3 day relax at the end of 14 days in Sri Lanka Only complaint was that seafood , beef and pork were overcooked in the Cafe

This is our second time here, the staff are consistent in their courteous costumer service. Location & view brilliant. I thought the 0.97m pool was ideal for families with little kids like mine. Very safe and lot of fun (there is a separate deep pool, a second pool and even a jacuzzi if you like) Food. Wow. My wife loves the baked cheese cake which is possibly the best in SL. Facilities. Its endless. We thoroughly enjoyed the games room. But the best part for me still is the staff. Friendly & constantly checking whether we are ok and enjoying. Specially wish to note Anushkaa from the restaurant who was so nice to us and was so good in looking after the little children which was a homely touch of hospitality. Much appreciated. Supuni at reception also served us very well. Brilliant ! Thanks. Weak point :- the Google maps/navigation didn't tag the hotel properly. It lead us up a wrong road (since we travelling at night)we were mislead by it.

Property : Beautiful architecture, bright outdoor spaces and two amazing swimming pools and a useless beach. Rooms: Needs an upgrade to the really bad lighting system. Rooms are very dark and not at all child friendly. Beds are comfy n pillows are great. Room cleanliness is not all satisfied. Cigarette hash underneath the bed looks as if it had not been cleaned for ages. Food: The Salads are not at all up to the standard. Soup was a good start. Main course buffet was a bit messed up. Potatoes burnt while the cuttle fish left raw n the crabs too sweet n also uncooked for dinner. Lunch was way better. The positive point is that the staff after informing made us an ala carte dish of crabs and prawns and it was amazing. Desert was spot on delicious. Variety was also another plus point. Staff: The happy smiling faces and welcoming gestures by the overall staff make you want to come back again to this property. Thanks to Mr Thushara the Food manager and the head Chef and also all the other staff for making our stay a pleasant one. We look forward to coming back to heritance Ahungalla with a better expectation. Imran Hinghora

We came here with my friends. With amazing service here, we are really surprised. Staff always smiling and very helpful.... we always prefer this property that because of the service.... had a very delicious food in every meal.... defernitly we are come back....

Very good ambience very good staff... service is also good so far ....the rooms are also nice ... they were clean and has a great view..the food is alright loved the vegetarian food here..... the dessert was also nice and some of it had very similar taste to india cusine.... we will definitly fome back to this lovely hotel...

Excellent service from smiling & happy staff in all parts of the resort. Stunning sunset views from pool & beach. 4 Restaurants and 5 Bars and a 24hr coffee shop. A must do value for money destination when in southern Sri Lanka. All round rating - 5 stars !!!

This is an outstanding resort. All the friendly staff have gone out of the way to make sure my stay has been flawless. Beautiful pool, great range of restaurants and spotless room. Nice selection at the breakfast or dinner buffets and a good a la carte too.

This hotel is opulent. Staff are fantastic go out of their way to assist very friendly.Food great, pools divine and the rooms luxurious. Cheaper to stay than you would think. Can difinetely recommend .

It was such a wonderful day at hotel Heritance Ahungalla. Had a wonderful time. Excellent customer service. Buffet was soooo good. Atmosphere was wonderful. Hope to come back soooooon :).............. We enjoyed it alot here others should visit tooooo

Nice hotel but need to improve on food I suppose. Food at heritance used to be superb but I did not feel that today. Anyway hotel is maintained at same superb standards.rooms are good and the service standards of staff are good.

Located not too far from Colombo and gives you a great view of the beach from the get go. The hotel itself is very nice with a spacious pool facing the beach. The food had a lot of variety and were nicely prepared and well presented. The staff were polite and accommodating. Had a great overall experience throughout the day and would be back again for a longer stay for sure. Highly recommended for a beachfront getaway within only a couple of hours drive from Colombo!

We were only here for the day, but it was a truly memorable experience. The food was delicious, the staff were friendly and super helpful and the hotel was amazing. Everyone had a wonderful time. Hope to return soon! :)

Room no 333 Is superb n fantastic view ...there service was fantastic. We visited in second time.still they are maintaining the service. The food was superb and more variety. Even we like two pools.we will come back. I would like to mention wasitha in front cashier. Good luck .

My wife and I absolutely loved our experience here. The staff, especially the pool attendant, and was great extremely receptive to our requests. The food was great as well. We'd highly recommend it and are looking forward to coming here again on our next vacation.

Great place to stay with an excellent location and fantastic food. The rooms are well kept. The staff is very friendly. Praveen delivered a classy service . I would highly recommend this beautiful hotel to anyone.

A beautiful hotel with an excellent location. The rooms are immaculate and the service was outstanding. Praveen made sure that our all needs and wants were fulfilled. Would highly recommend it to anyone and will visit again in the future.

Played here for a destination wedding and this was by far one of the best resorts I've visited. Service is outstanding. The food is out of this world for all you seafood lovers. Surely wanna return for a vacation. Highly recommend you guys visit this resort. You won't be disappointed.

Fantastic Experience right from the time you drive in, to when you are greeted by the staff to when you are taken to your room and when you get to see the breathtaking view of the ocean. Simply outstanding. The place is designed very well by renowned architect Geoffrey Bawa, blending the outside with the inside elements. Really brings in a whole of freshness. To top it all, the staff are very warm, friendly and helpful. A really hospitable team who make it a point to personalise their connect with the guest. Instantly makes you feel at home. I am glad this is my first place of stay in Sri Lanka, as it has made it a lasting memory. However, it has definitely raised the bar high for what is to come next. This place is a must experience.

We checked into the most beautiful five star hotel in southern province. Staff is very friendly. Food is tasty n upto standards. Rooms are spacious. ^-^; -)..... Pool is nice restaurant is amazing...... one of the product of Geoffrey bawa.

We really love yo come heritance ahungalla. Because of the service and food. Reception and the restaurant staff is very polite and helpful.....they are very professional.... I can recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to relax the holiday....

Good food. Being conscious of halaal range, the choices were lovely at dinner time and the lunch menus were enioyable. Rooms are cosy & the lovely staff make up for everything. Pool is great but the wide access to the beach is more enoyable. Enjoying the sea view from the balcony. Dont miss it.

We had an awesome time with our Friends. Best things about this hotel is the nice pool. Food was average. Received an excellent service from the entire staff. I would recommend this hotel for a nice relaxing stay.

I entered the hotel with a lot of hesitation....wasn't sure what to expect especially since I was confident that the photographs on the web were like most hotels an exaggeration...playing with the lights and angles. But was pleasantly surprised. The hotel is nothing fancy it is simple with polite and forever smiling staff. In fact since we had booked on line for sea facing room...but our confirmation did not mention anything so I had called them in advance requesting for sea facing room ... When we reached the hotel not one question or excuse given ... only request was to wait till rooms got ready as we were early. The staff at the restaurants were extremely nice and pampered you like you were the only one there...but be careful of what you're eating...one of the days they offered us some snacks at the bar ... But the snacks were infested with red ants they had to change the snacks three times before we were given non red ant / non infested snacks. Now to the room....they were brilliant...big comfortable rooms with equally big balcony and for view we had the trees / pool beach and the unending Indian Ocean...loved the view .... This hotel would get 5 stars only for its view. ... The ants ate away a star. We had shortlisted the heritance and jet wings light house ...am so happy we picked this one...totally worth it. Thank you for the super hospitality. Highly recommended.

It was great to be back at my favorite beach resort Heritance Ahungalla with my family members. Very relaxing and comfortable stay. All 3 rooms were upgraded and had a stunning view of the ocean on the 3rd floor. Staff was very friendly and courteous. Had a nice time overall and wish to be back here soon.

All around..... Rooms, Service and Food/Beverages have never let me down for years. Staff has been very helpful and friendly. I recommend staying for atleast two nights. The two pools are great and it's a very kids and family friendly hotel.

The hotel is a bit dated but comfortable Staff are excellent Special note to the housekeeping who are always obliging The meals were excellent ant the restaurant staff were always willing to go the extra mile The restaurant manager ,Nihaal and all the staff go out of their way to ensure our needs are met

We have visited to the Heritance Ahungalla on Sunday afternoon with my family. We have reserved 3 dbl rooms for a night. We had a chance to get a room with sea view. Room was very comfortable & they have provided tea/coffee making facilities at the room. Other than that there was a mini bar in the room as well. Food was AWSOME & had lot of varieties in all menues. Staff was really HELPFUL & FRIENDLY. free wi-fi available through out the hotel where as we didn't had that opportunity in other hotels we visited. This was our BEST Resort experience in down south. Simply Excellent Property with LOVELY team... Highly recommended for others to have a visit in your life time.

At this resort we were made to feel like special guests and how we miss being there, this was easily our best Resort experience in Sri-Lanka. The Management and Staff were excellent and they went out of their way to ensure that everything was perfect for us. We had every need taken care of and more. Having been in other resorts around the world this was easily our very best experience and i wouldn't hesitate to recommend and go back there anytime i visit Sri-Lanka. Well done guys. The meals, and accommodation at top notch, you'd be hard pressed to find another resort that offers so much value and service, not only is it beautiful to look at but the people are genuine and we had an awesome time.

Just a beach hotel, huge, comfortable, a lot of services available, but nothing special or memorable being worth for coming here again. Ah yes, one architect detail: an old construction elevator is still on site as a part of the finished building:-)

Our room was sweet, we got a complimentary upgrade. Spacious room, lovely sea view. Room a little old, could do with a bit of a spruce up. Poolside and beach were very quiet, got a sun bed every day. The "beach boys" were quite annoying and pushy but on the last day we bought something from the ladies and gave them some of our stuff, they are poor so appreciated it. Weather in late April Was ok, very very very hot, slightly cloudy, a little rain. Beach was beautiful but didn't venture into the rough sea. Stayed on the hotel complex as it's a little out. Food was ok, nothing special but staff really helpful. 4 days was perfect wouldn't do anymore. All in all a lovely stay just could do with an update.

At from the begining it was great hospitality, help and the kindess of the staff was real 5 star.they were so kind to my twin baby boys(2.5 yers) which helpss me a lot to take care the kids and they enjoyed very much.also the beach environment, the pool, foods were extremly good. I was here with my family during my holiday, all i got to say is food is superb. great view of the pool, rooms are excellent. Overall the hotel is superb for a holiday !! I will definitely come back here !

Me and my family visited for a quiet visit since we wanted to be away from the busy city. We were warmly welcomed and staff were very friendly and helpful. The rooms were spacious and clean and comfortable. The buffets were great with a lot of variety and the restaurant staff too very attentive. At night there is a live music by a man with a saxaphone and it was truly a novel experience. I loved every bit of my stay and I would recommend it to anyone who is seeking a peaceful escape.

We visited this hotael for one week after doing safaris just to relax. I must say its been one of the stays that gave me very mixed feelings at the beginning. The hotel looks quote nice and delivered excellent quality in foods, the rooms are clean. Even though the hotel puts a lot of effort in pest control we had a bug problem in our room on the first day. After mentioning this our room was gladly upgraded and the previous room closed for very thorough treatment. It is always possible to have something like this when traveling to tropic countries. But we didn't experience any more problems after that. The hotel more then compensated our discomfort and that says a lot about how they want you to feel after your visit. If you're afraid of bugs its always better to get a room on higher floors. The food was of good quality, also the drinks. The main dining area didn't feel very cosy to us but this is easily solved by eating outside in the garden. Also try the vegetable pati for snack, its awesome. The chef showed us around the kitchen (we made mention something was labeled as vegetarian which contained fish) but they took this small mistake (we saw it before eating) very serious. They showed us around in the kitchen which also was very clean and they also have a small atelier where the do food / sugar sculpting of which they won many international awards. It's a shame they didn't give this more attention in the hotel. The garden has nice areas to sit but we were confronted with another pest the hotel was working very hard to control, local sales men. The beach is public and the sales men bite hard and don't let go. For us this proved to be very irritating since they sometimes became really aggressive (I almost got in a fight with one of them after I didn't agree on a price he started calling me out, even when I was further on the hotel grounds). A mention to management about this and since then we saw police patroling the beach. Notice that you'll have this problem at any hotel because all beaches are public. This hotel at least tries very hard not to let this be a negative factor for their guests. So in short the hotel is good with the potential to become awesome. There are a lot smaller details (as everywhere) they can still improve on, but never have I been to a hotel that was so eager to get feedback from their guests and implement it. Just make sure to talk to them if something is bothering you and they will be very grateful and make sure you walk out with a good experience. Don't just put it on TripAdvisor after you go. Maybe we had a bit of Murphy at our side during our stay but the hotel and very friendly crew and management went out of their way to make our stay memorable and they did in spades!

Checked in for staying the night. The staff were very courteous and helpful. Rooms are well furnished especially luxury suite with a Jacuzzi ( there was a trouble using it because of a technical failure nevertheless) and tv area with comfy sofas. Food was good, scrumptious and tasty. Fruit baskets to the room and evening refreshments with delicacies. I think one cannot forget the fantastic view by the sea and two charming pools. Enjoyable stay. :-)

Lovely hotel, very friendly staff, good food with lots of variety and quality. The chefs wanted to cook special food, they cooked us Tuna, king prawn curry. The rooms were very clean and serviced daily. Would highly recommend the hotel

Great property and a wonderful Hospitality, had fun time with with family, amazing pool with a sea view access.. Highly recommended for people travelling to Bentota.. Rooms are comfortable and cozy, food is good enough.. Staff is highly cooperative

A place definitely to be to feel the life of relaxation. You want to relax come down to heritance ahungalla... Excellent food...Excellent service...No word's to describe about this 5 star... Do visit and feel the sea fragrance...
