The first thing that hits you is the chaos that reigns at the reception. It takes 30 mins to check us in . We were desperate for lunch.So at 2.30 the coffee shop seemed like a good option. But instead of quick service we were greeted by rude staff and poor service. The rice n curry we ordered was cold. Took them 25 mins to serve cold food. They did try n make up for it at their main restaurant. We were told "you just name it and we will make it". The buffet spread is vast.Vegetarian dishes they are yet to master.what they cook up as Indian fare falls woefully short.A quick rethink is needed here. Being a resort by the sea side, Heritance could have been exciting but alas the only thing that they provide is the sea! No water sports.No beach based activity. The staff is overworked. Its a mela out there. Bentota could be a better option with many hotels and resorts to choose from.Also it is the hub for water sports.

Heritance Ahungalla would be a great location for a couples retreat, provided they make a few improvements. The hotel is situated in a slightly secluded area (15-20 minutes away from Galle city), is a heart-warming relic of colonial era architecture, and has a marvelous private beach and other relevant amenities. However, it can become even better if the service quality is improved. I had a bitter experience checking in as I waited for almost half an hour before anyone attended me, and even then it took the staff forever to complete the formalities. One would generally expect the staff of a 5-star hotel to be more competent and efficient. Moreover, the staff seemed confused when I asked them for advice on travelling around Galle. I stayed in a twin sharing room (I was there on a conference). While the room was nice, the bathroom seemed a little worn down and I felt needed to be revamped.

Great atmosphere and food... love the place.... nice place to be with your loved ones and cherish the moment..great hide out in the south coast.... many activities to do in terms of Tennis, TT, Billiard etc. ..truly great......

We spent 2 nights at the heritance ahungalla and we had a wonderful stay. Beginning with the heartwarming welcome to the beautiful clean definite 5 star worth room with a nice view on the "blue pool area" it all turned out to be even much more beautiful than we expected. Beds: comfortable, clean, large enough to get a nice sleep Room: deluxe room with balcony nice and clean Bathroom: djungle shower!! :) very modern and all in top quality Room service: very helpful, fast and accurate Pool: perfectly temperature and clean The best at the end: The food: what a big choice, changing daily, fresh fruits, several different meals in best quality, rich in diversity, grilled seafood, fresh fish, curries .... See for yourself - we loved it and already miss it !!!!! If we ever return to Sri Lanka, we stay here again Martin/Christina from Munich Nov 2015 Ps: written in English so that anybody can read it ;)

This is the one of the best hotels I have visited recently... the food here is very delicious and has variety of food and i loved mainly the sri lanka food ...the taste is truly authentic and of very high standards and I have to thank the chefs of this hotel a lot the service and the staff is also excellent...the rooms are also good ..I recommend this hotelbti everyone...

loved our stay here... we had a perfect relaxing family vacation thanks to hesitance.. just didn't want to leave the property!! we arrived little late in the night and ordered burgers for everyone.. the hotel was generous enough by not charging us for the meals,since we had opted for buffet dinner in our bookings... it was sweet of them to do that!! must try is the colorado bulldog cocktail in the ac bar (i think it is called bacchus bar..not sure)..!! no frills in decor.. but great ambience to chat and sip your alcohol ;) the breakfast has a HUGE variety of live preparations option.. if u are a non veggie, then its like heaven.. but despite being vegetarian, i enjoyed the fruits, the dosai, the breads and muffins... would request them to add something more indian veg in their menu.. the swimming pool is HUGE and beautiful... the hotel boasts of 2 pools.. the spa personnel were very sweet to help us with our queries... the rooms are huge, bed quality is excellent.. the bathroom is decent.. however, i wish their toiletries were better. they were a major disappointment. The library is the far more organised and beautiful set up i have come across.. if u want to read in peace, this is it!! the beach is at your footstep... neat beach... my family had a super time!! cultural evenings are organised on weekends and its a nice experience.. we found many foreigners in the hotel and ended up being friends with few...!! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for chilling your brains... time away from work/stress and rejuvenating yourself... it is a 2 and half drive from the colombo airport.. you are indulge in mangrove river safari and water sports nearby... bentota is just 20 min away.. enjoy!!

It is a good beach front property but it needs renovation rooms are quite old furniture is old and there is a particular wet Smell from the rooms that comes all the time,though plus points are that staff is courteous and is always ready to help food is good with a huge spread and very nice swimming pools with a jacuzzi as well.overall a very ok experience for the price paid.

This is a beautiful hotel with fantastic views and pools. A really amazing place to stay with family or in a couple. The rooms are all different and beautiful. A fantastic place to relax at and a must to visit if you come to Sri Lanka. Food is great too!

A great relaxing stay in a great hotel. The pools are amazing and what's needed on a hot Sri Lankan day and the sea is just on the door step. The food is great. So far only the dinner buffet but that was a winner. Nothing is too much effort for the staff.

Superb food and nice stay here. Pools are awesome. Friendly staff specially Nadeesha. She helped to login to wifi. Beach is also very nice. Staff is really helpful. Love the scenery surrounded by the beach. Rooms are also awesome. Can stay for more than a week with the same kind of interest. Reckon for anybody to come and have a nice stay

One of the best hotels i have ever been & such a wonderful place to stay ! ! ! Very professional and a friendly staff.I enjoyed the excellent buffet...Nice rooms and very calm beach.View was really nice from my room and i enjoyed my stay to the maximum.

Very beautiful hotel which has unique location facing the sea and beautiful private beach and design of the pool is extraordinarily I do recommend this hotel also the staff of the hotel is very friendly and has generous hospitality and wonderful smile. This hotel is excellent option for honeymooners and any one who has special anniversary.

This hotel us truly beautiful and fabulous out of all the Geoffry Bawas hotels the rooms are good and the food is very delicious and the service and the staff is excellent and the service from the bell boy Amila to room boy Janaka to the receptionist Kaushalya everyone was truly kind and hospitable.. I recommend this hotel to everyone...

Great hotel with beautiful atmosphere! Was upgraded to a luxury suites! Rooms were great and the staff was very helpful as well. Loved the cocktails ,would definitely come back. have been to this hotel more than 3 times in the last 6 months. Would love to recommend to everyone.

Accidentally I pop in to the hotel I know since my childhood and the reception I got from the door step was truly awesome and people are very friendly and kind and I felt I am in my own home. Lunch @ Jute Resturent is delicious and again people in there are so helpful and so kind. Particularly Mr. Dayal, Mr. Lakmal and one gentleman from the kitchen were so grateful and felt they are so loyal to the job. I highly recommend this hotel for a visit and meet their friendly staff.

This hotel is very beautiful mainly because of its architecture and how beautifully the building blends with the nature ... The rooms and food are also of excellent quality ... Most of all the service they provide and the beautiful kind staff specially Dilashani and Kashalya ... Very beautiful hotel will visit again very soon...

Nice hotel with much adequate space.Food is excellent.It would have been much better if the service in the pool area was more efficient.Staff is very helpful.I should mention the name of the belboy amila who extended a great support to us during our stay.Hope to visit again in next vacation.

Wow it was a superb hotel. buffet was very good, every facility is available in this hotel. Room is beautiful.service is excellent. especially bell boy named amila from the reception very pleasant and helpful. He gave us a excellent service. For me it is the best beach hotel in Sri Lanka.

We had a suite overlooking the Green pool which was really nice and quiet. It is a good place to relax with beautiful surroundings and very nice beach. The room was clean but needs updating. The food was average but they had quite a variety at breakfast. We really enjoyed our night swim in the pool. I had booked a reflexology and was welcomed to the spa with delicious mint tea and coconut. The reflexology was really great. I would recommend this hotel for a nice relaxing stay.

Excellent hotel. Every facility is there. lovely environment, pool,buffet and room etc. the bell boy from reception named Amila was very helpful. his service was phenomenal. thank you heritance ahungalla for those beautiful vacation.

The atmosphere is very great and the rooms are also nice viewi and needs a little bit more cleaning ... The food is awesome... Variety of food too.... Entertainment wise this hotel is superb the live band and the music was great had a great time as a group will come back to this hotel again

Stayed at Heritance Ahangalla for 3 nights. The staff here had been awesome and very service oriented. Chef Thilakarathna in particular ensued that our special requests for veg food was met. Chef Dayanada was a great help and in the front office, Mr. Shreenath & Ms Ranisha went out of their way to accommodate our room requests. Other staff who were awesome are Anushka, prashant & Piumi, who made us feel very comfortable. Great place, great location, awesome food, good rooms, fantastic staff. But gym needs major improvement. Range of in-room toiletries could be improved.

We had an awesome weekend with my friends. Great food and hospitality. Attended us with care. Special regards to Shanika from customer relations and Gamini, the food and beverages manager. Recommend to any person looking for a relaxing weekend.

We enjoyed very well. Customer service is very good.and they are very helpfull. Rooms are cleaned and have enough space. We had awesome time. Nice place to spend our holidays. This is our second time.we will be back.

Very nice place to spend holuday with family and friend nice welcoming drink and l8vely staff rooms very clean and very nice food plapools vry clean and staffs are always smiling i enjoy every thing in this hotel and i will return back to spend another beautiful holiday

It was our third stay at the hotel. We travel quite frequently and stayed in 10-15 different hotels around Hikkaduwa, Benotota, Mirissa areas so far. I choose the hotel mainly because I knew what to expect and also did not want to disappoint guests who accompanied us during the visit. A good 4 star hotel with a good (not excellent) 4 star service this time around as well. Few suggestions that could further improve overall experience and ambiance/ We opted for a half board and where pretty happy with the spread and choices offered during the breakfast as well as dinner. Some dishes where quite good while others not that tasty. For example: morning porridge as well as a dinner soup where on a cold side. It looked like that the overall cleanness of rooms and hotel grounds (like last time, curtains where stained in the rooms; some trash scattered around till noon time and seeing hotel staff passing by and simply ignoring piece of dirty paper on the floor was quite annoying) were not on hotel's priority list. Not that bothersome but still somewhat uncomfortable smell in the main dining hall. Itâ€™s the â€œsmallâ€ details that could be improved with such a little effort and make overall experience so much more pleasant and comfortable.

The environment and the location and the surrounding is very beautiful and attractive.... The rooms are very comfortable and clean.... The food was excellent and there were many dishes the soup and the dessert was great.....the pools was big and beautiful... Will definitely come to this hotel again

I satyed one night with my family on october 27th. From the reservation untill checkout service was great. Really friendly staff.. Always attention what we need. This is truelly Sri Lankan hospitality..Wish them all the very best.. Keep it up.

This hotel is just perfect, staff extremely friendly, kind and will do anything to help you. Rooms are set in and around corridors but they are well equipped, we were lucky to have a lovely ocean view room. Food was fabulous, varied from the breakfasts to the special dinner they out on with cultural show, plentiful buffet choices with western and srinlankan cuisine. Pool was stunning, comfortable loungers and beach on your door step. An amazing hotel and would highly recommend staying, close to the turtle sanctuary, spice garden and other attractions.

A lovely place to unwind and relax after a busy visit to Sri Lanka. All the staff are extremely friendly and willing to help whenever we need them. The location by the beach is fantastic, and the infinity pool is amazing (especially at night with the lights and music). The rooms were also lovely with a fantastic view of the the beach. Would recommend this hotel to anyone who visits Sri Lanka. Well worth a visit.

Its a good place to relax ...and the environment and the atmosphere here is so awesome and relaxing.... The food taste great .... And specially the desserts tasted even great.... My kids had a great time here tooo the pool was awesome ..must to visit hotel recommend it to others toooo

We had wonderful time at Heritnce Ahungalla with my family.... The service was good and all the staff members were very helpful .... The atmosphere and the environment is very beautiful and relaxing it is great ......the food was good..... We will come to this hotel again...

The rooms are not clean I had upgraded to deluxe ocean view Wood floor has dust paint very dirty you don't want walk on it. Old furniture the floor is old not polished scratched. The lamps are really old. The hotel is very old This my last stop in Sri Lanka out of all the hotel this the worst I would not recommend this to anyone.

We came here for a vacation with my family cousins from the US and from the UK. A fantastic atmosphere for a holiday. The food was so delicious with different varieties and the service from the hotel staff is so attractive and they are very kind. One of the best place for a vacation.

Lovely venue. Food is perfect. Service is remarkable. I would love to have more sports here. The boy Amila Thilakaratne whom assisted us during our stay was very hospital and helpful.overall a lovely place for leasure.

Good hotel, excellent food and 5 star service. Staff was very attentive and caring. Got upgraded to a suite. Specially Amila Thilakarathne who went out of his way to.make our stay a special one. Nice location facing the beach.

We had a lovely time in heritance with lovely service and best food... Buffet restaurant staff was excellent service providing..... Special mention uncle praveen. He is really good.. Definitely we will come back and I will recommend to my friends.......

Exceptionally beautiful hotel design and location and Everything was good..great selection of food in the restaurant.Room service was much better but limited selection....Geoffery Bawa's infinity pool was amazingly beautiful..........

Excellent condition. Quick service. Friendly persons, waiters and every one. There are two pools 1.Green pool 2. Main pool. Excellent view with other hotels and the beach. Very beautiful hotel.Good hotel come enjoy get the full services and come again.

We came hete with my family... We are very happy with service and delicious food here... I would like to mention uncle praveen in restaurant, he is very helpful..... We had a many varieties of ice cream. I will recommend this hotel to my school friends as well....

Amazing hotel by the beach and the food was amazing. The view from the room is also great and the pool and all its activities kept us entertained all weekend. The night club and the music was great too. The game room has a nice pool table that we all enjoyed playing and the lovely library with books and the gym were all great. We had a wonderful time but we didn't have enough time to do everything so we are sure we will come back.

Very excellent service they are very kind they treat us very well again we aill try to come to the hotel we enjoy very well. The food is very taste. We thank you to caring us very very well. Thank you for everything

A very warm, welcoming, beautiful resort. Our family spent 6 nights at the Heritance and will more than likely book again for the location and price. We booked online for a suite at a really good rate. As there was no way to book a luxury suite, we were hoping to be upgraded at checkin. As we are a large family, the benefit of the luxury suites 2 bathrooms would have been great. Unfortunately there were no luxury suites available when we arrived. Our room was clean and comfortable. We did notice the shower/bath combo would not drain properly and also collected a lot of water on the tubs edges which would spill onto the floor. We made do with towels placed in strategic locations. The food was very good and we absolutely loved the huge swimming pool. We even swam during a thunder shower. The location served as a great base to see all of the other sites Sri Lanka had to offer. Every staff member from the waiters, to the lifeguards, to the lovely gift shop employee was fantastic. Our kids were treated to a magic show, played pool and foosball, and loved the way our towels were folded into different animals upon arriving back to our room each night. Great stay!

Excellent service and great hospitality you provided all the way..... thank you do much for giving nice rooms with a lovely view. We feel like home away from home.. food was fantastic.... we will recommend...

We were there on the 23rd October and when we're having bf in between of our bf we were asked to get up because the place was reserved for a foreigner. Then we asked a glass of water and the hostess denied that too. Her name was anuskha. When asked her for apologies she dint even do that . So I warn some indians going there no proper bf dinner also available for indians . No action was taken after I complained the management too.

Most friendly and convieninet hospitality was rendered at congenial time .food and beverages also with a wide range of perferences.when its come to the relaxing u will feel that ur in feethers wings .games and dj also quite admirable however the assitance and guidence always exceeds the expectations

I stayed in 3 resorts during my previous visit to sri lanka and i have to say, heritance was the most relaxing one. Good View, food and service. Rooms were really good too! I've been to lanka a couple of times and heritance is definitely a place I'll be visiting again.

The hotel staff the best so far of all hotels we stayed. Always ready to cater to all demands a with a smile.would surely come again and will recommend to to friends. with.... Excellent rooms having a panoramic view.... An with all possible facilities one can think of...

The hotel is very nice, the rooms is good and clean, the people is very nice and helpful, very nice pool, the bofe is very good and place is very nice. This is my honeymoon and I high recommend the hotel.

Had a great weekend..offers a variety of great food;both local and foreign.staff is always so warm and welcoming,attentive and caring..has great facilities and offers many leisure and pastime activities to get along;such as table tennis,tennis,volleyball,badminton,a gym..etc..hotel aurroundings and amenities are highly commendable...0

One of the many Geffrey Bava specular hotels!! A perfect beach hideout that radiates good vibes of serenity and a stress free environment. The three nights we stayed were full of Sri Lankan and Heritance hospitality that surpassed all expectations. The relax atmosphere and the Indian Ocean setting was a perfect holiday and a perfect break from the realities of the real world. Thank you staff for your graciousness and charming smiles.

So we came to this hotel to enjoy our vacation on a beach surrounding.....as we entered we felt a unique experience from this hotel of its architecture..... room fascilities are good and the view toooo as we expected.... there is so much of variety. ... specially sea food.....we will definitly visit again to this hotel in our next vacation....

The atmosphere and the surrounding the environment and the beach is extraordinary ... The rooms are clean.....The food is very tasty and loved the dessert.... The staff are very friendly and good and the service is excellent..... The pools are very beautiful... Must to visit hotel....

I have visited this hotel with my family & my staff. I'm giving this rating, strictly for the superb service offered by the HERITANCE STAFF. I was truly stunned of the QUALITY OF SERVICE. Mr. LAKMAL @ the main restaurant offered an OUTSTANDING SERVICE, not only for us but also for all the people who dined at the Restaurant. He is a DIAMOND for the hotel. He was everywhere satisfying the customers. He has offered a personalised service for everyone. It's like having a personal Butler. Mr. Praveen also did a good job. Mr. CHAMILA who worked for the Dinner Service on 23rd October'15 & Breakfast Service on 24th was absolutely fantastic. He was working really hard to satisfy the customers. Miss.MADHUBHASHINI & Miss.ANUSHKA were SUPERB.Though They were working tirelessly to satisfy the customers they were full of Smiles. That's a Wonderful quality I really appriciate. Me, my family & my staff have thoroughly enjoyed some tasty Hoppers which were made by Ms.RANJANI & Ms.CHANDRANI. They were handling the Uppers counter effortlessly. HOPPERS were the ONLY FOOD I've enjoyed here. Overall food were NOT SATISFYING & NOT UP TO THE STANDARD. Room which I've stayed with my family, Room No.345 was badly needing a refurbishment as well as the whole hotel. The TV was not working properly. Actually the lodging also was not up to the standards. Though we made the booking before almost TEN MONTHS ago & clearly mentioned about the kids we are having, they offered me a room far far away from the main restaurant. I was told that room was really good & promising, but it WAS NOT. Truly I wouldn't be thinking of coming here again. But I hope the SERVICE the staff offered will make a difference in my mind. Mr. LAKMAL Mr. CHAMILA Mr. PRAVEEN Miss.MADHUBHASHINI Miss. ANUSHKA Ms. CHANDRANI Ms. RANJANI Thank You All for your Kind, Graceful, Helpful & OUTSTANDING SERVICE!!!

Its a great place to visit with the friends to enjoy the natural surrounding and to taste delicious foods with variety of choice..... Had a great time at the lovely pool and the room was clean and had very beautiful view......I will.definitely come to this hotel again....

Excellent Buffet. Friendly staff.Nice rooms with a mini bar with all the requirements. Beautiful surroundings and a great place to relax on the beach.Good variety of food. Excellent service. Can enjoy since they have range of sports activities as well.

My first impressions about the hotel was really good and the food is delicious and variety of choice..... the rooms is clean and quiet and the view is very good it took my heart away........ the staff and the service wish very impressive and definitely I will return to this hotel again.......

I had a great time at this hotel..... the riins are excellent and the food is delicious..... the pools were great the staff and the service here is excellent......had a great time will definitely come to this hotel again and I will recommend this hotel to others as well........

Excellent food ....thank you so much for giving unforgetable service with special care....staff is suoerb. Room are very clean. From arrivsl to departure we had a great service.. Thank you once again for the heritance ahungalla staff...

Wonderful place to stay and enjoy the weekend with your loved ones. Nice customercare service along with nice staff. Rooms are nice and the view is unmatchable ..... Food is also great. I recommend this hotel to others too.

Awesome atmosphere to stay and good customer care service.there is a helpful staff at this hotel.....the rooms are clean and the fasiclities are excellent toooo..... The water bottles are too small in the room...food was very delicious i enjoyed the dessert alot.... The service is excellent... I highly recomend to this hotel to others as well.....

Everything is perfect ............great location with beautiful beach and in the evening you can see beautiful sunset... Good food and friendly staff......this is our 2nd visit. We will definitely recommend to our friends..............

This is one of exciting experience had out of all my trips I had so far .... Amazing staff support . We also had a friend and his family with us in this trip in fact they have just visited US just before this visit . This resort and the service of the staff could excite them like any thing. The staff are supportive to the extend that we have missed out our camera cover some where and forgot about that , but they came to us and said we have missed it out and asked us to pick from the reception. The food is another reason why should visit again to this restaurant. Specifically one Ms.Shanika among the staff supported us out of her way and we recommend this hotel to everyone without any hesitation and this is a real memorable experience in our trips.

We are really happy to see one of the greatest product of bawa in Sri Lanka. Room is excellent and spacious. Staff us very friendly and helpful...... My kids enjoy two swimming pools......beach is nice and clean......food is tasty.......we will be back.

This us my first time to heritance ahungalla, we had a lovely Beach dinner in the beach with my friends. Excellent tied with lots of varieties..... staff gave us a good service with extra care.... thank you for everyone..........

They have wide variety of foods.. And Service is also nice... It has a nice beach view from the lobby also the rooms. We will come back again to visit this beautiful resort. .............thank you for everything......................................

We arrived here nearly a week ago to torrential rain. This is the end of the monsoon season in this part of the island. First impressions of the hotel were lovely. The staff are what makes this hotel a pleasure to stay in. We were shown to our room which was a little dated but clean and cool. The rain Showers in the room are great and the shower gel smells of a tropical fruit sensation. Food here is amazing. The head chef Manjua runs a great team of chefs who are more than happy to cook you what you like if what's on offer isn't to your taste. They sure know how to make curries here. You must try every single one as they are divine. Our ever expanding waistlines are proof of this. There is plenty more on offer if curries are not your thing. A myriad of fresh fruit is available and bananas taste amazing, nothing like what we eat at home. The weather was good most days. Towards the early evening rain clouds gather and a heavy downpour follows. Perfect time for a G&T at the pool bar. Sunsets are incredible and worth waiting around to see. The beach is vast and deserted. Just a few hotel guests walking along taking in it beauty. There are however beach guys who nag the pants off you to sell you sightseeing trips. Be aware they usually don't have insurance so best to book with a reputable company. They are harmless just a few no thank you and they get the message. There are a group of ladies who sell sarongs and trinkets on the beach they are lovely and friendly, don't forget to barter here, start low and then usually meet in the middle. Be careful of the sun you burn very quickly and don't forget mozzie repellant and bite cream. We used a guide for our trips LASI TOURS LASI was great and drove safely through the traffic which is another world in itself. He is very knowledgable and will arrange bespoke tours according to your needs. Sri Lanka is beautiful. Made even more special by its people. The temples, turtle sanctuaries, elephant retreats are fab. Unfortunately we didn't have enough time to see everything so a revisit will be on the cards. I hope you find this review of interest

i was with my wife in this hotel from 12/10 to 18/10 it was the best hotel i visit before ..very good service very friendly staff ...the food is good especially the sea food..just if you want go to this hotel need chose the best time for good weather ..i hope i will visit heritance ahungalla again we will miss this tme

Gorgeous hotel in the perfect location on the beach. It's in its own complex which gives the perfect amount of privacy, exactly what we were looking for after travelling around Sri Lanka. They presented us with a chocolate cake for my partners birthday, such a lovely gift. The staff are very helpful and the food is delicious. Hope to return again soon.

We have loved our time so far at Heritance, the staff are lovely and the hotel is equipped with everything you need for a great stay. Situated right on the beach makes for a beautiful setting, we are staying for 4 nights and would highly recommend longer.

A new experience, extraordinary and a classy hotel I'd say. The service staff is very good and kind...... The rooms Service is good and friendly..... The rooms are of very good quality and clean we played cricket had some fun here too the pools were great too.... I hope to visit back.......

The environment and the surrounding in this hotel is brillient...... This hotel has a stadard reputation compared to other hotels.....The service was quite brillient and the staff is very friendly...... The food needs more variety of choice but the food was delicious.....hopefully we will visit this hotel again....

It was a good experience for us and the staff was very friendly and i will recommend this hotel to my other friends too.I visited here for the first time and the service which was given to us was nothing less than fabulous I'd say and I hope to visit back here with my family.

Hotel surrounding and hotel's envirnoment is very good Staff is very cooperative. But need to improve the quality and variety vegetarian food so that vegetarians can feel more comfortable ....the rooms are very good standard very clean... definitely we will recoded it to others good hotel

Great place to stay with the best hospitality you could ever receive. The staff were friendly and were willing to go beyond their call of duty to serve customers. Excellent amenities which includes a clean pool, a pool side bar, gym and extra activities such as beach volleyball, tennis and cycling. Our room had a balcony facing the beach so we were able to enjoy the sun rise in the mornings. We celebrated two birthdays during our stay. The hotel staff arranged a cake within a very short notice and delivered it on time. I would really recommend this place for the warm and pleasant hospitality.

We have been coming to this hotel since the day it started and surrounding and the environment is emaculately clean the beach is very clean and the hotel is beautiful when you drive inside.....the area flows with fresh air...the food was very tasty... chef pujitha, majula are ever willing to help you with your needs...we are very happy to find halal food.Ranisha and thusara from the reception were very helpful not for getting the rooms boys and others all very helpful ...we will keep coming over and over again...

Must try Chef Manjula's seafood platter and executive Pravin's hospitality ,kindness and efficiency.. Srilanka hospitality at its best!!!!!! Two beautiful swimming pools one feels like it's an extension of the sea. The architecture is Jeffrey Bawa's and it's sprawling without giving a concrete look. nature had been unhindered.

Lovely hotel designed by Geoffry Bawa. With beautiful spacious rooms. The hotel staff are friendly and are always around to help with a smile. The food is splendid and up to international standards. The hotel staff work tirelessly until your requests or suggestions are met and you get a very personalised memorable experience with your stay. Will visit this hotel again.

one of the best five star hotels in Sri Lanka...... food is fantastic with lots of vertices. two swimming pools are very clean and beautiful.... staff is very helpful. specially at the front desk..... rooms are very clean. definitely we will be back......

What a simply awesome place. The scenery, the rooms, the pools, the bars, the food - they were all top notch. The buffet was different every day so you didn't get bored. Best of all however were the staff which were the friendliest I have encountered. Well worth a visit.

An excellent hotel with plenty of amenities to keep everyone occupied. Great swimming pools, bars, gym and restaurants. The food was amazing and the outlook to the lovely beach is worth the visit. The staff at the hotel were extremely friendly and attentive and treated us like VIP's. Definitely coming back.

We enjoy the visit ...its full of enjoyment and the service was very very good and helpfull We have a really good time The food were delicious ..the room view is breath taking on the beach The always clean

The environment and the surrounding is great had a great day out with my friends ...the.food.was great.... the rooms were good.too.... enjoyed the tea and coffee offered .... the staff and the service is excellent... I recomend this hotel ......

Great service and a good hotel. May need to invest some thoughts on replacing the toilet fittings since some seemed old but functioning. Overall good and can be recommended to anyone. Food was good and front desk was very helpful. Good follow up on any matters discussed at the time of checking in

We are glad that we selected "Heritance Ahungalla" for our honeymoon stay.. We arrived a bit late, but the staff at reception was very helpful. The gentleman who checked us in understood our tiredness as we were exhausted after an eventful day. We were offered with nice cool fruit juice as we were filling the check-in forms. As requested, they offered us a nice room with a clear view of the sea. We were given wifi access immediately and internet was fast and stable. Staff at the restaurant was very friendly and energized to serve us, regardless we were the last to enter the restaurant for the dinner. Because we were very tired, we were the last to leave the restaurant after breakfast and lunch as well, but I can clear say that either you come first or last you will be greeted and treated with same fresh smiles and same very friendly manner. Also, we were kindly informed that they will be closing the buffet soon and if we were like to be served anything else before they do so. Really appreciate that. As we were on honeymoon, we were suprized with nice decorated cake before the breakfast. Thank you very much for that... The pool is the main attraction of this marverllous hotel, the large pool near the beach is a place that you can never get enough of.. Finally, the check-out process was fast and easy without waiting for anything.. We were gifted with bottles of water for our journey in a nice little bag made from 100% recyced items.. Looking forward to visit again...

*Nice and warm welcome to the hotel. Beautiful vieuw from the hotel lobby. *Our room whas on the ground floor with a nice terrace to sit outside. (Thanks to the gardner for the fresh flowers! *Room whas spacious and cleen, with comfortable beds and pillows. *the bathroom was nice with a good hairdryer and nice complementary soaps and such. Every day fresh towels and around 17u a new round of towels if you neededthem. *one downside to the rooms was the lightning.. it was a bit too dark. the pools where nice and refreshing. enough sunbeds for everybody with dry towels if you need them. *the beach whas nice with a stunning view. Unfortunately, the beach was often washed up with trash. *and also some lokals that were trying to sell some sun dresses. Thats fine by me, but they keep on calling you "madame madame". You have to be a bit harsh and say NO otherwise they keep on calling you. Hotel Security is strict and chase rhem when they get too pushy. When you have a sunbed against the pool you are fine. *The breakfast, lunch and dinner where so good. Everyday different and fresh choices. Also try their upper room dining! That was just excellent! (Not included in the all in package) we whould recommend this hotel to everybody! * be aware of the squirrels, they are verry friendly but they ate through my man's shirt to find some nuts in our bag ğŸ˜! *****

Beautiful hotel we had a woderful time in time .The hotel is perfect. Only one suggestion If u can include Indian Menu it will be great. The rooms are awasome especially with sea facing and pool facing.

We stayed her for 11 nights at the end of September to celebrate our 15th wedding anniversary and this was our third stay here. We were married here (when it was Triton) in 2000. The staff are extremely friendly and really do want to make sure every aspect of your stay is perfect. Iâ€™ve read some of the reviews about the food which seem overly critical but there is something for everyone. There are chefs on duty during breakfast, lunch and dinner and if you canâ€™t find something to suit your palate from the varied selection on offer â€“ just ask they would be more than happy to make arrangements for you. We were very well looked after from the moment we arrived. We had made a specific room request which was met and we werenâ€™t disappointed. We had a suite overlooking the Green (residents) pool which in our opinion is the quieter end of the hotel and this was important to us. The room was extremely comfortable, very clean and maintained twice a day (including turn down service) so fresh towels, water and anything you need is never too far away. I love the creations that the room staff make of towels and fresh flowers. During our stay we received a complimentary dinner in the fine dining restaurant. The chef on duty was TSM deSilva and it was an incredible culinary experience. All aspects of the meal were well flavoured and presented with such care. It was obvious to us that Chef de Silva has a passion for creating amazing flavours and he was keen to receive feedback on the dishes he creates and he chatted with us to make sure we were happy with all aspects of the fine dining experience. We enjoyed it so much we went back again during our stay and we werenâ€™t disappointed. The second meal was as incredible as the first. They have a lot of talented staff here at Heritance and together they make a great team. We were lucky enough to be given a tour of the kitchens and the Chocolate factory which was absolutely mind boggling. The creations they create have to be seen to be believed. Keep up the good work and please donâ€™t change too much of what makes this hotel a special place when you close for your next refurbishment (which we understand is due in 2016). The one thing I would say is if you are planning to stay here, all-inclusive does not include please and thank you to the staff. I was astonished at the attitude of some guests towards the staff â€“ as Iâ€™ve already mentioned the staff want to make your stay the best it can be â€“ saying please and thank to the staff does not cost you anything so remember to take your manners with you. Thank you to all the staff who looked after us so well. We canâ€™t wait to return again.

We came to spend the Sunday at heritance for a buffet and a swim. It was a beautiful experience as the staff were very friendly and helpful. Only drawback we came across is that there is no kids pool. Will surely come back again. Thank you for the awesome hospitality and pleasant experience.

I think this is the best hotel in the down south Sri Lanka best food nice view superb service staff I really think this is one of the best hotel in Sri Lanka and I should give a special thanks for the starff

Best hospitality so far from a five start hotel. The staff is exceptional . The food is good can do better. The rooms and other facilities are all good. The architecture of this hotel is a key factor and creates that ambiance for a relaxed getaway for anyone .

We (6 of us) chose Heritance Ahungala for our day out. It was a great experience for us, the hospitality provided to us by Ms. Raneesha was fantastic . She was very kind and Very helpful. As for the food we think it can do better and the varieties was poor and refilling of the buffet items was slaw.

I came here with my family. I'm really satisfied with here service. They have organised special birthday cake for my wife's birthday. I speciali mention guys how help us kk,praveen and chef pujitha... We will come back soon!!!!!@

Wonderful warm property. Plenty to do with a family. We were two families with 4 kids ranging from 5 to 12 years of age. The rooms are a touch old and lack contemporary furnishings. However, what the rooms lack was more than made up by the staff, who are fabulous. Anything you need is available or will be catered for. Nuwan and Ranisha deserve a special mention. Nuwan is the restaurant manager and Ranisha is at the front desk. That said somewhat unfair to not cite the warmth and customer centric nature of the rest of the staff, which was just as good The game room was fun for an afternoon when we were caught in the rain, though the kids club really needs a make over! Take the suite if with a family. Big rooms and really comfortable. All in all, we would recommend the property.

Had a really nice time at our vacation in this hotel and i must say overall it was a really pleasent experience. Nice food and the staff was really helpfull in attending to the needs.if you are planing a vacation here, well ur money is worth spending. All the best to the hotel and keep growing the positive momentum! Cheers!

Room was good however the television had to be changed 3 times. Food was avarage but a lot more room for improvement. Night club was also avarage however the collection of music could have been and it was empty.

Beautiful hotel and wonderful ambience. The view is breathtaking and the architecture of Geoffrey Bawa is stunning as always. But the stand out feature was the great staff and service. Special mention must go to Ranisha who was so friendly and helpful. Thumbs up!

Love the sri lankan food. Service was great and beach promises a lovely excursion. Rooms can be better. Had a great time and look forward to coming again once the renovation is complete! Very family friendly hotel.

Excellent hotel with elite service and very kind personnel. You will feel yourself pumped up by the service provided here. We arrived here at 9:00 a.m and got the room within an hour irrespective of the 2:00 p.m checking standard. Rooms are clean and nice with a good AC system. In room dining service was a good option after the long trip. There are no places to go and eat outside the hotel but most of the guests take All inclusive here and for BB plan we went to hotel restaurants with clean, tasty and good service. The best things we liked here were the ocean, green scenery and friendly personnel at the hotel. Special thank you to Ranisha and Thusara!

It was a 'wow' experience from the start! When myself & my wife arrived at the hotel, we were greeted warmly by the hotel staff & given refreshments, & started on the buffet (we were pretty hungry!). The buffet lunch was AMAZING! The variety of food was nothing short of exquisite, & the ambiance was perfect for a newly married couple in the dining area. The variety of food consisted of delicacies such as duck among so many others, & the desserts were absolutely delicious too! Afterward, we went to the beach, & I must admit that the view is awesome! Would I recommend this hotel to others? WITHOUT A DOUBT! It's an amazing experience that will never be forgotten! The friendly hotel staff even took some awesome photos of me & my wife, & I must admit that I felt very impressed with the quality & personality of the staff! This is definitely worth a visit. To all newly weds: your visit here will be memorable & mesmerizing, I can promise you without any biase.

I mean its amazing to stay there in Heritance Ahungalla Staff is very friendly Food is sooooo yummmmm I been to many different holidays resorts But never seen like here twice a day room cleaning Sea view from the room is so beautiful I mean ten out of ten going for this hotel When you be there you also enjoy it Like we enjoyed there

Having a superb stay.. The staff is very good and friendly. Food spread is also excellent. Both the swimming pools are superb and in good condition. Hoping to come again and enjoy. The room conditions are excellent. Had a great service from all the staff of the hotel.

This is an awesome beach property.. Great view and nice decor.. Staff are friendly..i think the only area of improvement would be on the menu.. Evrytime i needed to order for snacks (bites as they call it here) there was a very limit 3-4 things i could order.. But thats not a big issue.. Overall great experience ...will be back soon

My wife and I, along with my brother and his family, spent two days at this wonderful hotel this week. The facility is very spacious and the layout is well planned out. The food is excellent with many options. The one aspect that immediately stuck out for me was how every staff member we encountered, from the doorman to room service to restaurant wait staff to the front desk, all were so very much in sync with providing the guests an outstanding experience. There was no difference in standard or attentiveness amongst any of the staff we encountered--each greeted us pleasantly, spoke politely and clearly, were well groomed and dressed and made the experience memorable. Credit should be given to management for the emphasis placed on training and for making superior the standard across the staff.

Having read great reviews of this hotel and noting its Sri Lankan 5 star rating we had high expectations. We were certainly not disappointed. It's impossible not to start a review of this hotel with the food which was simply superb and beautifully presented. Something for everyone, loads of local curries, (not for the feint hearted), wonderful oriental food and even plenty of options for those with European tastes. Every dish had its own unique flavour, the choice was endless and the quality of the meat, fish and seafood was exceptional. Our room, overlooking the resident's garden pool, as spacious and functional without being special, but the beds were very comfortable and the rain shower was ideal with endless hot water. There was also a wide balcony to sit out on and watch the world go by. Room service was spot on each day. The private resident's 'Green Pool' was one of the most beautiful I have seen with overhanging low trees to give you shade if required. The hotel's bar/cafe, where there was gentle live music each evening, was spread around the main pool with wonderful views of the beach and Indian Ocean. This area also included the imposing reception area, an additional A La Carte Restaurant, a rest room and Bistro type restaurant. Impressive trees, vines and other sub tropical plants grew within the hotel with holes in the ceiling to accommodate light and rain. All in all very peaceful and very relaxing. Finally the staff. We have found that all the hotels we have stayed in in Sri Lanka are made by the efficiency, helpfulness and friendliness of the staff. The Heritance was no exception. It has to be said that we did have an issue with the restaurant service early on, but our complaint was dealt with immediately and the service from then on was faultless. We would like to say a special thanks to Nelka and Jananjaya for looking after us so well. Yes, my wife and I certainly fell in love with this hotel.

Visited the hotel almost after 25 years(then Triton), it has been a great holiday at Heritance. The room was amazing. A must visit is the Tendulkar Suite. The service and the staff has been beyond expectations. The food has topped it all and just checked my weight and the scale in my room just proved it.ğŸ˜‰ My kids who are usually fussy eaters were pampered by the staff and was given special treatment. Will be back soon. Thank you for a lovely holiday.

The biggest highlight during my 2 night stay was the exceptional service demonstrated by the staff especially those at the restaurant. Lakmal, Nuwan and Nelka were always around to serve and take care of our meals. They even went to the extent of asking if we wanted anything outside the buffet. The ice cream yet brought to the room was a nice touch! Given my toddler nephew (of less than 2yrs) was not in a position to enjoy the buffet, Lakmal and Nuwan approached us with their pragmatism of offering mashed up food for the baby. Quick thinking and awesome service once again. The two hick up's were in relation to the room #253 1. The door lock wasn't functioning efficiently as it should. 2. A ceiling leak left a puddle just outside the bathroom. Nonetheless Nihal came to the rescue and sorted it out quickly. All in all a very good 2 night stay. Cheers

One evening after dinner the sous chef Roshan Pujitha showed us round the kitchens where he explained about the number of meals that were prepared each day. We were also shown some amazing sculptures made from salt dough, butter and chocolate. We shall tell all our friends about this hotel!

Love the open space and the environment here. prachtige locatie met heerlijke keuken en supervriendelijke mensen.the staffand the service here is very excellent olso dayal en... ranisha and Lakshika kaushalya. Lakshika is very kind. i will definitly come to this hotel again.

The beach and view is very nice in this hotel the resort is very big. The rooms are very clean and beautiful but it has very small ants little. The food is good. I like it has two pools in the hotel. As a family we really enjoyed it here. If i come back to sri lanka i will come to this hotel.

Stayed for 10 wonderful days, hotel staff friendly, and very helpful. Food amazing. Beautiful setting. Room with ocean view, always clean. Beach clean, although under currant in sea prevents swimming. Large pool which overlook the ocean. Brilliant time . Thank you heritance.

This is one very good hotel because it has the best personnel... some are very specialll becauae they are very kind.. the food is very delicious.. the rooms are very clean are of high standards... the pool is very big and beautiful will definitly come to this hotel again.

We came as a small group, ones we arrived we got a worm welcome by nice lady with some sweets. Also we got lovely welcome drink. And i have to thank Chathuranga (reception) for the arrangement that he made. We got a nice see facing room near to pool & restaurant. We spend the day with lot of fun and games. Lunch buffet is awesome. Specially i want to thank Mr. Rifan (G.M) , Mr.Sampath and Also to Mr. Indika, Ms. Sunethra and to Mr. Chathuranga. Never forget your worm hospitality and the service. We were here for a short visit but had one of the most incredible stays. The location and beaches are divine and the service is some of the best we have ever received. Praveen Fernando was with us each step of the way making sure we always had everything we neede. He made our trip perfect! We can't wait to come back and visit again! We are counting down the days!

Had gone with my family and had two rooms. Heritance is a hotel which grows on you. Everything......food, service, pool and the rooms. were just awesome. Want to thank Mr. Denusha Kularenjaab from the front office who made sure my family and i enjoyed the stay and even walked us to our car when we were checking out. Only negative point was the check out which i found slow. Otherwise .......everything perfect!

We spent 3 nights at the Heritance Ahungalla in August this year. We were upgraded to the suite room, which had lovely ocean views, but the room itself needed to be maintained better. The bathroom particularly needed an upgrade and the tub into which one needs to climb into to have a bath is a disaster waiting to happen. I believe the standard rooms are well maintained. That said this is a great hotel for the price you pay. The main swimming pool facing the sea is fantastic as is the other one under a gorgeous tree. The restaurant buffets are extensive and the food is really good. The staff are very friendly and efficient. They have many activities planned for children. Would I stay at this hotel again - definitely!

We stayed in Heritance Ahungalla for 16 nights. I want to structure the Review in positive, neutral and negative things and because everyone seems to tell just the positive things i start with the negative ones. Negative: - Dirty beach; the Hotel does not care about the litter on the beach. Of course it is a public beach but there are only Hotel guests. Thats why they should clean it more often. - Beach Boys: they wait in front of the beach and even whistle or shout for someone. You always feel observed when you lie on the pool - Rooms are in poor condition. In the shower is mould, the curtains are dirty and the furniture is old (i enclosed some Pictures). This is definitely not 5-star-hotel-like! - The Hotel customer Service asked if we could give them a good tripadvisor-rating and they want to see if you give 5 points. Thats certainly the fact why there are so many good Reviews. - The Prices in the Hotel (if you dont have AI) are quite high. A 0,3 Liter Diet-Coke is about 3 Dollar, the dinner 26 Dollar. Very much for a Country like Sri Lanka. - When you leave the Hotel there are some Tuk-Tuk-Driver who want to bring you to the next herbal-farm or wants to sell you drugs. After our second try, we did not dare to go out -The Bar staff was quite slow and we had to wait almost 15 minutes till someone cared. That happened many times. Neutral: - Loud Room: We had a room over the bar and the bass was quite loud till 11 p.m. But most other rooms which are further away are certainly quiet. When we told this to the front desk they immediately offered another room Positive: - The architecture of the Hotel and the beautiful pools. - The Housekeeping and almost every Hotel employee was extremely friendly - The animals in the Hotel. There where cute chipmunks, funny apes, lovely ravens taking their bath in the pool, a lizard and even a big snake (i dont know if it was poisonous) - great Food. I dont think that you can find any better Food in Sri Lanka I just rate the Hotel with two out of five because it is made much better on tripadivor than it is for real. In my opinion it is not better than a european 3-Star-Hotel and i know that sri-lanka-standard is far lower than european but unfortunately the Prices are not like Sri Lanka (Massage 1 hour- 100 Dollar!)

The hotel has an excellent service... amazing beach view.. tasty food with a delicious buffet breakfast.. the rooms are very clean... with a great staff.. we expect to visit it again.... Reception staff is very friendly.. shanikaa is the best....

Amazing hotel and hospitality with amazing ocean view and big pool and a nice beach clean sand big room with amazing view Great restaurant good food and excellent service and staff Many activities i deeply recommend this hotel for honeymooners and couples

"A must visit to anyone visiting srilanka..great hotel,friendly staff .they were very helpful .the variety and quality of food was Excellent. .especially if uou are a seafood buff this is the place. Service was excellent. Food is satisfied. Had a great time during the stay. Friendly staff too. the room codition is fair enough but need improvement and pools is very spacious and beautiful good for kids too... overall the hotel is good.

Fantastic hospitality,friendly staff,I am really happy with the staff since I am a frequent visitor,Keep up the great work....food is great every time of my visit there is Variety of choice in the buffet... Good value for the money you spent.. I recommend it to others tooo

I'm not afraid to say that heritance Ahungalla is the best resort in Sri Lanka. It's marvellous architecture made us surprised. As we entered to the hotel we were warmly welcome in their style with traditional mouth refreshments and also with a trolley of 3 welcome drinks.. . It was delicious. It is with great pleasure and enthusiasm,we joined hand in hand with Heritance ahungalla to celebrate world Toursim day on September 2015 as one of Geoffrey Bawa architecture lovers.We actually came here to relax and forget the busy time for a moment.There we always find the amazing hospitality extended by wonderful staff of ahungalla. The weekend was super busy.But the excellent staff did not forget the 'world Tourism day'.Sunday when we come for breakfast,the windy lobby was decorated with the theme '1 billion tourists 1 billion opportunities'.I saw lots of Europeans were taking shots of that wonderful creature.They have done the creature for the last whole night. even though the weather was rainy and gloomy,they have organized a Mangrove planting ceremony at Madu river with the help of community and neighbors.They took us there with extra care and explained the importance of such kind of activities which leads to sustainability among the nation.We had a boat ride and went to the other side of the river and there the Engineering team of the hotel had done a great a job to make the event success. It has brought to the notice,that They have done a series of events related to world tourism day.awareness programme to the staff.beach cleaning campaigns and poster and essay competition to the students are few. It is with much pleasure my family also get involved with this celebrations and for a moment we came to think about nature and the spring of country where we live.Our special thanks goes to management and wonderful staff who always try to do a different thing to the nation as I have heard. Because this kind of events depict the cooperate social responsibility that a sector must do.thank you for remembering us,such a momentous moment. We Love heritance ahungalla and the staff!!You are doing brilliant!!

Full marks to GM Rifan and his team for maintaining such high standards. Will definitely be back! After 2 nights at Centara Ceysands we came to Heritance for another two nights. i had called to the resort before hand reporting to them about our bed bug problem at Centara telling them we were apprehensive that another such experience mustn't spoil our holiday further. the reservation department put in a request at the front desk for upgrading us, the gentleman at the front desk went out of his way to make sure we got a fantastic suite. the staff at Heritance is extremely friendly and prompt. Truly hospitable ! we were given a fantastic 1 bedroom suite with a huge balcony that overlooked the beach. the rooms are very classically done. they used cinnamon oil as fresheners and glass bottles for toiletries as opposed to the plastics that the other resorts use. very eco friendly! the house keeping was prompt and very helpful, they provided us with two extra beds without any charge for the children in the living room. the resort has two lovely pools, a gaming area with carrom , pool & fuze ball tables. they also had organised activities for children. the restaurant that served buffet was the only thing that needs slight improvement, the food was not as tasty as most other places. however the variety was surely enough. they even had a cultural performance at night which was delightful!!!

Lovely hotel to relax with all the comforts. Will definitely visit Heritance Ahungalla hotel again in future. Truly, this is the only hotel out of Colombo in Sri Lanka that we never got disappointed about anything it offers, everything is perfect.

We spent six days in this hotel from Friday 18th September 2015 to Thursday 24th September 2015. Overall, we were very pleased by our stay here and it was a welcome break as we had been touring Sri Lanka for the five days previous. The hotel itself is very stylish in its design where the architecture is blended in with the surrounding environment. We particularly liked the wall along the main ground floor corridor which was open air with creepers coming down. Our room was on the first floor. It was a generous size with a massive double balcony overlooking one of the infinity pools and the beach. It was stylishly furnished and it had good air conditioning. It had all the features you would expect such as a safe, tea and coffee making facilities, a good amount of drawer space, mini bar and plenty of free bottles of water. The main down side to it was that it got pretty noisy, especially between 09:30 and 11:30. It is directly above the pool bar, close to the reception area and every night, there was some entertainment there. Any chance of having an early night was scuppered because you would get daily renditions of "Lady in Red", "I can't help falling in love with you", "Wonderful tonight", "Yesterday", "Strangers in the night" and other modern classics in various different musical arrangements. Saturday night was really bad. The room shook for two and a half hours and you could hear every word of every song played. We were on the verge of demanding a different room but decided that we didn't want the hassle and ended up putting up with it as some nights were a bit more subdued than others. Looking back, I think we should have demanded a different room. I think that the rooms further away from this area are probably very quiet and peaceful but if you ever get given room 226, this is what you will get. The amenities are very good but perhaps not of a five star hotel. The spa was excellent. My wife had a Balinese massage which she thought was fantastic although the spa prices are equivalent to salon prices in the UK. The gym had some reasonable facilities, including rowing, running and cross trainer machines. It had a reasonable weights section. The infinity pool and resident pool were beautiful. The resident pool is quieter and has a beautiful tree which stretches down almost inside the pool - pure genius in design. It also has a jacuzzi. The hotel is in a fairly remote area and you need transport. There is a resident taxi service and we were told that you can take a public bus or train, or even a private rickshaw. The hotel did not give out much information about local transport (such as timetables) and you could not book any excursions through the hotel. You were asked to deal individually with the resident taxis (which demanded prices nearly as much as UK taxi prices). We found the financial amenities we a bit limited. My advice is to take plenty of cash with you to Sri Lanka. I was hoping that the hotel would have an ATM but it doesn't. It offers a money exchange service but will not accept card transactions - it's cash only. The nearest ATMs are a 10 - 15 minute drive from the hotel. Furthermore, we decided to pay our final hotel bill a day early and use up our remaining Sri Lankan Rupees for drinks on the last day. Unfortunately, the hotel doesn't accept cash for food and drinks purchased. The hotel overlooks a beautiful beach although the sea is too rough and you are advised not to go into it for safety reasons. The main issue was that there were various hawkers who stayed just the other side of the hotel boundaries. As soon as anyone stepped out of the perimeter to go onto the beach, they would get hassled by these hawkers wanting to sell them anything from garments, excursions, meals at their own restaurants etc. The hawkers would employ typical marketing methods, such as following you, shaking your hand, calling you from a distance , beckoning and enticing the children of hotel residents as a way of getting a sale. The staff were excellent. They were very attentive and provided a great service. The hotel customer relations managers worked tirelessly along with the rest of the staff. We felt very pampered. The food and drink was exceptional. The main restaurant laid out buffets for breakfast, lunch and dinner and they were of a very high standard. There was a large range of choice: salads, Western food, Chinese food and Sri Lankan food. I would say that on the whole, the hotel is more suited to large groups and families.

The pictures do not do justice to the beautiful landscape and ofcourse the highly commendable team; the excellence of service by the Aitken hotel staff is something I always admire. The surprise birthday cake for my brother in law was also well presented and special thanks goes to the Restaurant & Bar Manager Thushara, Madu, Panditha and of course Chef Thilakaratne you are doing an amazing job to make sure the team is serving the best food and tirelessly looks into making a happy dining experience.
