We stayed here from the 6 September 2015 for 12 nights on a Mercury holiday on an All Inclusive basis.We were 4 persons in 2 double rooms.The resort is superb from the moment of arrival in a huge open lobby area looking out over a large pool to the sea,you are escorted to a seat for checkin,provided with a choice of cool drinks and a cold towel.We had requested 2 adjacent rooms on the ground floor sea view and were given 2 excellent rooms,very spacious with A/C,fan,TV,safe and very comfy beds.There was a large shower room with lots of hot water and toiletries.The rooms had large patios with furniture leading onto a grassed/garden area then direct onto the beach.We had all our meals in the Jute restaurant which was buffet service,the choice and range of food was amazing with a mix of Sri Lankan,Western and International and in particular a never ending supply of delicous prawns,cooked in front of you and other chefs cooking specific dishes.In addition there was always a friendly chef checking at your table to see if all was okay or to prepare you something more selective to provide you a unique and special personal dining experiance every time.We also had a great waiter Waruna who ensured we were well supplied with drinks.Also the Senior restaurant staff visited your table to ensure all was okay to enhance your dining occasion.There was also a 24hr snack service restaurant which we used a number of times when we had been out and missed the regular meal times.There was a very nice bar and seating area by the main pool which had an open or covered area where we used to enjoy drinks during the day and in the evenings there was always live music with a show on Fridays and Saturdays.Also in the evenings at dusk before dinner one of the workers played a flute sitting on a boat by the pool as the sun set,again a nice experiance.Also the senior staff of the hotel would circulate and chat with you to ensure all was okay,to mention a some in particuar they were Shymalee,KK,Ranesha,who were all hardworking individuals,we all felt KK was extremely talented and an asset to the hotel.Also all the staff throughout provided superb friendly and efficient service.The hotel has 2 very large pools in landscaped gardens so you had plenty of privacy.Throughout the hotel there was free WIfI service available as well as a nice quiet library ,which had a free computer to use,a great service.We can all say please ignore the earlier negative reviews about poor food,service and especially ants, as thats just not the case.Its truely a great hotel to enjoy a superb wonderful holiday experiance.

I have been heritance ahungalla in south part of sri lanka, the location was fantastic . Food was superb. The sevice they are praviding very good. Specifically in the restaurant . Even very busy situation they know how to balance the all the guest. I would like to recommend this nice property to my frends.

Great hotel set on very quiet beach. Rooms are spacious and comfy beds, pillows help you to drift away after a relaxing day. Food is amazing and caters for all different pallets. Chefs will cook to order and even offered me boiled egg and solders. All the staff are really friendly and go out of there way to make your stay as pleasant as possible. You will feel valued. Be aware that if you do trips out that the roads are not the best and you may have some very early starts. Also airport transfers take 2.5hrs to airport and you need to be there 3 hrs before flight takes off. 5hrs added to your journey time. Relaxing holiday in good hotel.

Its a good place family environment nice people good service u can enjoy your time inside this hotel keep going they have a nice pool big one their food are delicious and the staff are very professional they have all kind of relaxation and i will come back again

Had a good time with my wife in this hotel. The hotel has designed in a beautiful structure and swimming pool and front pond brought a marvelous scenery to my eyes. Very calm and quiet environment. Rooms are comfortable and service was up to the standard. Foods were delicious and the staff were friendly. We were really enjoyed and will definitely come again in next year.

We have stayed at the Heritance Ahungalla very recently, as our initially booked hotel was closed for refurbishment and we were relocated to the Heritance Ahungalla - at the end, the best thing that could have happened to us. We arrived around noon at the hotel and were greeted with fresh juices directly by the pool. Our rooms were not ready upon arrival, which was no problem for us, as we opted to have lunch first. As my husband and I got married at the Heritance, we were given a complimentary upgrade to a Luxury Room and my parents were given an upgrade as well to Premium Room. Our room was lovely, having a huge terrace overlooking the sea, as well as a lovely bathtub with sea view. The food in the Main Restaurant is good and the waiters were always friendly. They could however been a bit more attentive, as some of them were rather slow and did not notice when guests were without drinks for more than 15 minutes. The desserts were a delight. My husband and I got a Candlelight Dinner on the beach on our wedding day, which was lovely, despite the rather heavy wind. Our waiter (I unfortunately forgot his name) was very attentive and made this evening even more special for us. We took a trip down to Galle, as well as to the River and both trips were pleased and can be recommended. We booked those trips however not with the hotel, but with the guys on the beach. The wedding itself was fabulous and the decoration was beyond words. We were given a tree planting ceremony as well and will surely never forget this special day. We would also like to thank Shanika, the Guest Relations Executive, who took so special care of us. I had annoyed her with several Emails prior to our stay and she was always polite and ready to help. All in all, I can recommend this hotel to anyone, looking for tranquility and friendly staff. The infinity pool, as well as the beach are simply amazing and hard to describe in words. We will surely be back one day to check on our wedding palm and to enjoy the hospitality at Heritance Ahungalla once more. Thank you all for making this stay so memorable for us!

I had read so many great reviews about this hotel and was really looking forward to staying here, and I somehow feel like I have stayed on another planet compared to the other people who reviewed here. I will comment that the Chef Sarun was fantastic and made the best meal we had in Sri Lanka, the gentleman who was serving us was very good. Now, the hotel is getting very tired and could use a renovation, I was first taken to a room with 2 single beds, being a couple this wasn't good enough, but also laying on the bed it was comfy, the second room had a double bed but was uncomfortable, so we left it to the young man who took us to the room to try and sort out something else - either putting blankets under or a pillow top, anything, we gave them 2hrs and nothing happened. I went to reception, spoke with the executive gentleman, who apologized and said we could look at other rooms, apparently they only have 1 type of mattress which I don't believe. In the meantime I had ordered food from the restaurant and was told it would still be another 15mins away, we proceeded to the next room, same, next room same, so I said I would settle just for the twin singles as we were only staying one night. He then said he would get a new room sorted out and have our luggage moved. When I got back, my food was waiting and it was cold, less than 15mins. I advised the waiter and he said thanks- what for ????? We waited 1hr for no key, went to reception and collected our new room key. Went to the room, located at the end of the hotel, and our luggage was not there yet. Next thing I'm looking at the table and there is ANTS EVERYWHERE, now I'm talking about 1000+ all having a little party on the ground and under the table, walking down the walls etc. I have plenty of photos which I will put up when I have better Internet at home. I rang front desk and we got moved again 2 doors down, we went for a swim for 1hr again, come back and there was more ANTS in the room. We didn't get offered another room, but got dinner which is the only reason this gets a 2 star and not 1. We didn't sleep very well and the band / music was playing very loud well into the night. We had to check out at 7am, I had ordered a breakfast, but when I went to check out, I was hauled to the cashier office, and they kept me there for 10mins arguing about the meal from the afternoon which was cold and I was told would be taken off the room, and, they also tried to charge me for a phone call from my room, which was the executive ringing the manager about the ANTS. The lady who apparently was guest relations needs to be sacked, the cashier needs to be sacked for trying to rip me off. This left the worst taste in my opinion of Sri Lanka and I cannot believe this hotels staff would act like this to customers. I would not recommend this hotel to anyone, hopefully management looks at this and takes action.

A really nice and enjoyable hotel, quite and the atmosphere is amazing .. The ocean is just amazing part, actually i loved each part of the hotel .. The staff were really friendly and kind!! The bed was comfortable and the balcony is beautiful because of the view!!! I really recommend this hotel

The hotel is all about beach and perfect lighting,I love how the lobby is out side which is a new thing for me, also the music all around the hotel is amazing and to the point, having a private balcony deserves an extra point for me.. I loved the hotel.

So so so so good hotel i really enjoyed staying in there, good food, friendly staff, so clean and I'm so in love with the view the pool is so good and the room service is so good and fast and really fast with the check in, great wifi and fast, I'm so in love with the hotel

this is truely a paradise hotel. as you enter you see the pool & the beach & you feel the sea breeze which makes you calm & relax. food here is very delicious & the service personal is excellent. they have a very high standard in providing the service...

I enjoyed staying at this hotel a lot . This hotel deserves more than 5 stars. The architecture is so greatly done. The lobby area is so open and love the sea breeze. There are 2 pools in this hotel love the green pool. Food is delicious and the staff is so kind and very friendly always with a smiling face. I enjoyed a lot I would definitely come again to this hotel you should too.

This hotel is 5 stars in many ways the architecture like how the pond lobby the pool and the sea that lines together and creates a beautiful site. Also how beautiful that it has a lot of open space and more into nature... It's very pleasing to the eye. Also they maintain high standards in cleanliness and when providing the service too. The staff is very hospitable the kindest ever and the food is so delicious.. There is nothing for me to complaint .. Loved it here

On our day out me and my friends could only think of one place that is Heritance Ahungalla. As you enter you feel relaxed the arcitecture helps you... like the open lobby that let's the sea breeze relax you..then the kind and friendly staff that is so attentive and provides a very high standard service. A must to visit hotel if you haven't.

I am so impressed with this hotel. I have never been let down by this hotel ..They maintain their high standards at all times and the staff is so friendly and hospitable. The service that they provide is of very high standards. I recommend this hotel to everyone.

What a lovely day out at the Bachuus bar I first of all love this hotel because of the architecture... One of the well known Sri Lankan architects Geoffrey bawa is the one who built this magnificent hotel. I love the staff here they are so friendly and the service is so excellent and the food here is so delicious. I will definitely visit this hotel again

I had a wonderdul time at heritance ahungalla at the baccus bar with my friends I love this hotel so much may be because of the hospitable staff and the wonderful service that they provide to us when ever we go there. I will recomend this hotel to everyone.

his is our second visit with a short period of time. Its all becos of lovely food, excellent service and most of all to see our friendly staff. The hotel staff is the jewel here...... We were given a spacious lovely clean room. Thank u for the bed deco welcoming us again. Food is always beyond our expectations. Thank u KK & the team for the super service. Restaurant looks superb with the sea view n much brighter than our last visit. All round we had a superb time relaxing in your hotel. Got to know lot of history of hotel n its architect Mr. Geoffery Bawa. What a wonder....

We traveled there for our honeymoon. Every little bit we asked for were provided to us as it is and only thing we have to say is " Thank you heritance, Ahungalla.. You all are perfect..!!!" Warm welcome, Room Service, Room, Comfort, Views, Food, Staff all are 100% great and real value for money.

Really enjoyed my stay at heritance ahungalla. Beautiful beach and what I loved was the pool has timing till 8pm so u get to enjoy swimming in privacy in the later hours. The food is really good. Wide spread of international as well as local cuisine. I really enjoyed the fresh drinks and fruits. The hospitality was really warm and welcoming. Location is also good as it is close to many adventure sites like boat safari, galle fort and the turtle hatchery. Beautiful scenic views. As you enter, you are greeted by the beautiful ocean winds.

Spend a Weekend with my friends. Had awesome and tasty foods all the time. And service and the staff treated us so well. And It has Night club in the hotel. wow.. what a dance floor and DJ. that was a awesome night for all my friends. One of the craziest night we ever had. Good place Good time

We visit there as out department annual trip. From the start the experience was terrible. General check-in time was 2.00 p.m. Be we waited for ever to get our rooms. We were at tjhe lobby and we had to check every 10 minitues for the room availabity. After great difficultly I manage to get my room around 4.00 p.m. Room condition was not that satisfactory either. to get the hot water after turning the tap it took considerable time. First time I thought there was nop hot water. Bidet shower was made awful loud noise. In the restaurant if the table is not prepared it took some time to prepare it. I still missed certain items like napkins, I asked for severral times and eventually continue witho out it. Food was average in both lunch and dinner, but the brakfast was better. Inside the rooms the cellular service was poor, sometime absolutely no reception. I can't find any reason for this but all my friend experience this issue.

This is the second time I've take my team to Heritance Ahungalla and would do it again! Very accommodating, flexible and helpful management team, with a special mention to Mr. Gamini who went out of his way to make this a special weekend for the guys. Thanks again for everything from Team Virtusa

We stayed here for two nights and the hotel is good though it is quite old now but still the food is good and staffs were friendly. The pool was great. The sea was very rough during our visit but the beach in front of the hotel and clean and nice. The location also great but rooms might need refurbishment coz the fans and a/c were quite old and it is scary the way fan rotates with huge noise.. Overall I enjoyed the stay :)

Hotel have an amazing view and it wias perfect for our honeymoon. Beach is amazing.The staff are so helpful , the food is perfect and the service is fast.we wil be back definitly. ...............thank u for everything .

We had a short stay at Heritance Ahungalla over the weekend. Staff was fantastic from the moment you walked in till the checkout..food was amazing. The room though little old..tastefully decorated, . Lakshi & Bimal

It was an amazing weekend at Heritance Ahungalla. Loved every moment of it. Great hospitality and a wonderful place to spend your leisure time with your friends and loved ones. Also located in Colombo-Galle main route which provides easy access. All in all a must visit destination if you are in Sri Lanka.

We had a wonderful time and the food is unbelievably good. We stayed a weekend and the place is better than we expected. Hoping to come back next Feb. Also, the DJ played good songs. If you are booking, book a sea view room and enjoy the pool as well.

Nice place to have a vacation.. food, hospitaility, rooms, swimmimg pool all are better for a good time fun...near to beach gives more joy and relax which i always expecting of being with my family members....

Great holiday destination. Good rooms with nice facilities. Many activities to do... Super food and good service.friendly staff.beach is amazing.beautiful and clean.we will definitely come back again................................

There was a very warm welcoming.. Very friendly staff. Room service was excellent, always making sure that we were okay..Room was amazeballsâœŒwould recommend the place to anyone.. Hotel was clean and had a great view to wake up to. so overall Great food. Great service. Great weekend. #Satisfied! ğŸ˜Š

the perfect getaway, all the heritance hotels in srilanka are just over the top. wonderful rooms and helpful staff and beautiful locations. we went there for three days and it was amazing. just be careful of anyone trying to sell you anything on the beach or telling you to go with them, DON'T! its a scam. all in all a 10/10 and the food was so delicious too

great accommodation, food and service. what else u expect... very pleasant and friendly staff ... good music. Also the pool and the property was really beautiful. It was a wonderful time i spent with my wife... :)

I and my wife visited this place today with our kid. Food was amazing and yet more to come. Sea view is so calm and relaxing, also the music was great too. whan all these combines with the great hospitality they offer, I can't rate anything less than 5 stars. I was afraid to go to a hotel with my small kid but they totally changed my mind.

This is a hotel that has been beautifully designed by the great Geoffrey Bawa. It has recently been renovated by Channa Daswatte. We stayed in a very spacious and comfortable luxury suite. The food was excellent with a very wide range of local and western dishes. The staff was attentive and looked into our every need from the moment we arrived in the hoteo. I must make special mention of Thushara the F and B manager who helped us in numerous ways. We will definitely return for another holiday and I have no hesitation in recommending this hotel for anyone looking for a holiday destination on the Southern coast

Rooms are big and clean. Nice atmosphere. Hospitality is great. Most of all food are amazing. Swimming pool is good too. Beach is always nice to have a walk We'll definitely come back. If you are a Sri lankan you should definitely be here for a day .

Very nice veiw from the lobby.Rooms are big and clean. Ambience is smoothing. Hospitality is very friendly.staff is excellent.specially at the reception.service is amazing at the main restaurant.we will be back for sure.

A wonderful property. Great food with a wide selection. Lovely beach. Excellent service. Beautiful pool and friendly staff in every corner at the hotel. spend atleast a minimum of 2 nights to enjoy this lovely Geoffrey bawas concept

From the ever obliging staff, enormous pools, wonderful food, to the perfect beach, everything about this place is just right! Heritance is the personification of rest and relaxation. They've got loads of activities to keep you occupied, which is perfect for kids. Cultural shows, music and so much more. The staff is absolutely the best! So warm and friendly. Heritance has always been our favourite holiday spot. It truly is a wonderful place to be.

This hotel is a 5 star hotel, I say that because of its high standards and of the the high hospitality of the staff no matter how good the hotel structure or the rooms are if the service is not good the hotel is never good but in this hotel the rooms food and the pools are up to the standards but the service is more than our expectations so I recommend this hotel to everyone.

Had the best time ever!!! Service was really good. The food was the bestğŸ‘ŒğŸ¼ğŸ‘ŒğŸ¼.The rooms were outstandingğŸ˜ƒ. The pool was perfectâ¤ï¸.The hotel is very customer friendly. This is like the best hotel we've been to during school trips.. The music was ğŸ‘ŒğŸ¼ğŸ‘ŒğŸ¼â¤ï¸

Food was awesome and staff were friendlyğŸ‘we brought our school students for a day out and they had an awesome time. Beach is nice and the pool area was relaxing. Rooms were good . DJ was good. A good location for family and friend holiday or day out for students on field trip.

The environment and surrounding was amazing. the rooms and the area are in good standard. My friends enjoyed the pool as it was pretty big and provided sufficient space for our entire grade. I feel that this class trip was one of the best because of such entertaining luxuries provided. Everyone of us appreciated the service hotel greatly.

Place is chilled out. Must visit great food great service great area to relax being close to the beach! Alive place to be for a vacation . Great views from the room. Superb staff, helpful. I'm soo next vacation to spend a few days with my buddies. Pool is amazing, like both pools are the bomb. Jaccuzi was great.

The food is awesome and the room given to me was perfect. I had so much fun!!! The welcome Drink was refreshing and there is also WiFi and the swimming pool is huge and great. This place was great and I hope the standard is kept. Hope to come again and bring with me my family and friends. The pool is clean and well kept. The people are very helpful and as soon as we arrived we were given right away..... thank you for making our class trip a well remembered one.......

There were many dishes to choose from. Also I really appreciate that there are bathrooms available almost anywhere. The pool was extremely clean! Also the beach had mesmerising golden sand which made you longing for the salty sea.

high quality sand and its great that the closet is so big, very convenient changing room. Awesome chocolate mousse. The pool was blue. The deep end was a darker blue. The room was very clean (before we got there.

Lovely property and super service by the staff. The quality and taste of the excellent buffet spread is commendable. Staff went out of the way to ensure a comfortable stay for my family and friends. We went along with group of friends, it was quality time spent wisely and a memorable stay. The room was on the 3rd floor, was clean and ambiance met our expectations. Was traveling with my wife and baby of 15 months. Staff arranged a baby cot at short notice.

Came here on a class trip and really enjoyed my stay. Loved the sea breeze and the pool and the service was amazing. Loved the food as well. Would definitely recommend this place for big groups to come on holiday. Would definitely visit again.

You find yourself at the center of a beautiful area, surrounded by a beautiful beach. The two pools are what u need for relaxation. The staff is very welcoming and friendly and present around the clock. The food is varied and delicious, and the buffet either for breakfast or dinner is a must try.

Heritance ahungalla is a very good & beautifull place to stay for every ocations. It has Excellent restaurant services; excellent room service; beautiful locations ; attractive rooms with good facilities. This hotel has very beautiful locations for take photographs. This hotel is stated closely to ahungalla beach. It is very attractive. This hotel has very attractive hospitality service. We enjoyed very well. Tanks heritance ahungalla.

I visited this hotel for some drinks and food and specially for the pool I enjoyed the drinks a lot and the pool was so great. Mostly when I sit in the lobby the cool relaxing sea breeze is what makes me come to this hotel again. I will definitely visit this hotel again to stay.

What a beautiful hotel lovely warm friendly staff, food is very good buffet or snacks by the pool, our room is lovely & clean would definitely stay here again. The hotel sits on the beach as you enter from the front the view is wonderful !!!!!!!

I just stayed one night in this hotel but for that night I enjoyed a lot and experienced one of the best service and hospitality from the staff also the rooms are very beautiful the food is delicious ... the pool faceing the sea is also fantastic and the green relaxing pool was my type. This hotel truly has earned it's 5 stars. I will definitely visit this hotel again.

I stay in this hotel 2 nights, everything's was great I like the services also their are 2 swimming pool one beside the lobby and the second are more private. Room also perfect and very clean, food was nice and and there are a nice buffet and 2 different restaurants. Overall everything is good

As i entered i fell in love with this hotel because they welcomed us with a grand smile and then took us to our room which was so outstanding... The pool which was big and peaceful when looking at the sea. I enjoyed it alot. The food made my day because it was so delicious and mouth watering . I will definitely visit this hotel you should do it too. I recommend this hotel to everyone.

Heritance hotel is very good hotel. Anything is fantastic. Reception and employees rooms pull foods services restaurant . It was a fantastic holiday at heritance ahungalla at srilanka. The people @ srilanka and @ in hotelll is very good

Heritance Ahungalla is an amazing hotel. It is a very good place to spend the holidays. The employees are very good. The pool is amazing. The foods on the restaurants are very delicious. The ac is very good

i hade a amazing twoo days at this hotel the food was amazing the people always smile and lovely atmosphere and a great pool and wonderful view of the beach. the treatment by the people who work here so professional and have a very beautiful smile and always helpful.

awesome hotel. one of the best. every srlanka visitor should pass by. the food, the pool and even the view are all fabulous. the reception is amazing. the rooms are well cleaned and all you would ask is available

Spent 5 nights, very enjoyable. Good selection of tasty food. Staff very friendly but service at poolside bar a bit slow at times. Two good pools to choose from. Would recommend this hotel for a relaxing break.

A scenic hotel not too far off colombo at an affordable price. With a beautiful view of the ocean with a lovely pool. Very friendly staff with commendable service. The dinner buffet was not the greatest but was brilliant during breakfast.

Fabulous hotel with great customer service with the most beautiful view of the Indian ocean. The staff always goes the extra mile to make us happy. We have always had a great service and a relationship with Dinusha and with our new kid in the block Ranisha. Clean, beautiful rooms that is cleaned twice a day which is always outstanding. Excellent food with a divine touch. Great seafood. Make it a must to visit Heritance Ahungalla.

Outstanding hotel with great customer service and with an awesome view as you enter the hotel... excellent hotel with clean rooms and we always, at all times have had great customer service from Dinusha Kularathne and our newly met friend Ranisha...excellent food with authentic taste. we have been coming here for the past 4 years and the service has been consistent at all times. we have built up a great relationship and we have made a priority to visit this hotel once a year. Great destination for your holiday and a must to come.

Visited this place last weekend with family and one thing that stood out was the service. The front office especially went out of their way to make us comfortable, and there friendliness makes one feel at home. great Job well done.The food on offer was a great variety however I felt it lacked coordination to match, although everything was on offer. We were delayed getting the room, but it was excusable.

We spend two wonderful weeks in Ahungalla. Wonderful,quiet location of the hotel.Large,very clear rooms and excellent pools are always free sunbeds and cool bars.Thank pool attendants Sarath and Ginesh. The varied,delicious food and desserts in a restautant AI - Sous shef Thilakarathna. Thank dear Annushka and Tony. Shanika at reception. Many thanks all the management of Aitken Spence Travels. Mr.Jeevaka,which provides excellent individual excursion to Kandy and Galle with the best guide Pandulo. Thanks for everything Heritance. It was the right choice.We want come back again.

just returned having 2 fantastic weeks in Sri Lanka one of the friendliest places I have visited the happy island I stayed at the Heritance where the staff are fantastic always smiling and chatty the hotel is in need of a refurb looking a little tired in places but has 2 great pools Great choice of food super sweets English food served in pool bar Lovely beach position but the local beach boys can be annoying touting for business The hotel is a little isolated so it is a long journey to see other places 4hours to Kandy but not to be missed I used Uplankatours great service [Kandy-Son]

We stayed th Sep. 7th Night at Heritance Ahungalla and it was a superb stay. We checked in a bit late around 8 in the night but from thereon to today the service and the staff had been absolutely helpful. The Food and the Cleanliness is also at an excellent level combined with the astonishing architecture. We reserved a Luxury room but it was upgraded to a junior suite by the Hotel itself for the reason of having a bath tub in the wash room was one of the priority for our reservation of a luxury room, and not having one in luxury rooms they upgraded us. The view also pleasant and top pf it all the staff is really friendly and assertive in their very own way.

Great stay and very friendly staff particularly Ranisha at check in and check out. Good choice of kids activities and complimentary warm milk for the baby from room service. Good choice of food and laundry not too expensive. Could do with more sun loungers but otherwise great having a heated residence pool.

Best resort in sri lanka.... Front office staff is best.specially supuni n shanika n kasun.welove tge hotel very much............. :) kind staff.........much love for the hotel...food is execellent..... We enjoy its for the best

This is our 2nd visit to heritance ahungalla. Lovely hotel.specialy the staff and the service. Food is excellent. We would love to come back next holiday too. We really enjoyed. Thank you for everything.

Superb! Thanks for your fulluscorperation. This is our 2nd time that we visit to heritances ahungalla. Staff and the service is amazing. We will definitely come back. We will recommend ti our friends too.

This truly is an amazing place. Everyone is so friendly, helpful & nothing is too much trouble. We have never been to a friendlier place where everyone greets you with the biggest smile & always asks if there is anything you need. My wife chose to celebrate her 50th birthday here & her choice couldn't have been better. I had liaised with the team at the hotel to arrange a few surprises & they pulled out all the stops to make our special celebration perfect in every way. They decorated our bed when we were out & provided the most delicious cake which added to the wonderful experience before whisking us onto the beach for a gorgeous meal. The food is delicious in every restaurant. From a quick delicious snack to their amazing buffet or absolutely fantastic fine dining experience. To have Michelin quality food served on the beach is something special. It has been a pleasure to see & meet the chefs responsible who are so proud of what they do & boy do they do it well. The bars are as welcoming & the big smiles & friendly staff make you feel so welcome that you never want to leave. The rooms are beautiful. Spotlessly clean & the room staff work tirelessly to ensure you have everything. If you're thinking of going somewhere but don't know where, come here. You will not regret it & I am sure you will come again as we most certainly will. Thank you to the staff who we now class as friends. You know who you are. Best regards Dave & Maria

Excellent, homely and enjoyable stay. Rooms are nicely done with all amenities. We enjoyed jain food which is normally rarely available in Sri Lanka. We look forward to visit again to feel the warmth and hospitality.

Great service and staff in the restaurant! Nice rooms! Very exotic hogh quality meals! This place is very spacious and has two beautiful swimming pools that anyone can have a good time in! Great place for any culture! Overall this is a great place for any type of holiday! Credit to aitkenspence hotels and the staff!

Very kind hospitality n excellentf service..staff were so friendly..food wad very good n enjoyed a lot... We will be come back with our families definitly and we will recomnend to anyone this hotel.Thank you for everyine.

We stayed 3 nights in a deluxe room - extremely comfortable and well appointed. Slept like a log every night. The staff could not have been more friendly and helpful at all times. The hotel itself was designed by renowned Sri Lankan architect Geoffrey Bawa, with great attention to detail - it is in a tropical style with lots of open space and courtyards/gardens within the hotel. Two huge swimming pools, and of course the beach (ocean swimming seasonal though). This is a great location for exploring the surrounding area - lots of other Bawa designed hotels and gardens to visit nearby, and of course the Unesco world heritage old town of Galle (Fort), which is a gem.

One of my best stays in sirilanka! The hotel is very pleasant the staff very friendly the food just delicious the rooms well equipped with a breathtaking view on the shore and on the pools the atmoshpere so peaceful and romantic ... It was simply a great stay

If you're looking for a calm and relaxing stay on the sri lankan beach, heritance ahungalla is the place for you ! The heritance chain of hotels hasn't ceased to amaze our group, each one very integrated into it's surroundings and has a unique architectural carasteristic proper to their respective regions. Our room was on the ground floor and had direct access to a nice isolated pool, and in case you get bored you could always take a dip in the indian ocean just a few meters away. Service was very good, staff very friendly and welcoming and the food extremely tasty. However the gym was a bit too small for me and lacked machines and weights...

This 5 star hotel offers such an amazing and beautiful experience ! Come to pamper yourself under the sunny skies and palm trees of ahungalla ! This hotel offers very clean rooms and beautiful views on either pools and sea as well as a exquisit culinary choice between their international buffets and delicious restaurants and a la carte room service. Such a friendly staff, they always keep smiling ! Thank you Heritance Ahungalla, I will definitely see you soon !

Good hotel to visit and relax. The food and the staff is superb ... can recomend anyony to visit this place . The beach is also superb and the safety is also 100% . I woukd like to visit this place again and again . My family also enjoyed the stay alot .... good luck n keep it up...

I have been here couple of times. Every Time we had great time. This is the first time came here with kids and really good family oriented hotel. Kids had a great time too.fantastic staff, it's more than fantastic I would say. fantastic food. I highly recommend this hotel

The room overlooked the sea, and was comfortable The amenities were good -as expected from the Heritance group. The food and beverages department went out of their way to make vegetarian food for us. I would like to thank Shyamalee, Gamini and chef Chaminda for all the tasty meals we had. The beach is not a private one: so a place should be earmaked for keeping footwear. My new pair of slippers (fortunately not very costly ) was stolen.

A great hotel to stay. Staff are very friendly and helpful. I would like to specifically thank Mr Thushara, Restaurant manager. He was very humble always and very friendly. All the other staff are very friendly and always smiling and willing to help. Some hotels only treat foreign guests well and ignore Sri Lankan guests. But this hotel is an exception and treat all guests the same. They take every effort to keep the guests happy at all times. From Brahatheesan Selvarajah

Nice experience, good location. Good service in the staff. Specially in the restaurant. Nice food and good variety. We all enjoyed in nicely. We would like to recommend this nice hotel to indian people and others.

Warm welcome ,amazing foods, excellent service and quite location to spend your holiday. I traveled with my wife for our honeymoon and we go a honeymoon offer plus some other extra benefits specially for the honeymooners. Highly recommend for the tasty foods, specially for sea food lovers.

We really enjoyed our stay. Thushara and his staff looked after us wonderfully, all very friendly and always with a smile. Magnificent hotel, beautiful views of the Indian ocean and an extraordinary array of lovely food. We were touched by the flowers beautifully laid on our bed and in the bathroom - thank you Housekeeping department. Would recommend staying here and my partner and I would definitely be back to experience Heritance hospitality.

Had a fabulous time! Great food and friendly staff. Big pools and quite a few activities and a fantastic view of the beach. Good holiday spot. Especially recommend for families and groups of friends. Room is spacious and comfortable. Wide variety of food available at the restaurant.

Stayed two days at heritance Ahungalla with my family. It was a memorable stay and specially service we got from the Heritance staff was beyond our expectation and we were delighted during our stay. Especially I must mention Mr. Tusharaâ€™s name who worked as a restaurant and bar manager is an asset to this wonderful hotel. We visited historical , Ahungalla heritance hotel with our family members in the month of August and we were immediately embarrassed by the warm welcome and thospitality that SriLanka always known for. Recently we had a enjoyable family holiday at this sea side holiday resort. The hospitality we received from the time of arrival until the departure was excellent. The food was really good and there was a wide spread of international cuisine ranging from Indian, Chinese and Western to Sri Lankan food catering to visitors from all over the world. The housekeeping staff also provided a very good service by keeping our rooms clean and providing new linen on a daily basis. We will surely go there again.

Two days spent @ heritance ahungalla was fabulous. Special thanks to THUSHARA for the personalized service. THUSHARA is indeed an asset to the hotel. The food was delicious. Looking forward to our next visit very soon. Amila Ranasinghe & familyğŸ˜„ğŸ˜„ğŸ˜„

Booked over the phone for 3 nights which was ok enough. Nice enough hotel with a decent location though the beach was not as nice as you'd get in the east coast or even some Other parts of west coast of Sri Lanka. Most of our time was spent in the 2 pools as were the others from what it seemed as the sea was too rough during our stay. Food was ok, mainly buffet type of food with a decent variety though the fruit selection seems to be the same everyday (melon, papaya, pineapple & guava) Rooms and the hotel was a little dated to be honest and not worthy of 5 or even 4 star, especially compared to some of the other hotels we've stayed during this trip to SL. I do admit though that I have high expectations usually and wouldn't mind paying for it but this hotel was rather less expensive compared to the others and kind of explains why you get dated room & decor (get what you pay for right??) One things I should mention however was the price of food and drinks. It is an absolute rip off when looking at the cost of drinks. All the menu prices are expensive enough , but they add a mandatory service charge of 10% and government VAT 12.5% on top of the final bill which make you pay about 800 LKR (about Â£4) for a bottle of Corona. Note that local beverages are not cheaper either. A small bottle of water is about 225 LKR which is little too expensive compared to other Sri Lankan luxury hotels. The location itself is not close to Galle so not much to do outside of the hotel. We did do a boat trip on Madu river (about 10 miles out) which was as well worth it but I'd suggest you don't book through the hotel and go directly to the Balapitiya bride where you can see many tour operators and get a boat for a ride. Takes about 90 mins and cost us 2000 LKR (Â£10) which was well worth it. There also is a turtle hatchery that you can visit which is nice. I probably wouldn't come back to this hotel to be honest as I wasn't overly impressed but could be a decent location for the average, budget conscious traveller looking for a bargain, as long as the price remain cheap.

Had the most wonderfu holiday. Good food, great staff and service. Food is excellent. Staff is amazing. This is our 10th visit. This is our favourite place. Every time when we have a free time we love to come here.

Heritance Ahungalla is a great place to visit if you want to spend your leisure time enjoying the view of blue ocean. Staff is very keen on fulfilling requirements of guests and their service should be appreciated. Comfortable rooms, two large swimming pools and other facilities made our stay full relaxing and enjoyable.

Good service. And so beautiful view. Good choice for your trip. Food is delicious. Clean and comfortable room. Stuff is so friendly. In a word, love this hotel so much. Big swimming pool. Blue sky. Whit sand. Clean water and so on.

Room was average considering we had told them it was our honeymoon. Food was not up to par when comparing with other hotels in Sri Lanka until we spoke to one of the chefs who made us a traditional Sri Lankan curry and brought it to our table. Think they try to cater for far too many people instead of sticking to traditional dishes. We were told that it would be good for snorkelling but the sea is too rough all year round. Better snorkelling a few miles down the coast. Staff were useless at bringing drinks. Could take an awful long time waiting. We got bored with the bar and mundane entertainment and walked along the beach to a ramshackle hut called The Sunset Bar where we were given a warm welcome by the locals who run this place. Ending up dancing on the sand. Soooooooooooooooo much better than listening to polite, elevator music back at the hotel!! Wouldn't recommend this hotel to anyone and wouldn't go back. There are much better hotels around.

A gorgeous resort, fabulous buffet. A place I would return to. Great room, very clean, the beds are awesome. They serve breakfast and dinner in a beautiful garden. The beach is very close to the pool. They allow to bath in the pool during the night.

Excellent accommodation with rooms overlooking the beach staff friendly and helpful. General Manager and Executives set the bar for the quality of service. Entertainment was a mixture of western and Sri Lankan. The entertainment provided by a group of staff members was of a high standard. A variety of food both western and eastern was offered.

This was my second trip to Heritance and I have nothing but good to say about it. A group of 5 couples including my husband and I were looking for a break from Colombo and we chose Heritance based on our first experience back in Dec 2013. The GM Mr. Refhan saw that our needs were taken care of and we were left in the very capable hands of the F&B manager KK who truly went out of his way at every meal time to accommodate any requests we had. We thoroughly enjoyed the buffet at every meal and especially enjoyed our last dinner which was set up beautifully outdoors for us upon request. The staff were helpful in showing us which food was halaal and have clearly marked out any items containing pork to avoid confusion. I'd also like to acknowledge the friendly and helpful service of Tony and Nelka at mealtimes as well as the lovely lady who welcomes guests to the buffet with a big smile (whose name I didn't catch). I was also pleasantly surprised at the other friendly lady who welcomes guests at the entrance with sugar cubes who actually recognised me even though it was almost 20 months since my last visit! Unfortunately the sea was too rough for swimming while we were there but we had the pool and games room as well as library for entertainment during our stay. We also went on a boat ride nearby on the recommendation of the hotel. We got to see some temples located along the water, cinnamon being peeled and experienced a fish pedicure! It was a nice outing particularly in a group. Overall we were all very pleased with our stay at Heritance and would recommend it to others looking for a comfortable and relaxing stay about 2 hours out of Colombo. The last thing I'd like to add which I forgot in my first review - I don't know where they get it from but Heritance has the most luxurious toilet paper I've ever come across! The little things all contribute to a great stay :)

This a best five star hotel in sri Lanka where you can relax and enjoy your holiday. Service is excellent. Rooms are clean and beautiful. swimming pools are very big and clean.food is superb. We will come back again.

My family and I visited for two days and we were happy with the hotel. We were impressed by the kindness of the staff and the beautiful location. We will definitely recommend this hotel to our friends. The rooms might need a little updating but over all we had a great stay !

I was able to celebrate my 21st birthday with my family and friends. Needless to say the staff was very hospitable. They catered to every need and set up the beach side to celebrate the evening. Beautifully lit up with lanterns and later in the evening surprised me with a cake brought by three pirates. It was like none other. The whole ordeal was done beautifully with the help of the careful craftsmanship from their in-house animation team. This was an experience like no other and I highly recommend this hotel for its hospitality and ever-so readiness in catering to their guests, whatever their needs or occasion. 5 out of 5 stars.

Excellent hotel for honeymoon. Nice location for photographs. Staff us very good and helpful. Service is amazing. Clean and beautiful beach. We received fruits and nice cake with decorated room. Thank you fir everyone.

NIAM~~ The staff is amazing, very hospitable and caring. The stay in this hotel was absolutely enjoyable!

Relaxing place with an amazing view . Love the buffet and the service. Should appreciate the smile of the hotel staff, makes a friendlier environment for all the guests. Plus the pools are mind blowing. just the kind of place I've been looking forğŸ‘

We had a great time. It was a comfortable environment where we enjoyed walk on the beach, serenity by the pool, excellent service provided by the hotel staff. Rooms were clean and tidy. Food was also excellent. Really enjoyed our stay. All in all we can recommend that you can have a wonderful experience there.

Very nice hotel with lovely view. Excellent staff and the service. Food is superb. Beautiful and very clean beach. Rooms are clean. My family is really happy with everything except wifi. It is really slow.ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€

Amazing view with a clean beach. Rooms are very clean and neat. Staff is amazing. Service is excellent .We all want to come back and we will recommend to our friends. Thank you for giving a memorable holiday.

We stayed at the Heritance Ahungalla from 08 August to 11 August. I must say the service at this hotel is outstanding. We are seasoned travellers having stayed in numerous hotels from the carribean to the middle east to Asia. Every request we made was promptly dealt with and the staff went over and beyond to exceed our expectations. Being foodies the chef even cooked us up a special Sri Lankan meal on our last night - Bravo Heritance team! Thank you from me and my family!

A real exciting place to stay on beach side, tongue buzzling foods & refreshments specially with sea foods. Quite good staff willing to help you. We specially arranged a BBQ dinner which was an amaizing fun. I really suugest for everyone to stay here!

I heard a lot about how nice this place was so I couldn't wait to see it. It's a lovely hotel with a great ambience. Gorgeous place, great food and awesome service. This place lets you relax and enjoy nature as well as provides entertainment in the form if basic sports like pool, carrom and fooseball, table tennis, tennis and badminton. Wish they had some sort of water sports for a bit more adventure though. But all in all, a great holiday experience!

Nice very active and the environment is sooo calm and sweet. the pool is huge .the view is so calm that makes ur mind relax. Its a great placr to cm and visit. The rooms are very comfortable. Its really great

The staff here are so friendly and welcoming! the rooms are clean and beautifully designed. the pool is warm and open TIL late so nice place for a late night relaxing swim. love the location (right in front of a beach). quiet area even though there are lots of guests and they have a nice cultural show. It's a good place to visit for relaxation.

One of the best hotels in sri lanka if you are looking for a relaxation at the beach. The staff is amazing and very friendly. We asked for a late checkout and although the hotel was fully booked they managed to get a room for us to spend the afternoon

i stayed at Heritance Ahungalla for 2 nights on my honeymoon. it was the last hotel in our Sri Lankan tour and it was one of the best. upon arrival we were greeted and offered refreshing juices while waiting for our check in. our wait went a bit longer than usual but this was only because we were upgraded. thanks to Kasum, and our room was being prepared. the hotel has 2 pools which was nice, and a very nice view over the beach.

Their was super hospitality. When arrival time to left they people give us super caring. Also their have nice location with carm environment. This was such a lovely place for our honymoon . Can recommed for your honymoon

This is the best Heritance Hotel I ever visited .. We were warmly welcomed and we were given the room within few minutes. The room was more than what we expected, it was an upgraded room with the beautiful view of the sea and with a big balcony. And also the food was very delicious and it was edible! We enjoyed a lot at our stay in this hotel and i recommend anyone to come and get a unforgettable good experience like me . . . . !

The staff in the hotel is very friendly and courteous & the response time was quite good. We have a long trip of 10 days in srilanka and have reached today and we are really happy to stay in this hotel. The staff in Jute are good and had gone an extra mile to satisfy their customer.

Great view and access to beach, friendly staff efficient service and a warm welcome, room was comfortable, food was average, but breakfast was good. Shanika the GRO was very friendly and helpful;. Smooth check in

We loved the ambiance of the hotel and its layout makes it so peaceful and easy to breeze through leisurely. The staff was so friendly and helpful. The food was really good and we must say that all in all we loved the experience and will hopefully visit again when next we can.

Very good service. Good food at the restaurant coupled with polite service. Room is good but the bathroom is ordinary with less space and a shower that is not user friendly specially in terms of having s shower( non bathing). Overall, good hotel. Thanks.

It was well organized and the food was great so were the organizers who were very hospitable. ğŸ˜Loved the stay. My friends and I treasured every moment. ğŸ˜„the pools were awesome. We used both pools. Rooms were good and so was the room service. We even had fun at the beach. ğŸ˜Š

A beautiful hotel located in a beautiful environment. The staff is friendly and hospitable plus the food is greatğŸ˜. The rooms are great and so it's facilities. A lovely place for relaxing ğŸ˜Š. The place promises a comforting stay and all you out there looking for a good hotel should clearly check this out.

Had a awesome day..the service was impeccable.. Food was to die for..the room was really comfy..felt like homeâ¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤..very nice view out hereğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜..pool was fun..baech was really nice..Hope to come back soon..good timesğŸ’i really hope you people try this place its a place you should be ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ‘ŒğŸ‘ŒğŸ‘ŒğŸ‘ŒğŸ‘ŒğŸ‘ŒğŸ‘ŒğŸ‘ŒğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ’

Perfect hospitality and fantastic location.... Anybody can spend full relaxing day out with heritance.... Give 5 stars, hotel heritance.... You supply good service to your visitors... Also your faithfullness is perfect... Carry on your good service as well as you possible

We have just spent a wonderful 2 weeks at the Heritance Ahungalla with our 2 teenage daughters. The staff were very helpful and friendly especially Thushara, Dharshana, Anushka and Madhu. The hotel is situated on the edge of the beach and has amazing views over the Indian Ocean. Sri Lanka is a beautiful country with lovely people. .....everyone was so friendly wherever we went. We will definitely stay here again and would recommend this hotel 100%. Mary, Chris, Lucy and Katy Adams, Northampton, UK.

I stayed there with my partner during the Buddhist New Year, even though it was busy for a couple of days, it was still relaxing. The staff were excellent, the food was not bad either. Overall a nice relaxing hotel with sports facilities.

This was one of the best experiences we ever had. A truly friendly staff. The front office manager Mr Indika Gonawala helped us immensely starting from booking the room and everything which came afterwards. The beach was rough but stiller enjoyed it. The pool was fabulous. Being local tourists I very much appreciated the attitude towards us. All in all a nice relaxing experience

This is our 8th visit to Heritance Ahungalla. We are returning visitors every year as we are extremely pleased with the highest quality of service we have received and this has been consistent throughout all our stays. We are frequent travellers having stayed at many 5 stars hotels around the world, but this hotel has been outstanding and hence our return here each year. We would also like to thank the GM, the front office manager Indika and all the front office staff and special thanks to Chathuranga who organised kite flying for our 2 children. The food at this hotel is beyond words, it really is amazing. Compliments to the great chefs, Dimuthu Kumarasinghe and junior chef Dayananda. The chefs have recently won awards and we can totally agree that these awards are very well deserved. The hotel restaurant service is excellent and special thanks go to Mr Gamini and Thushara. Special thanks also go to Chamith and Raju the 2 Animation staff who entertained us with a variety of sports and activities for our children. Chamith and Raju are an asset to this hotel, they are both hard working with great personalities. The rooms we have had have always been super clean and spacious. The 2 swimming pools are both really big and always clean with excellent pool staff with great service. Thank you Heritance Ahungalla for a wonderful holiday. See you next year! Regards from Dr Jayasuriya and family

The stay was excellent the breakfast was awesome and the service was very good Special mention of Thushara who has customer care running in his blood I met him three years ago at this hotel and he remembered me as soon as he saw me An asset to the hotel and industry

We have been coming here for the fast years and this time it was after 1 and half years. Each visit has been better than the previous one. Staff is professional, courteous and friendly from the moment you enter and till you leave. The Front desk staff goes the extra mile to ensure your comfort and the restaurant is great !! F & B manager Thushara is friendly, engaging and attend to all your requests. We have staid in all room categories and they are all clean, comfortable and exceeds expectations. Staff always respects your privacy. Hotel caters all your needs and make sure your stay is memorable. We highly recommend this hotel !!!

Thank you very much for the excellent hospitality. Specifically the front office and the main restaurant. Mr. Thushara always look at all clients personally. Super foods and had a good stay. It was my birthday. I had a super day.

Beautiful location and totally relaxing atmosphere. Great service and ambience. Hotel build around the main pool which links visually to the main ocean line from the main lobby. The beach front spanned around 2 km both ways for a fantastic evening jog

good hotel with quality service and facilities ! i recommend anyone who wants to enjoy their vacation near the beach... The staff is really friendly and kind ! And the food is really tasty which we have to compliment the chefs. Anyone will like to visit this hotel hence the crowd is also good..and lots of foreigners are booking at this hotel ! Cheers

We went their with my waif and friends had a nice experience with the hotel.front office manager indika was very helpful and cheerful guy who always willing to help.I have a room with a beach view and pool was just below me.Foods taste good.Sea food is delicious.

Very nice hotel with a nice view from the lobby. My family enjoyed a lot. Specially food is really good. The reception staff is friendly and helpful. Staff is excellent. We would love to come back again.

Friendly multilingual staff. Excellent pool and amazing views. Food is simply fantastic. Definitely worth the price. We had a very relaxing time. I would recommend the full package (meals) ). Unluckily the beach was too rough for us to swim in but we still took awesome pictures. Room is utterly amazing Overall my family and I had a blast!

Heritance Ahungalla is great! We were welcomed warmly and the food was delicious! The pools are very relaxing and sports acrivites are fun! We were occupied throughout the day with fun activites such as billiards, caram, tennis and table tennis! This place is a must visit when in Sri Lanka!

Heritance ahungalla is my dream holiday destination.beach is superb and very clean. Rooms are big and nice sea view. Food and the staff is excellent. Service is really good and proffesional. I will come back again.â˜ºâ˜ºâ˜ºâ˜ºâ˜ºâ˜º

We are pleased to say that our stay of two nights and three days was very relaxing. We have really enjoyed it here very much. The beach and large pools were very nice. Staff is exceptionally friendly and helpful. We heard that the team of chefs at this hotel had won first place at the recently held all island chef culinary compietition. We enjoyed the food very much. Overall nice ambience. We gladly recommend this hotel.

This was one of many visits. We never fail to receive a warm welcome, a great hospitality with ever smiling face and sumptuous meal. Every time! Holiday spent as staying guest or as a day guest. This place is always on top of my family 'so list. We enjoy both the pools. The effects of sun on the horizon the blending of nature that reflects in harmony

Very nice hotel, excelent food and glorious personnel. Absolutely recommend. Everyone here was very kind and nice, always smiling and willing to help you with whatever is on your mind. Also, the food was always excelent, packages for whole day trips were more than sufficient. Very nice holiday, thank you.

The Heritance Ahungalla, never fails to come out with super service, This time too they exceeded our expectations. The quality of the rooms were good, The food was somewhat disappointing especially the dinner, But they made amends during breakfast & lunch. the Friendly staff was always there to listen to you.

Fantastic spread! Tasty food. Worth the price. Very hospitable staff. Beautiful pool. Cosy rooms. Kids loved the stay and enjoyed a lot. Would definitely come again. As the sea was next to hotel the kids had a great time at the beach too. Not happy with the visible glass in the bathrooms.

Very nice location with lovely staff. Excellent service. Food is realy goofd.specialy desserts. Sps is amazing. Two swimming pools are clean and beautiful. My kids love it. Definitely we will come back.

This hotel was amazing. From the pool, to the fine dining, to the rooms to the everything else.....Strongly recommend a stop here to all visitors to Southern Sri Lanka. We will definitely coming back for this TRULY LUXURIOUS HOTEL!!!..thank u very much for ur wonderful service... Mr and mrs Thirimanna

One of the nicest hotel that I have been in. Recommend, food is very delicious and it has a beautiful view at the Indian ocean. I will be coming back to this magnificent hotel. Staff is very efficient and they let me feel I'm at my second home. Pool is very big and nice.

Nice location and friendly staff.good place to be relaxing for few days.one off few places where you can enjoy with your family. Specifically service in the main restaurant very good. the food was amazing. I would like to recommend tis hotel for beach relaxing lover's.

100% recommendation for a good relaxation... our host Shanika was warm and friendly like a typical sri lankan.... food was great and the service was smooth...would definitely come back.... best hotel down south.... satisfaction guareenteed!

Awesome Service and great hospitality. Had a great time with wonderful facilities and care. Customised service for infants and kids. Restaurant service are remarkable. Awsome food n menus. Love it. Thanks to the management and staff. Hoping to make another plan very soon. A destination for a relaxation Regards Bistham
