The hotel is near by the sea. It's a nice place to visit. Wanna come back again. Awesome. Happy. Thanks everyone ğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜Š

We as a whole family love this place, its one of our most favourite resort in Sri Lanka. It's not the location it's the staff that make this place welcoming and enjoyable. We have visited this place three times within this year and on every visit we have left with big smiles and plans head of returning soon. Our daughter celebrated her 4th birthday here in June and she was treated like a princess, and everything happened just as she expected, it was her wish from our last visit to come back for her birthday. We would like to thank you all the loving staff for making this place truly amazing with their friendly and welcoming nature, they always have smiles on their faces.

We stayed there during middle of off season. But the hotel and the staff didn't seem to be like that, they had the liveliness that others lack during mid off season. Even the buffets were filled all the time and the varieties of seafood offered during that particular period was really good. Other than the infinity pool which has a breath taking view the hotel also has a resident only swimming pool that is partly covered by a tree and with a bar next to it.

We stayed in room number 136 for one night with my 3 boys and husband. It was such a memorable stay. The view of the Hotel is breathtaking. We fell in love with the pool instantly. Overall the staff was excellent. Mr. Indika from front office, went out of his way to make our stay a memorable one. The staff at the main restaurant made us feel like home away from home. Thushara from main restaurant was so helpful and attentive. Unfortunately, we couldn't stay more than one night...but will definitely visit this beautiful resort in near future. Forgot to mention about the diviyan Spa. I recommend anyone to try the Balinese massage from Mey. She was such a professional therapist. Thank you all for making our stay a memorable stay.

Execelent very well. Resturent is very good.pool is really nice.its very nice because of the beach & the view also nice . Room service also very good.its is good to spent in lessure time . There is natural look.we are really glad to come to this hotel. This the 2 nd best hotel.1st is park royal &holiday in singapore. You have to improve stantant live singapore.

Restaurant service was superb.we enjoyed a lot.There were variety of food and a superb view from the restaurant.staff at the point were very attentive, helpful and friendly.And the area was very spacious too.

We enjoyed the weekend stay. The staff was warm and kind. They offered a superior service. I want to go back very badly. It was awsome.. The food excellent. You've got palaces to visit close by. The home of architecture who designed the hotel Jeffery Bawa

Had a great time with office buddies. Great food, local and foreign. Pool and sea with indian ocean breeze. Room facilities also good. But triple room is not with enough space to three guys. They also allow bring hard liquor from outside, no corkage charges.

We were starting in heritance ahungalla with our group. It is very nice location. Food was fantastic. All the staff were very helpful. Specially in the main restaurant. We would like to mention some names. ..nuwan sasanka and kitchen sadun all so Thushara. We would like to visit again. And we can recommend this hotel for anyone .

Spent one night near the beach. Got nice looking spacious room in front of the pool. Room service was really good and they have delivered the order within 10 mins that's something to consider when ur really needing it. Courtiers and best staff u would find and also we had a wonderful calypso session near the beach till midnight. staff given us their fullest cooperation. I would say a wonderful place to checkout if ur on the move and finally many varieties to chose from, food was good and loving it.

From the time we arrived to the time we left we were treated with excellent service. Our kids were treated with food that they wanted (fish and chips with nuggets), which were not even in the menu. All we had to do was ask and made it happen. Also they did not charge for these services. Ask for an upgrade and sometimes the management gives it, which is well worth it. hotel facilities were really good, the pools were the best. Keep up the good work, see you again during Christmas.

Heritance Ahungalla is situated in down south and if you are travelling from Colombo the easiest and fastest route would be the southern expressway.Hotel is beautiful and the location is very attractive.Food is great with a wide variety of seafood.Staff is not as friendly as in heritance tea factory but they are helpful.We stayed in a deluxe room and it doesn't have a bathtub.All rooms provide full or partial sea view.Beds are comfortable.All rooms have a private balcony.During the weekend we stayed there it had rained and the balcony was not properly dried .Hotel must allocate a person to clean the balconies on a daily basis. The pool is really nice.Actually the hotel has two pools.The big pool can be used by both residents and outsiders and the small one is for residents only.During the night the hotel is entertaining their guests with a good band and Sri Lankan cultural dances. Overall its a good hotel.

The hotel experience at Heritance is one of a kind, from the pool that is overlooking the beach to the warm hospitality by a professional yet homely staff. Namely Thushara, the restaurant manager provided an aunthentic Sri Lankan guest experience which prioritize competence and warmth in the hospitality for the guests. Thushara ensures the needs of the guests are met to nothing less than excellence. I would gladly recommend this hotel to my friends and family in Sri Lanka as well as overseas and also i will be back during my next visit to Sri Lanka. THE FOOD WAS SPLENDID AS WELL WITH A HUGE VARIETY OF SRI LANKAN AND WESTERN CHOICES.

Most highlighted quality of this hotel is the friendliness and attentivness of the staff. Highly recommended for a relaxing holiday experience !!!! We checked in for our annual staff outing and it was a gereat experience. And also the hotel staff helped me in organizing my wife's birthday celebration which came as a great surprise to her. Keep up the good service.

Great and excellent service by coffee shop staff. Very friendly, helpful & fantastic service by Thushara bar manager .we had a great time. Thank you for making our stay a memorable one ..hoping to visit again for a longer period. Special thanks to the front office staff as well. Great place to stay.

Awesome food, superb environment and friendly staff. Convieniently located great place to enjoy your southern Sri Lanka holiday. Well managed hotel environment equipped with modern facilities. Well maintained sandy beach and swimming pools right across Had a relaxing experience before leaving for Colombo capital. Must visit!

We stayed for 5 days in July 2015 and had a fabulous stay. The staff could not have been helpful and genuinely friendly. The rooms were large with good sized shower rooms in the bathroom. The food was delicious with a really good choice of Asia and Western food stuff and 'to die for' sweets and puddings, all buffet style. Security is good and the hawkers now stay on their side of an invisable line, on the beach so we did not get hounded like at some hotels elsewhere. We enjoyed the company of Mr and Mrs Iguana who walk around the grounds and do not mind all the attention they cause! The main pool, overlooking the beach is large and the main focus when entering the Hotel. We would definately recommend this hotel.

Heritance Ahungalla is a hotel which is like a home away from home. I came here with my mom to relax and to get away from work to unwind a bit. From Friday evening till now food, service, rooms & hospitality has been truly five star in every sense. The view from the pool is truly breathtaking. Love the night skies here. Food, well....pretty everything you could wish for is here....rooms....spacious and plush. But more than anything what makes this hotel truly special is it's staff....they are friendly, professional and ensures that all your needs are met. I also noticed they have quite good conference facilities. So this is a hotel for all your requirements. I recommend to all to try here to experience Lanka and to truly unwind - Malith Kumarasinghe (Room 303)

The night vertual screen night show was a nice experience..yammy foods with eye catching preparation and best service... when we are planning our next visit.... hope to catch Front officer: Chathuranga... he was KIT till we departure...thanks to all...

Last 28 th June was our first anniversary... Among all lovely memories of our wedding.. "The stay with Heritance" was stand out... Still we felt the smell of it..... From the warmth well come to good bye... Still we can remember Mr.Chathuranga( Front ) One of the best customer supporter we ever met..

The hotel lobby sets the scene for the hotel itself â€“ a lobby spreading out into the infinity pool, that leads into the beach and sea. The staff provide a humbling and warm welcome, showcasing their hospitable nature from the moment you step inside. The pool is idyllic and the food showcases the talents of the award-winning kitchen. We were lucky to meet Celebrity Chef and 15 time Gold Olympic Medallist Dimuthu Kumarasinghe, and all I can say is that I am surprised he has not appeared on all our TV screens! A true culinary talent, and the most humble person, he has led an equally talent set of kitchen employees to create some truly wonderful culinary experiences. Thank you to Heshan and Kevin for giving us the best kitchen tour and pastry session, and Dinushan for providing a stellar hotel tour! All in all, this hotel is a must if you are visiting Ahungalla.

we were in heritance ahungalla 1 night. the service was superb. food was fantastic. staff was very helpful. specially in jute restuarant. Anushka, thushara, kk, chathurangÃ  and supuni was ver helpful and so kinded. we can recommond this hotel and come back again.

Love the atmosphere. Friendly staff with good hospitality. Food was delicious and had a good mix of local and international. The property looks a bit old. Management should look for a renovation (walls, painting ).

We had a most unforgettable day with my cousins after 10 years at Heritance Ahungalla on 23-24th July. Food was absolutely wonderful. Service at restaurant and rooms was so friendly and caring. Most friendliest staff we have come across. Front office checking was so smooth thanks to Chathuranga.. Rooms were spacious and clean. Amazing pool. Would be back in next year too. Highly recommended

Superb service with friendly staff. From entrance to room had a great welcome. Nice environment. Comfortable rooms with nice sea view and eco friendly environment. Had great time. Thanx for making out day memorable. If you want have a great time in down south this will be a great option.

It is our third time in this hotel and I should say that this one is one of our most favourite! Everything is on a high level! The territory is clean,green and always fresh, the rooms are very cosy,huge and light, the food is delicious here with a big variety of different exotic products! The stuff is veryyyyyy and extremely friendly! The swimming pools are really very big with a beautiful views on the hotel,palms and ocean. The animals on the territory are very funny! It's a big pleasure to feed little chipmunks;-) thank you for your perfect service and for your hospitality!!!! We will certainly come back to this paradise!!!!

Very enjoyable stay. Good food. Excellent staff. excelent pool. Two big pools with jacuuzi. Comfortable rooms. Great beach. Bufet options excellent. Took great boat ride in madhu river. Fish massage a must try there. Overall 5 star hotel.

When you meet people like Chaturanga(Front Office),Chamila(Main Restaurant), Anishka(Hostess at Main Restaurant) it makes your stay,one of a kind at Heritance Ahungalla.My request for a quiet,away from the public eye sleep vacation was fulfilled with the choice of room.Excellent!Chamila at the restaurant with Anishka was always there with water before my glass was empty,to help us with chair n napkins every time we went to fill our plates.The warmth of the the staff at the restaurant gave us everything.....Chinese Chef Peter Li hats off to you for the subtle flavor of ginger, garlic, spices and sauces made the food irresistible!Pastry Chef Jagath created a personalized dessert for us that was .........Need I say more! He was always willing to share his recipes and made some of the best breads and pastries. For a Five Star Hotel, it surpasses all standards in SL with much more to do than we participated in.... If you aren't here, you haven't tasted Sri Lankan Hospitality

1.service is really good. 2.price is reasonable. 3.the hotel and beach is clean. 4.staff is friendly. 5.food is excellent. We will definitely come back again and we promise to recommend for our friends.ğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜Š

Awesome place, 2 huge pools, rooms are spacious and luxurious. Service is second to none - extremely polite and friendly staff are always at hand to assist. Beaches are beautiful. Local cuisine is to die for with an extensive selection of deserts at every meal. Highly recommended.

Every time I cme to this lovely hotel a unique experience is guarantee. Even on off season the buffet is fine..lovely pool.. lovely beach.. great rooms and many more additions depending on the days.. love the cultural events organised by the management.. easy access with the new motoway.. MUST try place..

So much to say. The rooms were great, try for 3rd floor oceanview. The service was excellent. So many people to thank for our stay Klarathna, thushara, nerosh, varuna.. too many. Most particularly the front desk staff.. we toured sri lanka from Columbo to kandy to Penwalla to Nuwary Eliya to the hikkaduwa/batouna/Galle area. We had reservations with airbnb, and several hotels. When we arrived at the coast area we found none of the houses or hotels were anything like the websites depicted. All were filthy and trash strewn and very small. We came upon Heritance and were stunned . The hotel grounds are lush and clean, the pools were immaculate and the beach was clean large and perfect! There were multiple restaurants and bars on the grounds. There was entertainment . We stayed 4 days three nights and did not regret it. It should be said unless you a very comfortable with local foods and living conditions, this is the only hotel resort that offered a respite from the congestion and sanitary problems you may not be accustomed to. The hotel is also ideally centered between Columbo and Galle . We looked at almost every resort from Botouna to Galle, physically , while scrambling to find a place after being disgusted by our original "resort" this is far and away the best, by leaps and bounds . It is a five start resort at economy prices. ( we booked online in the lobby for a significantly reduced rate ) We also did half board which gave us breakfast and dinner. (We found this to be essential and we'll worth the little extra it cost) You will find the food choices were great and varied and the staff would accommodate any and all special requests. I wanted chicken noodle soup one night as opposed to the two choices and they made me a batch

An amazing place with amazing food & best of all amazing service by the restaurant staff. Want to thank Mr. Thushara Gnanarathna & the team for the excellent services rendered. Also the extent to which the staff in the kitchen connect with the end customer is commendable. Keep up the good work...

I decided to go on a holiday with my family to heritance ahungalla and I'm pleased to say that I enjoyed my trip to the fullest by experiencing an exceptional service. I'm also glad to dine on a great variety of cusine along with plenty of variety in food. The rooms are great with sea views and wonderful atmosphere. I am glad we selected this hotel and will certainly come acl again to Heritance Ahungalla. LORRAINE AND DAYAN

Our family had an amazing time here! First you are warmly greeted by friendly staff. As you walk into the hotel, the incredible views will take your breath away. The infinity pool seemingly flows right to the ocean waters. The pool is wonderful for the kids as it is not too deep so my five year old had a blast! The food is absolutely top notch. There is everything you can imagine at the buffet. Not only is it a LOT of food but it is high quality as well. You can even request specially made food that is not a part of a buffet. We were treated with an exceptional crab curry when we requested it! The staff is extremely friendly and are willing to help with anything you need. Also, it is probably the most family friendly atmosphere at a hotel that we have ever experienced. I highly recommend The Heritance!!!

Leaving today after a very relaxing short break. The restaurant and staff are very accommodating and the food is excellent especially if you like Sri Lankan food. There are two well maintained pools and the hotel is on a lovely stretch of sandy beach so great if you have young kids. If you want to chill out for a few days this is a great resort.

The Heritance hotel is an absolutely wonderful establishment. With a star class staff to match, the patrons of this fine tropical getaway will be left with a lasting impression of the hospitality of the Sri Lankan people. A must see for any visitor to Sri Lanka.

Thumbs up for this amazing resort in srilanka.. Great service and lovely staff .. Staff is very friendly always trying to keep the hotel guests happy .. At the checkin time we requested for a bigger space room and they gave us a luxury room with a beautiful sea view. Also should say about the food it was very delicious ..

A lovely hotel with lovely staff. Beautifull blue sea ... evening sunset is the best scenery where you can enjoy.. the food was amazing specially the sea food and I had a lovely holiday with my family and we got a great experience coming to the best 5 star hotel down south... Thanks to David who ensured our stay was ennoyable and realaxing.... We will be coming back again for sure.........................................!

Came to Ahungalla for lunch with my family. Itz the best place to relax and enjoy the view.we were warmly welcomed with a beautiful smile! The food was really good. We wish to come back again soon. Regards for Supuni and David with the wonderful smiles and great job with solving a few of our issues.

As always fantastic. Rooms were superb. Staff was very friendly and courteous and food was amazing. Upon arrival till departure the front office took care of us like family. It doesn't look like off season to Heritance ahungalla but never been too crowded also. The service was like a boutique hotel service.

Such a beautiful country and hotel! A peaceful and charming stay with friendly and committed staff, as well as lovely food (both traditional and international cuisine). There is plenty to see and experience, and the staff are very good at helping you organize day trips. The hotel itself is open and serene, and designed by Geoffrey Bawa! Service is always good and done with a smile, and the hotel itself opens up onto a stunning beach surrounded by animals and nature. A lovely place!

Absolutely wonderful service! The staff was very friendly and helpful. We were particularly impressed with the attention given to make our four year old comfortable. The pool, room and the food were all superb. We will definitely return!

What's the point of going on a vacation, if you want to feel like home.? Heritance made me and my wonderful wife forget all about home... The meals.. the smiles... the activities.. the room... THE MEMORIES are so much... wr didn't wanna leave :(

Our second trip to sri lanka and what a nice place. Again we toured the country extensively, but this was a good place to base ourselves for a couple of weeks. The architecture is old school, which is cool. It's an older hotel but that just adds character. Nice place overall.

Since This hotel is another creation of Legendary Architect it takes you to Old Charm . But the location and serene atmosphere is ideal for relax beach stay. Food is excellent as always . 2 large swimming pool gives more space to have a quiet dip at any time .

Being my first return trip to Sri Lanka in 20 years, there was plenty to explore. Ahungalla was always on the itinerary for this soul searching adventure, and it was somewhere I looked forward to visit with great earnest; it's beautiful beach being the main focal point. The Heritance added to that sensory experience immensely, having been greeted with the vast pond at the entrance, flowing on to the main swimming pool which looks as if it goes right out to sea. The service was impeccable, with every request catered for amicably and staff taking the "service with a smile" approach to another level, the food infallible, the ambience was exotic. It has left me yearning to visit again; this time, with someone special and it is an incredibly gorgeous place to be. 5 out of 5 without question.

very nice hotel.................! food good people good.... service good Thanks to David who helped us with the checkin giving us a good room. every body in the reception helped us a lot specially supuni and shanika and I love this hotel alot.................................................. :-)

Excellent service.We enjoyed lot. Visited there to celebrated our 2nd wedding anniversary w our 10 month old kid. They specially prepared kids meal for her. Balcony open for thr Fabulous sea beach open. We booked deluxe room. But they upgrated it to suit room. Large spacious nicely arranged room. Two swimming pools are fabulous very closed to the beach. Wow......! They treat every guests as same. Either local or foreigner . Special thanks Should goes to miss Shanika (Guest Relations Executive )and Mr Thushara Restaurant & Bar Managing Executive. Thanks Heritance and the friendly staff for Making our 2nd wedding anniversary so marvellous ......!

Great place for family holidays. Very friendly service. Ask for the rooms close to the green pool. They are very nice. Expect to be swimming in the pool under a tree and next to crows and squirrels. Amazing.

Plus: Rooms: nicely maintained, well serviced. Animation team: friendly and engaging Restaurant: staff are friendly and food is good and varied Beach and swing pool: attractive, but also some minuses. Minus: Price of drinks (e.g. wine, cappuccino, cocktails) too expensive compared with similar category hotels in Sri Lanka Cleanliness of premises: with a little more effort would this place be cleaner and thus more attractive. Windy weather conditions are not an excuse to leave things on the ground. Hotels in Sri Lanka clearly do an effort to group Chinese visitors together in the restaurant. This is not just a detail as the habits of these people was often experienced as plain impolite: noisy, jumping to front of queue ....

Wonderful hotel and specially friendly staff. Pool area is really big great variety off Food .I recommend this place to any one who wants to have relax holiday thank you for everyone.we will come back again...............................

this has been our fifth visit where we still haven't got enough. we appreciate the people of heritance ahungalla more than anything that a hotel can offer. the hospitality of them from jounior staff to the top management is excellent. I will recommend this hotel to anyone who wish to have a good time with good people. truly the best !!!!!!!!!!!!!!

My wife and I went recently for an overnight stay. It was lovely and quite pleasant. It being off season, there were more local tourists. They still had a beach. They haven't lost it like a lot of hotels down south. There breakfast spread was quite impressive. Rooms were nice and had a nice view of the ocean.

I went with my husband and had a great stay at this hotel. Reception and lobby area is huge and spacious. U can see both the pool and the beach from there. Amazing view. We stayed in a deluxe room and it was nice and cozy with a balcony overlooking a pool. It was very comfortable. Staff is well trained and courteous. The only downside was the food which was totally below expectations. But all in all we had a great tym.

Heritance Ahungalla Beach Resort is one of the best Hotels to stay. It was the first time for my husband to stay in a hotel in Sri Lanka, he is a Swedish National. I booked Heritance Ahungalla online for my husbands Birthday, it was a surprise gifts from me to him. He loves the Beach and the Sun. When we arrived to the hotel the reception staff was very helpful and friendly. They welcomed us with soft drinks and cold towels, they escorted us to our room. On the the day of my husbands birthday he received a birthday cake to our room. The room was really nice with a sea view. The food at the restaurant was really good, they had different variety of food to choose from. The staff was very friendly and helpful, always with a smile. We both had a wonderful stay at the Heritance Ahungalla, and definitely we love to stay with them again. Keep up the good work.

The holiday at this hotel was a really nice experience to me and I just can recommend it to everybody. The staff is really keen to make your stay the best. The hotel is placed directly at the beach and Has many pools to enjoy you day. The food is really good an contains typical food of the Island as we'll as international things. All in all my stay was really nice and i think i want to come back.

Heritance Ahungalla is one of the most beautiful hotels I've visited. Its very calm and unique. the service of the staff is superb. very welcoming. food is just great. We enjoyed our stay in there very much specially the overwhelming service. So nice place to be and so relaxing. Thank you everyone for making our stay a memorable one. Thanks sheahan at the front desk and the chef for the great food and thanks everyone.

We had a fantastic honeymoon here.hotel facilities are fantastic and hospitalility is fabulous.foods accom room facilities surrounding scenaries are all great n first class.and specialy thanks mr thusara.he is a so nice person.

We had a wonderful weekend at the hotel with our family. The rooms were spacious, neat and clean. The service from to check in to room service to house keeping etc were very good. They were very quick and accommodating to our requests. The quality of food and the spread at the buffets was excellent. Special mention to chef Thilakaratne, who was very accommodating to our special meal requests. The restaurant staff were very friendly and provided excellent service, some of whom were Anushka, Thushara, Udana, Chamila, Sanjaya, Jananjay and Ishan. Overall we had a fabulous experience!

1st Strange that I am the first to review this in 2015 despite this been a popular destination. Before going I had a look at the web site. I saw a couple of brocken links and informed them but they did not respond back to me... I was a bit skeptical as a 5 star hotel needs to keep its web site 5 star. My skeptism was correct when I went there... I felt the staff was not bothered about good service. They were in general NOT FRIENDLY. The hotel I found not to be well maintained. Things are getting old and discoloured. They did not have a changing room for the pool. Thus you need to change in your room and go. Through the hotel to the pool (I am talking about the main pool). Food was good. Generally it was ok but I was expecting a lot more. I would say this is more of a 4+ star hotel than a 5 Star.

This is one of my all time favourite hotels and I absolutely love coming here. My family and I have been coming to this hotel for 20+ years and we remain throughly pleased. The service is spectacular and so are all the other attributes that the hotel has to offer. I love this hotel and recommend it to all!

Very nice hotel with kind and considerate people who take care of whatever you need. Always looking out for the guests which makes the stay enjoyable and pleasant. The pools and recreational facilities are high standards that gives the hotel a good feel and are of the best quality. Thank you for having us to stay at such a wonderful hotel. Cheers

The Heritance Ahungalla was a great hotel, great pools with different vibes to each of them. The buffet was excellent and the rooms were attended to very well. Would recommend this place to all who are traveling to Sri Lanka.

excellent service and very F'endly super location too. nice environment good food super facilities super staff loved my holiday with Heritance Ahungalla Thumps up to Mr. shehan - well groomed and serviced

I checked in early in the morning at around 2.30, and one thing i have noticed was the Service and the friendly staff.... we received the same excellent service throughout our stay at Heritance Ahungalla. They were truly amazing always in smiling faces and never hesitate to help you in any way. The Food was Okey with much varieties. The other thing was the Hotel is a Masterpiece by Geoffrey Bawa, a great Sri Lankan Architect. Thank You Heritance Ahungalla Team for a Unforgettable Experience...

We were very pleased to stay at Heritance excellent hotel fantastic hospitality tasty food faboulous location and above all excellent service by the entire hotel staff. This hotel has one of the biggest pools in this type of hotels therefore kids and play in it so can the adults. We had a marvelous time and would come back again

This is an excellent destination to spend a relaxing weekend with loved ones. The staff is very cordial and helpful. The food is also good. The Green pool was beautiful and romantic. we very much enjoyed our visit and would love to visit again.

Happy about the service n the friendly stuff working at the hotel. Food was great n the room service was good.crowed was good n place is beautiful n will definitely come back with my whole family. I recommend more people to come.

Had an amazing time with the best of people! Food, service and the friendly faces made our stay one of the best ever! The beach located right in front of the hotel makes it a perfect location for a beach get away!

Great hotel. Super luxurious rooms and the food is absolutely incredible. Staff are friendly and attentive. Wife and kid don't want to leave. Will come back for more great hospitality soon. The best resort in the south of Sri Lanka. Jerome

Was there with a bunch of my friends and the place was a hideout for us at a perfect place along the beach. The staff were truly amazing loved our stay at this beautiful place.... They have this really cool bar at the pool where you can sit and relax for hours. The hotel was a great masterpiece of the great sri lankan architecturer Jeofery Bawa. the architecture was truly blissful....

Really nice place to visit. The moment I entered we received a really good welcome and Kasun in particular assisted us with the check in which was smooth. We got a complimentary upgrade. Great place and highly recommend it to people around looking to relax and enjoy the beach ğŸ˜ƒ

Thank you heritance for giving us a super holiday. The staff was attentive caring and made it an unforgettable experience. This may be my 10th visit but yet again you have given me and family such care from all the staff, you could never get this level of hospitality from any other hotel in the world. The food was brilliant and the entertainment was great.

It was simply one of da best holidays ever... Excellent service...Friendly staff makes you feel like your home... Great food and ambiance.... Lovely rooms... Couldn't ask for more... Loved everything about this hotel ğŸ˜Š

excellentï¼Œfantastic about the foodã€the environment and the peopleï¼Œthe service about the staff is quite professional and remarkableï¼Œi love this hotel ï¼Œ will recommend more people to come andvisit sri lanka

A very leisurely hotel, great for hanging out with friends. They have some good options if you're someone into sport, with an outdoor badminton court (not a great idea though since it's windy) , ping pong table, and two gallant pools. Very helpful and friendly staff. Food can be described as interesting, though not of a great quality as such.

The place to be in Sti Lanka! Very lovely staff i recommend this place for vacation! Perfect location close to the beach lovely food thank you Ahungalla! Luxury rooms, service is perfect nice beachğŸ‘ğŸ‘

Had a great relaxing time at this hotel . Very good facilities and great service and amazing food. Very nice and clean beach and pool and will recommend it to everyone else. Had an excellent holiday and nice and friendly people

I stayed a Saturday night at the hotel (F/B) in June with my wife. We didnot book the room, it was a wedding gift, so no idea about the prices. Staff was very friendly and the room were spacious and well furnished (safe box included). We got two beds instead a double which was the only issue encountered other than the door lock (the door should be pulled before unlocking, otherwise it wont open, first time we needed to get assistant). However the restaurants were located on one side and the rooms are on the other side, therefore you will have to walk a bit through corridors to get their. There were two swimming pools, one was located adjacent to a big tree, so you can swim under the shadow of that tree which was a nice experience. On that day there was a show (like cultural show), live music and DJ at the night. Food was really delicious, specially the deserts. Dinner buffet main course was having few varieties other than that all meals are excellent. Dinner, breakfast and lunch were buffet style. Service includes valet parking, use it because the car park is quite away from the hotel and quite difficult to locate (no sign boards, around 200m). Wifi was available but we didnt try since there were enough signal for my mobile (Dialog Telekom) In summary, the place is really nice, staff is friendly and providing better service. After all I could recommend this place, it will be a good experience.

Me and my wife stayed here with our two young kids and I would say that this hotel is wonderful and very kids friendly. Staff are great from the time we got down from our car till we left the hotel. Food was wonderful. As a Sri Lankan and a Marriott platinum member I would recommend this hotel to anyone who would like to enjoy the Sri Lankan hospitality specially for the ones traveling with kids.

I travelled alone did a 5 day tour and ended at this hotel on the beach, the staff were amazing so thoughtful and friendly, Rooms were spacious and comfortable.The restaurant was closed for redecoration, so breakfast was in the conference room, as there were not many people staying, it was not that nice and told Mr KK, I asked if breakfast could be served outside by the pool, as this was far more attractive, he said it was not possible, the next day the buffet was outside by the pool, well done to Mr KK and his team keep up the good work

We stayed for a few days. Everyone smiles and tries their best at this hotel to make your stay wonderful. From the time we arrived we were impressed the warm welcome. The food was top class with lots of varieties for vegetarian or sea food lovers. The cleaners never seem to stop. It is very clean too. We recommend this hotel without hesitation.

Heritance series hotels are the big surprise in this journey. Heritance Ahungalla and Kandalama are both good design, very harmonic with the nature. But the most important thing is the excellent service. All the employees are truthly sweet, especially Praveen of Ahungalla, giving my lovely daughter a wonderful memory. we'll come agian at the better season of Bentota.

Awesome hotel with great view. Lots of space, especially as we were on a staff outing and had a lot of a outdoor activities. The food is amazing and there is so much variety. The staff are very nice and have smiles all the time. Overall great place to visit even if it's just for lunch.

Fantastic day @ Heritance... Service and food was just awesome... We checked in @ 9.30 and the checkin process went on smoothly.. Bites were served on a rapid speed for our needs.. Overall we had a relaxing day with our outbound activities.. PABC OMS Branch

We only went for a short stay due to us not knowing how our 6 month old would handle it. But we needn't feared as the place and service was top notch! Beautiful building, pool and setting. Good food and great service. Went the extra yard to ensure we were comfortable and was always ready for a chat. I'd love to go back again.

Lovely hotel with a fantastic beach, good food and most of all the hotel staff were extremely friendly and helpful. Overall had a wonderful weekend with family and friends. The kids had a great time too...!!!! Maryse !!

From reception to room service, very welcoming and impressive. Dining was astounding from the array of food choices to the ambience and the service of those who waited on us. The food and bar manager leads a wonderful team and was able to accommodate requests. Felt like home away from home, only better.

It was a great holiday with my family at heritance ahungalla.... We were treated like family members of them.. there were variety of foods and all staff is very friendly and supportive always... Attractive two pools are amazing and hope to visit very soon again here......

Since I have been visiting this hotel regularly and have been treated very well each time, I come expecting nothing but excellence! I am NOT disappointed! My experience here keeps getting better. They staff here are mostly familiar faces who also remember you despite the thousands of visitors they have, From the hassel free check in to the incredibly helpful staff at the dinning hall. This time we were with friends and family with 15 in total, the dinning hall staff was very helpful in assisting us with our children and the constant special dining requirements for the infants etc.. Keep up the good work people! You are doing an excellent job! Me and my friends will continue to keep your hotel as our regular weekend getaway. BTW- The kids really enjoyed the weekend activities / programs!

Excellent service from each staff member at heritance ahungalla. .very supportive n caring. .was very concern about us specially about our little one..thank u fr everything. .all da best. .a very relaxing place to be

I came here for celebrate my wife's birthday . Had memorable experience here . Place was nice. Room is very clean and present . And have nice view of indian ocean . Food was delicious .staff was very friendly .definitely next time i will come here.......

The hotel has improved a lot compared to our last year visit. We stayed in one of their Luxury Suits (329), it's just the best. Food was great and staff was so friendly. Gym, Pool, Library was well maintained but not the 2 clay tennis courts. I'd recommend this hotel to everyone. The staff is great and so kind. They will help you with anything you want. We had a nice family time

Service was great. The rooms and staff were really great. View upon entrance is dramatic. The swimming pool looks like it blends with the ocean in the background. The dining area is welcoming and the food choices excellent. Thank you!

Location, Cleanness, quality of food and also services & comfort were all superb. The rooms are really nice. The staff were very friendly and had a great hospitality.. Food absolutely excellent.All are superb from arrival to departure. Had a great time.

I stayed at Heritance for the weekend with 14 family members. It's a nice beach hotel with two large pools. The Sri Lankan food is really good and the staff is very friendly and always willing to go the extra mile to make guests happy. Praveen did an excellent job making sure we had everything we needed during all our meals at the hotel. We have stayed here many times before and will be back again.

Enjoyed the excellent stay at Heritance Ahungalla with the excellent hospitality team. Nice environment, superb food, very friendly staff. Thank you all at Heritance Ahungalla. With Love. Dilani Cooray

Friendly staff, speedy service and beautiful locations. Loved the time spent here. Recommend all travellers to come experience this mesmerizing place. Hope to come here soon and have a nice time again.

Heritance hotels are very unique and friendly. I had an awesome holiday out at heritance ahungalla with my family and friends. Yummy food and comfortable rooms. Jacuzzi and gym was pretty solid. ...........................................................................................

Rooms are very good and the buffet is excellent...Good place to have a relaxed weekend with families and friends...Support staff is pretty good with the service..! Both the Pools are pretty good....!...........,..::.........

Had an awesome time with the craziest buddies in the world with the best resort hotel in the island nation. #islandnation # oceanbeauty #bestcuisines #hospitality # local traditions Thank you ahungalla !!!

Awesome weekend. Much needed holiday.Breathtaking view ......ğŸ‘Š ğŸ‘ŠğŸ‘ŠğŸ‘ŠğŸ‘ğŸ‘Š.With friends, Amazing hospitality service.ğŸ¦. Delicious food & drinks ğŸ´ ğŸ‘Œ......... This is the place to be with your loved onesğŸ‘ŒHeritance Ahunglla

Heritance ahungalla is the best hotel I have ever been. Service is really good. Food is delicious. staff is amazing. We had a lovely time. We want to come again to this beautiful beach.... thank you heritance for relaxing holiday....................................................................................

All the staff and the service are really good and friendly We had a nice time here and we enjoy our time nicely. All there services are really good . Good food and the places are also really awesome.ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€

This was my third visit to the Heritance Ahungalla to spend a day. I found the atmosphere refreshing & the staff courteous, friendly & helpful. I enjoyed variety of delicious food and the picturesque beach adjoining the hotel. i wish to return to the hotel next year as well for the enjoyable stay. My special thank goes the Mr. Sampath de Silva for ensuring that we felt comfortable & welcome. Its a home away from home :) Cheers !!!

Excellent hotelextremelyit with family and friends Food is delicious with a wide spread and a very good choice Rooms are spacious and comfortable Hotel staff is extremely friendly and helpful The ambience is ideal for relaxing especially if it's a family visit It would be great if the check out time could be extended to 2pm instead of 12pm. As a whole I would recommend this hotel to anyone and in fact a few of my friends have already visited on my recommendation!

Me and my wife stayed there in 20-21 of June, 2015 weekend (one night stay) to celebrate our second anniversary. We were in a deluxe room and it was clean and spacious. The staff was great and we were very happy about their service. And the food was amazing... all the meals were in buffet with lots of varieties and they were very tasty. And there are two pools. One pool (called Green Pool) is only for the residents and it is very beautiful. We enjoyed a lot and would like to thank all the staff for making our stay wonderful.

After 5 days we are leaving this wonderful hotel. The location is perfect by the sea and close to the village in case you feel for experience the "real" Sri Lanka". The food in the restaurants is good, and the service is very good. I really want to point out the greate staff !

I recommend this hotel to everyone. The staff is great and so kind. They will help you with anything you want. The food is really tasty from the different restaurants. And the view is fantastic. The beach is right in front of the hotel.

Definitely a wonderful hotel as we keep returning, more often now. The service is exceptional and the staff are always working with a smile. The view is beautiful from wherever you are. The food is very tasty and just tickles our taste buds. My kids love the hotel and want to return again soon. Amazing!!!

Me and My husband always makes time to visit this wonderful gateway once a year! Last Saturday with great difficulty we managed to get a room, Even though the Hotel was extremely full, they as always accommodate our last minute getaways! Well what more can I say! My heart pours out to all the staff members, who tirelessly work towards our satisfaction! The team is wonderful and the coordination between departments was excellent! My favorite is the homemade Ice cream! But they didnâ€™t have it in the Buffet but my desire to have it was fulfilled with a Smile! Thank you so much for obliging! That was indeed a very sweet delight! As annual visitors to this amazing place itâ€™s always like going Home, from the time I get off the vehicle to the Sad good bye the smiles and the hospitality you show is not available anywhere else! Hats off to the Management for maintaining such amazing standards from the inception! Looking forward to my next getaway next year!

Very warm and welcoming staff with a beautiful property right at the beach. Very relaxing. The evening live flute at the beach was very beautiful! The dinner organized at the beach with beautiful lamps was a great experience also! Will definitely visit again!

This is a beautiful property .The infinity pool is amazing and so too is the architecture , the work of the great architect Geofry Bawa. Even the river pool for residents was well located and the tree branches growing over same , made it picture perfect to what you would see near a river. The kids and all of us on holiday had a great time in the pool. The rooms were also well designed , spacious and very clean. It was perfectly located and both the pool and beach was accessible very easily . Room service too was very responsive and all the staff are readily available to help with a smile .A suggestion to the management , pls subscribe to more cable chaneels especially for kids. We had great expectations on the food . However was somewhat dissapointed in this area. Did not like the lay out of the restaurant and although the food tasted good , the spread and choice was a let down. All things considered this is a highly recommended property. We had a lot of expectations on the food

We spent the weekend 20- 21st June at this hotel.The hotel is located facing a lovely beach. The staff were very helpful and the service was good. Room service was also prompt. We enjoyed our stay and wish to thank all the staff of Heritance Ahungalla for making our stay a wonderful one.

Thank you for a pleasant stay. The staff are very friendly and helpful. Food was good and very well presented. Superb setting with a beautiful view of the ocean. This is the place to be if you want to relax!!

We stayed one night in this hotel in June 2015.We had a great stay ! Friendly staff ,sun and beach with fantastic food made our stay a memorable one.we enjoyed Sri Lankan hospitality at its best at ahungalle Heritance .

Excellent service and food. Felt like home. Cant wait to come back again. Thanks Heritance, highly recommended. Fantastic place for families and kids. Heritance has the best staff who will serve all your needs. Thanks Thilak (from Sydney)

During my stay (between 19th to 21st June' 2015), I experienced wonderful service, comfort stay and yummy food & beverage at this beautiful star hotel. And the staff were very pleasant and down-to-earth. And this hotel has very romantic ambiance and made for couples,,, I can recommend this place for everybody who love to enjoy verity of food, cleanliness, peaceful environment and luxury hazel free stay with fast Wi-fi connection.

It is definitely one of sri Lanka's most beautiful hotels. A must visit hotel for sure! Very relaxing holiday.. Our view was spectacular as our room was facing the ocean. The staff was friendly! However, the food could be better..

You enter the resort and you simply are like WOW!! The entrance has a beautiful swimming Pool overlooking the sea. The entire resort is beautifully done up. The rooms are comfortable and have a scenic view overlooking them. The buffet is elaborate and delicious. My kids loved the wide variety of delicious desserts that they serve. It's a happening place with some or the other activity happening in and around. Completely loved the place. Me and my family had a great time.

Very good service and good basic accommodation. Food good but repetitive and needs more variation and les repetition. On arrival the hotel staff were tireless in their care of me and when I had some difficulties were outstanding.

Had an awesome time!!! The food was amazing. The entertainment was good. The staff and service was excellent. The weather was fine. Very nice beach. Had the best ever weekend one could dream or think of. Can't wait for my next trip here.

Our first visit to an Aitken Spence hotel. Had a wonderful time. Super hospitality. Enjoyed the food. specially the sea food.... Loved the entertainment, and specially the atmosphere... Never missed home.

we stayed for 3 nights and it was really nice! Helpful staff, excellent food, good cleaning and nice pool. Recommend it for couples and familys :) If we come back to Sri lanka we would live here again, and they are rebuilding the hotel now and expanding :)

Beautiful room with direct sea view friendly and helpful front office staff A lot of fun activities to spend time with you loved ones Very satisfied and happy Hope to visit again perfect get away for vacation

I have stayed at this hotel several times, Its a beach hotel located in a very beautiful location in Down South Sri Lanka costal area.A very safe hotel. And it has a proud history, Food is really nice, worlds well renown celebrity chef's are there to make sure that you get the most delicious authentic and international food, Hotel staff were really kind and taking care of us very well, Specially I have to remind there was this one guy, Front office executive Chathuranga, I had to face few difficulties at hotel due to being sick, so he helped me a lot and was checking on me whenever I come to near lobby. Overall this hotel is one of the best hotel you can relax like you in the paradise..

We spent one saturday night at the hotel to escape from our hectic schedules.We soon realised it was the right place for relaxing.Food was great with a large variety and we received a friendly service.The architecture of spacy airy halls was just added the right touches to a ideal beach hotel.Wouls visit it again soon!

Beautiful setting on the beach. Loved the open spaces. Can walk from the lobby to the beach!. Staff is very courteous and addressed our needs. The breakfast buffet was delicious. The food at Jute restaurant was excellent. We stayed on a weekend, was a bit noisy because of large crowds. On the whole, a good experience.

I stayed at heritance ahungalla for 1 night during last week end. Simply this is the best hotel that I have ever stayed. Upon check in their. garlon was exceptional and ccheck in was smooth. Within 5 minutes i got the room. Speccially front office Execcutive Mr Chaturanga helped a lot and his service was fantastic. Food is perfect and the rooms are having a panoramic view of Indian Ocean. Finally Heritance Ahungalla is great

A brilliant setting on the beach, friendly, efficient and welcoming staff, genuinely wanting to ensure you have a great stay with them. A brilliant chef, wonderful fresh food, changing menu, great quality and exceptional value, will also cook your favorite dishes even if they are not on the menu. All needs catered for nothing is too much trouble, you only have to ask. We will be returning.

A very well organised and tastefully decorated ambiance close to nature I had a wonderful stay here with the shore of sea roaming around and having the feeling at home definitely a place to visit again and again

It is my second time at this wonderful hotel. Everything is excellent the staff, atmosphere, sea view, pool and the food. Please spend your vacation at this hotel and the rest of Heritance hotels ie Kandalama, tea Factory

Hotel has Excellent staff and great foodğŸ˜‰ Rooms are cozy, beach is nice, swimming pool is good I do recommend itğŸ˜‰ Rooms should take some renovation, otherwise great hotel. Enjoyable HelenağŸ˜‰ğŸ˜‰ğŸ˜‰ğŸ˜‰ğŸ˜‰

We had superb time with my family ğŸ‘ª & friends.supporting staff welcome us & continuously treat us well untill we check out.thanks all your fabulously meals make us happy......ğŸ˜‹ğŸ˜† ...................

My wife and I got married here in December 2014. Shanika was the best wedding planner we could have hoped for because she ensured we felt like VIPs throughout our stay - nothing was too much trouble! We sat down with her a couple of days before the wedding to arrange everything we needed (she had a great list to fill so we didn't forget anything) and then paid for everything by VISA the day before the wedding. We loved the quiet pool and the attendant who helped coax the monkeys down from the tree every evening and picked flowers for us every morning. The main pool was the perfect photo and my favourite place to sit with a cocktail and enjoy the view. The bar service at the main pool was pretty swift but often the quiet pool was unattended and drinks could take 30 minutes or so to arrive at your lounger even when empty. The wedding day itself was almost laid back yet perfectly structured so everyone knew what to do and we were kept busy throughout! If anyone is considering a wedding here I highly recommend it and would be happy to talk to you about all the details if you send me a message. The location was fantastic, nice and close to the railway station and far enough away from any other hotels. I recommend a walk along the railway line (some great photos of children playing and cows eating on the track) and a very short walk along the beach to see turtles and big waves break against local fishermen on the rocks. If you want to get away from Ahungalla, a tuk tuk to Bentota cost us Â£3 return. Definitely go to Kosgada turtle sanctuary, it will only cost a few pound but you get to learn about their life cycle and hold one. I have dropped a single star for a few issues which let down the overall experience slightly but dropping any more would be crazy considering how amazing everything else was. The first issue was I paid around Â£700 to upgrade our room through email to the hotel a few months prior to our arrival as a surprise for my wife. Unfortunately the member of staff who took the booking left the hotel and the details had not been passed on so we were given the wrong room on arrival and the surprise was ruined when I had to start digging around for electronic proof I had upgraded the room (despite me handing my paper copy to reception on arrival). Secondly some of the rooms are noticeably tired. The first room (the wrong one) had obviously been given a face-lift and looked to a higher standard of finish than the suite we had upgraded to. One of the sinks was blocked, the shutters had fallen off the rail, there were some damaged pieces of furniture and the balcony door would not lock properly without brute force. Two members of staff would beg for us to leave alcohol on the side for them to drink. On our last night all of the regular restaurant staff had changed shifts and the food quality and service level fell considerably! It took 25 minutes for our drinks to be served and we watched a waiter down my grandma's glass of wine!

Me and my wife came to Heritance Ahungalle to spend two days of our Honeymoon. We are very happy what we got from the hotel. It is really valuable. We came to the hotel at the time of a heavy rain. Me and my wife got somewhat tired due to the journey when we were check-in. But because of friendly service of the hotel staff we were so happy. We had a room upgrade. Meals were so good and evening events like dancing, musical shows really attractive. We enjoyed very much. This hotel consist a pool called as "Green pool". It is like bathing in natural water stream under the trees. I liked it. From the day I made a booking to the day we check-out everything went well. My wife appreciated me for this selection. I would like to visit all the other "Heritance" hotels . Thanks all.

TRULY....THIS PLACE ADDED LOTS OF COLORS TO OUR LIVES.......! THANK YOU ALL........! (special thanks to "SUNETHRA" who was our unseen friend; was very polite and kind on the phone and took care of ourselves......)

Good place to be. this is my third visit. Quality maintenance is fabulous Delicious foods.... Superb... Nice place to enjoy the holiday vacation.. Well done keep it up....... ... .. Cheers!!!...... ..

our stay at Heritance was memorable !!!!!!!!!!!!.............,,The scenic view, and comfort stay, excellent hospitality gave us an immense pleasure for years to come. We would recommend a stay for anybody will be memorable and no next to home . Heritance is highly recommended............,,,,,,,,

I had the Heritance recommended from someone I know...clearly we have different taste or it was a different Heritance they stayed at. We booked this place for our last night in Sri Lanka as closer to Colombo and also looked lovely from the website. We so wished we had stayed at our gorgeous little boutique hotel in Mirissa instead! I won't make that mistake again...this is definitely a nice enough place for families or people looking for an all-in-one, resort experience, the beach is very pretty and so are the pools and lounge area with lots of grass and trees. Our room was OK but as many people say, 'tired' and not the cleanest ever, although a very good shower. The food, a buffet, was decent, but definitely nowhere near the food we had during our entire stay in Sri Lanka at a fraction of the cost. We had a hefty service charge added to our bill simply for ordering 1 bottle of wine at dinner! We booked a massage at the spa there which was good, and took advantage of the tennis courts. There are certainly plenty of facilities, but the various sales-people around selling tourist goods and palm readings made it that little bit more resorty/touristy for us. Overall, definitely not for the traveller who likes to stay less 'chainy' hotels (I was also enticed by their 'eco' claims but not sure I saw much to support it?) and I would not call it 5 star, but I probably made a mistake in booking it in the first place for what we wanted!

This is the third Aitken Spence Hotel we've stayed at during our tour of Sri Lanka. Although my first impression of Heritance Ahungalla was not good because of problems with our initial room in this tired, ageing establishment. However I have to say that the reception staff, and Shanika in particular, stepped in and immediately moved us to a lovely, very spacious room. The room we are in now is more in keeping with the standard of our previous hotels. The award winning chefs here at Heritance Ahungalla produce food which is every bit as good as previous reviews suggest. The breakfast buffet provides a fantastic choice which caters for all tastes. But if you want something else or need help with the Sri Lankan specialities then KK, the assistant restaurant manager, is on hand with some useful advice. The hotel is in a great location directly on the beach and within easy walking distance of a couple of good beach restaurants. Yet walk out the main entrance and you're right in the midst of Ahungalla where there are a few shops and where the friendly locals enjoy chatting to tourists. It's also where you can hire a tuk tuk to take you further afield to other local towns, villages, restaurants and so on. The main town of Galle with its many places of interest is about an hours drive away by air conditioned mini bus. Or you could try using the local buses, which stop right at the hotel's main entrance. Although this old hotel needs refurbished it's still a very pleasant and relaxing place to stay. Its greatest asset is the staff - friendly, helpful, happy, accommodating and above all professional!

We had a lovely 2 day stay at the Heritance. We had a free upgrade to a luxury room when I told them my son desired a Bathtub with the minimum of fuss. The food was excellent. Looking forward to another stay.

I travelled with a friend who was known to the staff. I was treated like a friend rather than a stranger. All the staff were attentive, wanting to serve and please. The Chefs deserve a special mention as all meals were superbly presented and served with pride awaiting the pleasure we were about to encounter - taste buds were in heaven! I would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the South West Coast. The drive from the airport is worth it. Paradise is waiting for you. Enjoy the facilities in the Spa, pool, gym, library, games room. I could list all 50 + members of staff who looked after me, but thanks to Shanika, Thushara, Nihal, KK and Manjula especially. You all deserve a mention. THANK YOU.

We arrived here for our last leg of the tour, what a beautiful hotel. Large spacious hotel lobby overlooking the pool and the ocean beyond. We stayed in one of the suites which had an extra-large living room and a beautiful room and a huge bathroom with a Jacuzzi bath tub and a separate shower, also it had a half bath. And also an extra-large balcony. The drinks and the food were no exception. Something for everyone. A huge local curry spread and European dishes for those who like that. I really enjoyed the food and the chef made a special steak for my husband on our last day which he enjoyed. My husband and I also used the spa which was non like Iâ€™ve had in the US. I had a Warm stone massage The therapist were well experienced and we left feeling completely relaxed. Well worth the money we spent. And I canâ€™t say enough about the staff. They were all so friendly and helpful, Sri Lankan hospitality at its best!!! Thank you for making us feel so welcomed and special. Canâ€™t wait to visit you again.

This is a such an amazing place!!!!! we felt like we were stranded in a wonderful paradise of our own.Staff were amazing very attentive and looked after every little thing we needed.Excellent food,Room with a wonderful sea views and the helpful staff Made our stay truly wonderful experience.We will definitely come back again and highly recommend Heritence Ahungalla if you want to be spoilt with all the great things hotel has to offer!!!!!!!

we had a lovely time at heritance ahungalla. Feel like home. Staff is very good and excellent. Room is very comfortable. Two swimming pools are amazing. We love to come back again with my kids.thank you for everything.

As I was the manager of the Kandurata Cricket Team we were put into this spectacular hotel. It was an amazing place. My room was a suite. Truly fantastic. The beach is as breathtaking. But if you are not a good swimmer use the massive pool.

We were with our friends 2 days in heritance. I would say it is really nice plays to stay. Room quality and help of the staff is brilliant. Food is superb. I would not hesitate recommend this hotel to anyone.

Friendly staff. Superb food and hospitality. Nice sea view and sandy beaches with natural beauty. Best conference rooms for meetings. Had a great stay. All together it was a excellent service. All these for a reasonable price. One and only Heritance ahungalla.

A good place to enjoy the evening sunset. We went for an offial conference everything was well aranged. Nice iconic pool with a sea view. Nice Sri lankan food plus various foreign tastes as well. Easy to reach. Good luck to the hotel crew.

Having travelled to every continent in the world id say - The hotel is a 4star property Mr. Pahan at reception was the friendliest face whose smile calmed me many a times Beware of house cleaning who on three occasions walked in the room unannounced Due to the climate the buffet area have a lot of fruit flies over the food at fruit and salad counter which is disgusting Not many options for alacarte so best is to take a full board package If ur a light eater then half board is good Best part of food is the sri lankan cuisine Pool is amazing and beach is untouched which are the two features i loved most Overall de-stressing and relaxing Will definitely go back hoping for a better experience Used the spa which was average - they could do better with the massage and ambience Oh yes and pls carry shampoo and shower gel as the provisions at the hotel not user friendly - Globe trotter Ms Dsilva R

Two of us stayed here for a business trip to this area. The staff are fantastic, friendly, courteous and ever helpful. The hotel itself is on a beach and the views are incredible. The Internet is not strong enough in the rooms, our mobile devices seemed to work but when trying to log in with computers it was a different story. The hotel was quiet, 1/3 of the rooms full yet the hotel still gave us two rooms above the karaoke that started at 8pm thru to midnight. We both moved room but not sure why the hotel would give these two rooms when the noise was so loud the walls were shaking. The restaurant was also a disappointment - cost wise was actually higher than some 5 star hotels in Colombo, and the quality not as good, as well as the restaurant under renovation and moved to a banquet room with no view - overall food was a disappointment.

Another of the Geoffrey Bawa architectural hotels, this one is smack bang on a lovely beach. Rooms are spacious and ours on the ground floor had a private patio not too far from one of the enormous pools. I found the staff incredibly willing to please and all seemed to love working here. I hope the owners treat them well. The fridge in the room didn't work but we didn't need to use it anyway. Wifi was fine and the bed comfortable. I loved the way they placed my husband's pyjamas on the bed decorated with flowers -shows how much they want to make you smile. The restaurant was wonderful and the food seriously good. They even have a children's table with kiddie accessible foods. The sculptured butter statues leave you admiring the unbelievable skills of the chefs. As I was in a group the staff gave us a tour of the kitchens which I found one of the best and most unusual attractions every experienced. They are meticulous and so very proud of what they accomplish. I would like to say thanks to all the staff for making my stay so memorable.

stayed 2 night here and it was the most wonderful and memorable moments of our lives. staff is amazing and very helpful. delucious food. lovely pools and very clean beach. rooms are neat and tidy. colonial type which we love. room cleaning done twice a day. i loved the evening bed decorations. thank you for taking care of us. we felt truly home away from home. would come back for sure. highly recommended.

We had an amazing time and enjoyed the lovely hospitality of the most friendliest courtiest staff whom I have ever met. Mouthwatering food. Lovely location, clean beach and would like to recommend all. Diffinetely would return. Thank you all for your excellence service.

What an entrance! This is one of the most stunning views of a swimming pool and beach that I have seen when you enter a hotel. The rooms are of a good standard. We were upgraded which gave us a lounge as well as bedroom. Although very nice I don't really see the point apart from extra space as most of the time would be spent by the pool and beach. Although the hotel was very nice I would not recommend you stay here at the locals holiday time as it became rather chaotic and the restaurant felt more like a cafeteria.

I was here with a large (300+) group and the staff was able to checked all in without any delay. and staff is kind and very helpful. The most notorious thing is food with exceptional taste and quality.

We had a very good experience. Rooms were clean with a very good beach view. Food was good too thought I would recommend the management to add some more chicken dishes. The only problem we noticed was the presence of insects over the sweet dish counter.

Was here over the weekend for our annual staff trip. Was impressed by the check-in counter as they managed to check-in all 160 of us in about 1/2 an hour. The staff are friendly and the service was very good. The food was good, a wide variety of things to choose from. My favourite meal was breakfast! The waffles were really good.

Went there with high hopes to re-live the great stay I once had in one of their sister hotels, Heritance Kandalama, but this Ahungalla has failed to match that quality... This was the annual trip of my work place Leapset, but since my wife also joined and I spent most of my time with her, I'm opting the type of visit as "Couples" here. First of all, it's a good hotel in terms of services, location, spaciousness and specially the friendliness of the staff. With the long duration of its existence, so have they matured with the experience on how to satisfy us visitors. Couple of excellent swimming pools, amusement area, beach volleyball, animators for kids and many more can be found if you stretch your eyes a little wider... Room was pretty good, complete and detailed, apart from the absence of some toothpaste which is quite common even in a 4 star hotel but not to be found in this 5 star. Also noticeable the rich mini bar with lots of varieties in average prices. About the food, variation was high but something was missing, maybe the taste or maybe the magic I tasted at Kandalama. The main restaurant has a nice, calm lighting theme at night however. With all this ups and downs, it has been standing a tall on that elegant beach for so long now, that it badly in need of a mass renovation. Signs of corrosion due to the salty winds sprayed by the beautiful Indian Ocean all throughout the year, are still visible even after some paint jobs. The notice on the door that opens to the balcony facing the sea front, requesting the visitors the keep the door shut to avoid this corrosion suggests that the hotel management is also hit hard by this. Let the corrosion apart, majority of the hotel premises look old now. So unless a full renovation and some restructuring happens soon, the legacy of this remarkable hotel might not live longer...

Had an awesome 5 days with my family.. great food.. warm sea baths.. it was really heavenly. Bit over priced in my opinion, and beaches are a bit crowded. but we were there in a very busy time period. Room service is great and the rooms are pretty clean. One of the best options to vacation in the south.

The location is good right on the beach but that's about it. The sprawling property has no charm, no grace, it's actually disgraceful. The service is pathetic. There is only one elevator servicing each wing and reaching your room is nothing short of a long uninteresting walk. The lobby lights are off at night and we literally had to walk in the torch light of the mobile phone when we had to leave at dawn for the whale watching tour. The spa treatments are an eye wash. The food is so lousy there is no sense of any combinations also the main course is served in a bright white light area if chef fin dishes that are broken and it feels like eating at a very low budget wedding or a college canteen. The last night was my husband's birthday and I had even offered to pay for a good cake, but my agent assured that it had been arranged free. It was one of the worst cakes that looked like it had been bought from the cheapest bakery in town. The common area toilets were so filthy I dreaded going there more than once. The key card that was issued to me was in someone else's name. Just about everything was bad about this property. I wonder how they have procured a licence to operate as a 5 Star. I do not recommend it to anybody at all! When the staff came to know that we were upset, they wouldn't leave us alone at breakfast and created an unnatural fuss. I found that extremely unprofessional. One of the staff members asked me what the problem was and after I shared all the grievances with her at the end of the conversation she actually said "wish you a good stay Ms. Natu " what should I call that? Deliberate or really dumb? If they don't get their act together soon, I guarantee that they will have to close down in the next couple of years!

It was a very nice honeymoon vacation we had so much fun, the beach was beautiful, and the service was perfect â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸The chef was very helpful with us ğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜Š If we have an other vacation we will come here again ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜

This is our second visit here after four years. Absolutely love it. Looking forward to spend another holiday with the kids soon. Service is good, beach is awesome, food was good, the pool was spacious and we'll designed. The rooms were pretty neat too. I just had one tiny problem the waffles were not done because the waffle maker seemed to have a problem . I felt bad for the cook. He had so many requests too. But overall-loved it! Hope to come again if we get a good deal.

Heritance Ahungalla was a excellent choice to have the annual trip. We enjoyed the comfort of excellent room condition, mouthwatering food and had lot of other activities. Support given by the staff and welcoming words made our stay truly remarkable.

From the moment you arrive you are made to feel welcome. The staff are extremely hard working and friendly,they always smiling and can't help you, enough. The room are amazing and comfortable, the food is of a high standard and there is something for everyone, the view are amazing and I would recommend this hotel to anyone, we want to thank everyone for giving us the best time for our honeymoon.

Its very nice place to visit in southern coast. Nice staff with Great hospitality, nice food, nice swimming pools and just one stride away form the sea.......We have enjoyed the place a lot. Its worthy to come and enjoy your vacation.

We stopped on our trip from Colombo to Galle, it's a bit of miles more but it's worth. Just the view on the swimming pool and the beach when you arrive is worth actually! Really nice and attentive service, good and diversified buffet for breakfast and dinner, direct access to the beach, beautiful colonial style...we'll come back!

We liked this hotel . Lovely place . Calm and peace . Nice ocean . Happy vacation . Advice for all to come . Hope to come again . Nice seri Lanka . Good treat and help . We enjoid our vacation for two weeks .

I have a great deal of fun Very nice and we'll arranged facilities Nice beach We spent time walking by the ocean Swimming Sitting by the beach And having grateful days in our honey moon Very clean and sweet ppl

It was a pleasant stay at the Hotel...The Staff are smiling, Cooperative and courteous. Chef at the Hotel are Very Cooperative, Each time they dished out food on request that suited our taste buds The Facilities at the Hotel are Good and Great for a romantic break.

Most welcoming greeting for us this holiday. The staff were warm friendly and even upgraded our room. There were two pools so if you want more privacy you can use the second which is in a quieter more secluded area. The buffet was a varied spread of western and local cuisine and a special thank you to sanjaya our waiter who was so helpful and brought us tasty extras. We had a relaxing time in our room wwhich had a double bath rain shower and was very spacious. Decor was also luxurious and it definitely had the comfort factor with our own balcony over looking the beach. And most of all thank you to Shanika who gave us a great deal an looked after us during our stay.

We had a lovely holiday at Heritance Ahungalla with my family. Staff and the service was excellent.food was delicious. Specialy I should mention about the wesak programme. That was well organized and colourful. Also the pandol was very attractive. They had a herbal drink dansala and bakthi gee was sang by their own staff. We will definitly come back again.

Had a lovely family holiday. The two pools are awesome and so relaxing. The children loved spending time at the pool. Must mention the excellent service by room boy indrajeet. Also the sous chef Dananjaya went out of his way to make us happy. Would recommend amyone to come and stay here.

Very helpful staff and we had delish food s they have very beautiful full swemig pools, nice place to visit holidays. We would like to come back next holiday too..and would like to recommend for anyone.

Stayed here one night early May 2015 and it met our expectations. It's a beautiful 5 star hotel with an infinity pool overlooking the Sea. Nice clean beach. The Staff was friendly and helpful. Room/bathroom was clean, comfortable and beautifully designed. Food was good.

A nice spacious place with a nice view of the beach. Two large swimming pools makes the guests enjoy without disturbance from others. Room facilities are good. Staff is so friendly and provided a good service. Specially shehan. Food was tasty and had a good variety. Would love to visit this beautiful place again soon.

One of the best hotels down south. Amazing food as always and great, polite service. Never had an issue staying here and have always been pleasantly surprised. My wife and kid absolutely love the place...furthermore they have an outstanding management team. ***** from me.

It was a great impromptu trip to Triton, a trip down memory lane for my sons now 19 and 17, remembering the annual holidays we had since they were little ones many years ago. It was especially nice to meet the staff who were as warm and caring as we remembered, with some of them recognising us !!!

Exceptional location. Kind staff. Great food. Beach was marvelous. ... pool was well situated with great views... Overall fantastic stay. Kids had a great time.... highly recommended...... worth mention the friendly staff They were fantastic...

Wow!! I would say itz an excellent hotel experience.visited with my frieds n my baby.we all really enjoyed.friendly staff,delicious food,luxury rooms n lovely beach.... Would like to thank Shehan for his superb service. Will definitely recommend for every one to visit. Cheers!!

Really enjoyed our atay, visited with my family of 6, got 3 of the best rooms in the hotel overlooking the sea, lake checkout, exquisite cuisine and wonderful fire show at night to wrap things up. REFHAN and his team were very kind and we're really helpful to make our journey a memorable one.

We can enjoy fully with our familly.. very exelant.. friedly staff.. food tast and very intresting... We can recomend any one in this place alsoo.. We want come back again.... thank you.............................

Very warm welcome and good services with tasty foods.staff is very friendly with guests.we enjoyed well and had a very good time.I would like to recommend to this all Srilankans n foreigners come n visit this.friendly hotel.

Execellent hotel with a excellence service. nice play for the holiday . Tasty foods . Had a nice place for anyone .we want to come back again. Thankz heritance..........................................

Been to mAny hotsls and was reLly not e ps tinf anythinv different but oh boy it sure was one awesome vacation. The service and must say the food was unmatchablE. Thank u heritance ahungalla fod this amazing time.
